story:
Empire of the Superheroes, a book project by New York Times bestselling author Mark Cotta Vaz and distinguished national security attorney and comic book historian Mark S. Zaid, Esq., has been years in the making. The authors recently landed a distinguished publisher: The University of Texas Press. Although no publication date has been set, the manuscript is due this December.

Empire of the Superheroes will be the first book to chronicle the evolution of America’s costumed superhero from dime-a-copy comics to today’s multi-media, multi-billion dollar global industry. The work focuses on the parallel forces of mass merchandising and legal warfare that shaped the destinies of superheroes and the mythology itself. The heart of this epic story is the 1941 copyright lawsuit the publishers of Superman brought against the publishers of rival Captain Marvel—with both characters commanding expanding entertainment empires, supremacy of the new myth and medium was at stake.

The authors are in the home stretch of finalizing the manuscript and preparing visual elements for delivery to The University of Texas Press. This Indiegogo campaign seeks to defray research and writing costs, travel, rights and permissions, manuscript preparation (including index preparation), and related expenses. 

 

THE GREAT COMIC BOOK HEROES

When DC publisher Harry Donenfeld first saw the cover art for Action Comics #1, he thought it was crazy, that no one would believe it—a muscle man dressed like a circus strongman with a red “S” chest emblem and a flowing red cape, was lifting a car over his head and smashing it. No one had seen anything like Superman in 1938, and the ensuing publishing phenomenon launched the young comic book industry and inspired the mythical costumed superheroes. Entertainment empires would rise on the broad shoulders of Superman and his costumed progeny, and like all empires they would be fought over.

Empire of the Superheroes will be the first book to capture the drama of the copyright infringement suit brought by Detective Comics, Inc., and Superman, Inc. (later merged into National Comics Publications, Inc.), publishers of Superman, against Fawcett, publishers of Captain Marvel, in the process revealing secrets of the early comics business. The book will also follow the legal odyssey of the creators who fought to reclaim their creations, notably Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster, who infamously sold their Superman rights for $130 and spent their lives trying to reclaim their creation, as well as Joe Simon’s courtroom struggles to regain his and co-creator Jack Kirby’s patriotic super star, Captain America.

This alternative history will follow the myth and medium that began with the so-called Golden Age of Comics—a “not so golden time,” one artist recalled, with its shadowy mob influences and smut publishing. The book follows the young artists who forged a new industry and art but were unprepared for the cutthroat business of conjuring superheroes. From World War II, through the postwar comic book censorship fights, the new media platform of television, and the breakthrough technology that enabled the “comic book movie,” this book reveals the evolutionary imperative hardwired into the genetic makeup of superheroes that has allowed them to endure. This story will also spotlight the fight for creative freedom and creator’s rights, the tech-breakthroughs in publishing, and the emergence of sophisticated storytelling that set the stage for today’s mythical superhero “universes.”

Empire of the Superheroes is still a work in progress with a publisher secured and a delivery date on the horizon. By contributing to this fundraising campaign you will help the authors complete a significant work on American popular culture and support The University of Texas Press and other independent and academic presses championing adventurous and compelling publishing.

AUTHOR BIOS

Mark Cotta Vaz is a New York Times bestselling author of 37 books, including the award winning The Invisible Art: The Legends of Movie Matte Painting (co-authored with Oscar-winning filmmaker Craig Barron), and the acclaimed biography, Living Dangerously: The Adventures of Merian C. Cooper, Creator of King Kong. His interest in comics history includes an early tenure on the board of directors of the Cartoon Art Museum in San Francisco. Vaz wrote Tales of the Dark Knight, the authorized fiftieth anniversary history of Batman, Batmobile: The Complete History, and the “making of” movie books, Behind the Mask of Spider-Man and Caught In The Web: Dreaming Up The World Of Spider-Man 2. He recently completed Pan Am at War (co-authored with aviation historian John H. Hill) that will be published by Skyhorse Publishing in 2018 reveals Pan American Airways’ early strategic operations for the U.S. government and top-secret missions for the Allies during World War II.   

Mark S. Zaid, Esq., is a Washington, D.C. attorney specializing in national security issues who often represents former and current federal employees, intelligence and military officers, whistleblowers, and members of the media. He has been named Washington, D.C. “Super Lawyer” (top 5%) every year since 2009, and his national security work has also won him “Best Lawyer” accolades from Washington Magazine since 2009, in its bi-annual designation. Zaid’s alter ego is that of a lifelong comic book collector. He lectures on comic book history, is an advisor to the Overstreet Comic Book Price and Grading Guides, and was a co-founder of the Comic Book Collecting Association. Zaid curated a 2010 exhibit at Yale Law School, “Superheroes in Court! Law, Lawyers, and Comic Books,” which was spotlighted in the New York Times, and a similar exhibit at the University of Miami Law School in 2012, and Albany Law School in 2017.

We Thank Our Donors:

Joe DeVito is an award winning artist and illustrator, sculptor, and writer. He has painted hundreds of book and magazine covers and his sculpted works include the official 100th anniversary statue, “Tarzan of the Apes,” for the Edgar Rice Burroughs Estate, and “The Cooper Kong” for the Merian C. Cooper Estate. With the approval of the Cooper Estate, DeVito has been expanding the King Kong myth through an on-going series of “Skull Island” projects.

Justin Greenwood is an illustrator specializing in creator-owned comic book series such as The Fuse, Stumptown, Wasteland, and Resurrection. Recent work includes Alexander Hamilton: The Graphic History of an American Founding Father that was written by Jonathan Hennessey and published in 2017 by Ten Speed Press. As a freelance artist, his clients have included Image Comics, Ten Speed Press/Penguin Random House, Sideshow Collectibles, and the Golden State Warriors.  

* Site Preparation and Video Production by Ricky Borba.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Krisily Kennedy I am a journalist and film critic living in West Hollywood, California, but my journey started long before I moved to the west coast. While life interviewing celebrities is exciting, the road that brought me here is far more interesting. When my father died two years ago I had a lot of feeling I wasn't really sure what to do with so I started writing and soon couldn't stop. I wrote about growing up in Rhode Island with a single mother, growing up without my alcoholic father, messing up in school and even abusive relationships. The more I wrote the more I started to view my life in a different perspective. For all intents and purposes, I should have amounted to what the outside world made me feel I would, nothing. Yet I found the strength and courage in places I would never have imagined myself finding them in. I attempted to show the world what I was made of. Becoming Miss RI USA and competing at Miss USA was the beginning of me taking control over my life and my emotions. I took risks in life and love and took a chance on The Bachelor and I honestly thought taking big life risks was over after The Bachelor Pad but life decided it had other plans by making my sexuality news on gossip blogs and tabloids. I could write a book about conversations with celebrities but the truth is I want to inspire, to start conversations and even create change and the only way I know how to do that is to share my story. All of it. The good, the bad, the spectacular and even the so horrible no person should ever have to live through it. I truly believe that had I had a book to read by someone sharing their stories that I would have felt less alone, less broken and maybe I wouldn't have carried so much shame in my life for so long. Sharing my story is my way of helping make another woman feel less alone and I can't do that without your help. Self Publishing is the best way to get my story out to the world on my terms and at a time when women need each others support more than ever. This book is a passion project of mine and I know that the support I am receiving from you all has far outweighed any of the fear I have had about sharing my story.

What We Need & What You Get

My goal is $6,000.00 I have started researching editors, book jacket artists and formatters these will cost me at the lowest $1,500.00 each and can cost up to $3,000.00 each. All money raised will be used for editors, book jackets, printing, marketing and sending perks to contributors. Anything over the $6,000.00 that is raised will allow for better editors or artists so I welcome all contributions and hope they enable me to find the best team for this memoir that is so close to my heart. I have high hopes that you all will show me as much support as you have throughtout the years following all of my various shows and I'm hoping we can surpass $6,000.00 and make it $10,000.00! If together we can raise upwards of $10,000.00, not only will it give me enough to fully finance the publishing and printing with an amazing editor and a kick-ass cover, but it will also allow me to throw a spectacular book release party in Hollywood (and maybe even one in Rhode Island too) and every supporter will be invited to celebrate with me!

The Impact

The more we share, the more conversations are had and the more we all grow. Whether you are a woman who has lived through trauma or someone you love has, the more we share the more we understand each other. By helping me to share my story, you aren't just supporting me, you are showing that you support us all. You are showing you support any woman who has felt alone, broken, scared or less than and you are giving those woman the chance to read the story of someone who has lived as they have and been strong enough to come out on top at the end. I hope this book can inspire, encourage, motivate and maybe even amaze all who read it and your help will allow that to happen.

Risks & Challenges

Every venture has some risk and some challenges.The biggest challenge I would face is not raising enough funds to bring on a great editor and/or artist, which could slow down the timetable on getting perks out within the 6-month timeframe. If the full amount of funds are not reached I will use all that is raised on an editor, to me, this is the most important part of this campaign finding a great editor.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute financially to this campaign I would greatly appreciate if you would share this with your family and friends who may believe in this project as much as you and I do and feel compelled to support it. If everyone supports and shares this passion project of mine, we will be able to celebrate together at a fabulous Book Release Party!

 

Thank you for all your support and love, helping me to make my passion project become a reality.

Thank you for all your support and love, helping me to make my passion project become a reality.

story:
The "ShadowNet"

In 2007 I went to Iraq on a 1-year department of defense contract to help in pioneering social media psychological warfare for the 4th Psychological Operations Group. I was tasked with migrating the 4th POG's influence operations from dropping flyers from planes, to micro-targeted, Interactive Internet Activities (IIA). Our efforts helped in maintaining support between the Sunni and Shia together for the first time in a millennia in what was known as the Sahawa, or "The Awakening." My name is Patrick Bergy, and it is time for an American Awakening...

Since my pioneering of social media psychological warfare for the Department of Defense from 2007-2010, the world has now been awakened to the threat such military-grade social media influence operations is capable of. Both foreign and domestic, the threat this poses to the integrity of U.S. elections, as well as elections around the world, is the single greatest threat to our nation. It was known commercially as, "The ShadowNet"

Non-Partisan Threat

This is fraud, waste and abuse at the highest levels of our government and military. The ShadowNet was developed by Dynology, a company owned by Obama's National Security Advisor, Gen. James Jones. Paul Manafort was Dynology's partner at that time, and Jones was a lifelong friend of John McCain.

The ShadowNet was developed using an Obama procured military contract funded by taxpayers while Gen. Jones was Obama's National Security Advisor. Dynology was founded in 2000 by General James Jones and his family, and has profited millions from taxpayer funded military contracts while Gen. Jones served as the Commander of the Marine Corps., NATO Supreme Allied Commander, ISAF Commander, Obama's National Security Advisor. Gen. Jones also owns Jones Group International. According to news reports, Jones Group is one of the largest Saudi oil and gas lobbying firms in DC. Now ask yourself about the murder of Washington Post "journalist" Khashoggi. Knowing what I know about the ShadowNet and Interactive Internet Activities (IIA) I believe the justice department must take a closer look.

  • The ShadowNet was built to provide the exact same covert/clandestine social media psychological warfare the FBI indicted the 13 Russian's for in 2018.
  • The ShadowNet and its relational database component, "iPsy," was made commercially available in 2008 while Dynology was serving as John McCain's primary campaign IT provider. Paul Manafort's company, 3EDC, was Dynology's #1 preferred partner.
  • Following the 2008 primary victory, the RNC and McCain campaign paid Manafort's company, 3EDC, millions of dollars for "micro-targeted social media" services.
  • Khashoggi?

We Can't Do It Without You!

We are raising funds to help in writing, editing and publishing the sequel to Patrick Bergy's, "Victim of the Swamp..." I raised over $1,100 with crowdfunding support for my first book, but it wasn't enough to have professionally edited, so I published it and used the funds to purchase books in bulk that I sold at events and mailed to many journalists.

My new book has been tentatively titled, 'ShadowNet; The American Awakening' and we are seeking your help in:

  • Raising an initial $15,000 for research, editing and publishing of 'ShadowNet; The American Awakening'
  • Bypassing the corrupt and broken main stream media using grassroots crowdfunding and social media to get the message out showing the corruption within our nation's Fourth Estate.  
  • Like before, if we don't reach our goal, we will shift-fire as necessary and work with what we've got, not what we want. Your help is absolutely needed to make the most impact.

Our Goal

Following the publication of The Awakening, Patrick Bergy will be attending speaking events, book signing's and Trump 2020 rallies nationwide to educate the public on how they can protect themselves, as well as the sovereignty of our nation, from the influence of the "ShadowNet."

This is what is literally happening right now by some of the most powerful people in the world, and it must be exposed and stopped:

  • The influence of Interactive Internet Activities (IIA,) (AKA social media "fake news") is a systemic threat worldwide.  Un-elected former staff officers, politicians and lobbyists are using the military industrial complex to influence policies for profit, not just politics. 
  • Privately owned defense companies are using real-time databases containing your social media postings, credit, criminal and travel history.
  • They then use Artificial Intelligence to create predictive behavioral psychological profiles which can be used for other IIA influence operations, or by employers when considering your employment.
  • These "predictive" behavioral profiles are used to determine if an existing employee is likely to steal from a company, or leak classified information, and can be used for termination based on something you're "predictively likely" to do; before you have done it.
  • Watch an explainer video here: 

The American Awakening

The Sahawa, or "Awakening" in Iraq brought the Sunni and Shia together to fight with the U.S., and against Al-Qaeda in Iraq (AIQ). In the most simplest terms, this was largely accomplished by giving the Sunni and Shia a common enemy, (AQI.) 

 The book, 'ShadowNet; The American Awakening' is about showing all American's, both Democrats and Republicans, America's common threat; The Military Industrial Complex.

  • Knowledge is power and we need to let American's know of the fraud, waste and abuse the Military Industrial Complex has on our government and politics.
  • Having pioneered the ShadowNet I have a unique perspective that allows me to push back against the MIC with indisputable facts.
  • I have submitted official requests to the Congressional Intelligence Committee, Congressmen Devin Nunes, Adam Schiff, Charlie Crist, Gus Bilirakis, Matt Gaetz and the Senate Judicial Committee. The requests all included direct evidence of the ShadowNets connection the Mueller's indictments, as well as a classified briefing to discuss information I cannot disclose without being read-on. 

Other Ways You Can Help

The Fourth Estate is broken worse than I had anticipated. It is my belief, and that of President Trump, that many journalists are little more than sub-contractors for paid influence operations.

I held a Top Secret clearance while pioneering social media "fake news," but use the example of President Trump because he is the highest classification authority, and has access to classified information most everyone else doesn't. Regardless of political ideology or hatred for our president, everyone should want integrity in journalism. 

  • We can no longer assume the protections provided in the U.S. Constitution to protect the Fourth Estate means the information you should be getting actually gets reported.
  • Please share this Indiegogo campaign and my website; https://www.VictimOfTheSwamp.com
  • My first book, "Victim of the Swamp; How the Deep State Destroyed the 40-Year-Old Private" is also available for purchase on Amazon! Click here to follow link. 

I would like to extend a deep and personal thank-you to everyone that has helped me over the last 2 years. I can't do this without you.

 The book, 'ShadowNet; The American Awakening' is about showing all American's, both Democrats and Republicans, America's common threat; The Military Industrial Complex.

Knowledge is power and we need to let American's know of the fraud, waste and abuse the Military Industrial Complex has on our government and politics.
Having pioneered the ShadowNet I have a unique perspective that allows me to push back against the MIC with indisputable facts.
I have submitted official requests to the Congressional Intelligence Committee, Congressmen Devin Nunes, Adam Schiff, Charlie Crist, Gus Bilirakis, Matt Gaetz and the Senate Judicial Committee. The requests all included direct evidence of the ShadowNets connection the Mueller's indictments, as well as a classified briefing to discuss information I cannot disclose without being read-on. 


Other Ways You Can Help
The Fourth Estate is broken worse than I had anticipated. It is my belief, and that of President Trump, that many journalists are little more than sub-contractors for paid influence operations.
I held a Top Secret clearance while pioneering social media "fake news," but use the example of President Trump because he is the highest classification authority, and has access to classified information most everyone else doesn't. Regardless of political ideology or hatred for our president, everyone should want integrity in journalism. 

We can no longer assume the protections provided in the U.S. Constitution to protect the Fourth Estate means the information you should be getting actually gets reported.
Please share this Indiegogo campaign and my website; https://www.VictimOfTheSwamp.com

My first book, "Victim of the Swamp; How the Deep State Destroyed the 40-Year-Old Private" is also available for purchase on Amazon! Click here to follow link. 

I would like to extend a deep and personal thank-you to everyone that has helped me over the last 2 years. I can't do this without you.

story:
My name is Luca DiMatteo and I was a podiatrist for over 25 years. Just over a year and a half ago, I had to retire for health reasons. This left a void in my life. I didn't know who I was anymore. One night, I dreamt of a story that was to become my first novel. As I started writing it, my wife Laura reminded me that I had told her, many years earlier, I wanted to be an author. The more I wrote, the more I found my new focus. Green Haven is my debut novel and it’s also the debut of my new identity.  If you have ever felt lost or unsure of your next move, or know someone who has gone through this, then you will understand

Through writing, I discovered a whole new world of creativity and imagination, but also many hidden costs. It is my dream to create an electronic version as well as a hardcover edition of Green Haven.  While the e-version travels the world, I also wish to place the hardcover edition in as many brick and mortar locations as possible. That means physically printing the books, storing them in a warehouse and then distributing them. All this requires the right people, in the right place, at the right time. That's why I have decided to use a publisher to help me navigate through.  

I used to work in a world where the majority of people didn't use the internet. They hold a book to read it and they don't know how to go online. They go to brick and more establishments to get what they need. I want them to know that Green Haven, a novel is available to them too.

Enter crowdfunding. This type of outreach makes it possible for a passionate idea to become a reality.  The determination we all have to make our dreams come true is a powerful and passionate force.  Ensuring my novel gets out into the world is my passion and I will pursue this dream with everything 

Green Haven is a mystery/suspense novel filled with twists and turns. Cathy Arden, the director of nursing at an upscale nursing facility finds that she is being framed for multiple murders in and around the facility. During the quest to clear her name, she finds that she has fallen asleep in her life. At one time or another, we have all had the feeling of waking up and asking, "what have I been doing?" Three unique storylines merge to tell a tale that will make you laugh, cry, love, hate, and never want it to end.

While Green Haven is fiction, our growing senior population means that almost every one of us will be exposed to this context at one time or another. The characters of Green Haven portray real-life flaws to which we can all relate. Green Haven’s characters unravel and rebuild through emotion and experience just like we do, so don't be surprised if you start seeing a bit of yourself in some of the characters!

This novel has been accepted by a publisher and is ready to proceed to the next step. There are many costs to make this happen. The funds raised from this campaign will be used to publish, market, and distribute Green Haven. The preliminary cost for the first run of one thousand books is between $12,000 and $14,000. My goal is to raise $15,000 so that there is a small cushion for any unforeseen costs.

I have decided to create a flexible campaign so that any funds raised will help to bring Green Haven into the world. I will honor all perks to thank you for your donation. Green Haven will be published. How long it takes to succeed depends on you: your donation is one key, and social sharing is the other.  

I have created multiple social media platforms to drive this campaign. If you can donate, please go one step further and share the Green Haven campaign with all of your networks. If you are unable to donate, you may still be a part of this movement by sharing the campaign in as many places and with as many people as possible. Your voice is a critical part of the campaign; please ask others to check it out, to donate, to post it on your website, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and Linkedin. The Indiegogo tools make sharing easy.

Thank you in advance for helping launch my novel and for allowing me to share my vision with you and the world. I am grateful for your support. 

       No donation is too small and no amount of sharing is too frivolous.  Thank you.

story:
Gifts of Spirit: Animal and their natural gifts - Animal Wisdom Card Deck

Animal Wisdom Deck of Cards for children inspired by my children's books Gifts of Spirit:Animals and their natural gifts

The Campaign 

“The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away. - Pablo Picasso

Hi y’all! Welcome to my campaign! I am Kimberly Heil, the author, artist, art therapist, and creator of Gifts of Spirit: Animals and their natural gifts Animal Card Deck. I am so excited to bring this deck to you and your children!

About the deck :

I was inspired to create this Animal Deck for children inspired by my children's book series Gifts of Spirit: Animals and their natural gifts as a way to continue to invite deeper exploration of the animals, their gifts/attributes, foster quality time with family/friends, and for children to continue to explore and embrace their own gifts they bring to the world.

The cards can be used on their own or with the books. All have their own set of instructional prompts. The books and the animal cards all build upon one another in a supportive, interactive, and fun way!

The deck, as with the books, are meant to grow with the child. They can start off as an animal flash cards,  then develop into a resource which allows for deeper conversations for each child to explore what makes them uniquely themselves, what their gifts are, and to embrace how amazingly awesome they are! 

The cards also offered the opportunity to have deeper conversations with children regarding personal values, strengths, listening, problem solving, and helps to develop deeper insight, spark creative thinking, and personal confidence.

Here are some other ways the cards can be used...

Use the deck to explore and learn each of the animals natural gifts 

Pick a card of the day - in what ways can you practice the lessons/gifts on todays card 

Pick a card when one is needing guidance 

Use the cards to help children identify a strength or characteristic they can embody to help them through an issue they may be experiencing

Use the cards as a conversation starter

The Artwork

The deck highlights expressive portraits of each animal, fun and playful, bright, bold colors, larger images, and easy to read text which I think children will love!

I have worked on this series for three years, researching, observing, documenting, and painting animals. I love nature and am so very excited to bring this deck to life. 

New animals have joined the bunch along with three natural gifts. 

Including...

Peacock and it's gift of radiance, leadership, knowledge 

Whale, Jellyfish, Camel and so many more! 

Deck Specifics : 

My intention is for this deck to become a treasure and beloved resource for your child. 

All decks will come in a beautifully designed rigid box, gold foil will line the edges, and my colorful whimsical animal images adorn the deck. The cards measure 3.5 x 5 inch and includes 34 animal cards along with their natural gifts listed. An additional two cards includes instructions and questions for deeper exploration of the animals and their gifts.

The final box design is nearing completion and I will post when I approve it ! All other aspects of the cards are finished. 

 

 

 

Why Fundraise? 

Due to the expense of the printers along with shipping, I will need to purchase a large quantity of decks. I believe in the printer and the quality of printing they provide. I know that you will all love them too!

Here is a breakdown of costs:

70 % printing

20 % admin 

10 % design development

****************************************************************************************

Stretch Goal **Gifts of Spirit Field Guide**

As I discussed in my video I have a stretch goal of $8,800 to get into production a Gifts of Spirit : Animals and their natural gifts Field Guide! 

This is purely an interactive book where kids get to go out an observe  animals in and around where they live. It's a fun field guide which includes prompts for them to answer, draw, and assign their own gifts to animals. 

The layout is finished, so the extra funding would go towards Graphic design and printers setup. If we reach this goal I will create an incentive that you can add-on to your order! 

Estimated Field Guide Set-up Costs 

$2000 - Design, lay out, proof

$3000- Publishing/Printing 

*****************************************************************************************

                               Thank you all for your support ! 

I hope you will share this with family, friends, neighbors, teachers, schools, camps, anyone you think would love and enjoy this project.

I thank you from the bottom of my heart !

 

Risks and challenges

I do not foresee any challenges or risk with this project. Once the goal is met, the printer is ready to begin. Printing is estimated to take 30 days. All decks will be ready to ship in late November 2018.

 

I have successfully illustrated, written, and self-published two award winning children's books, with the second winning a first place in Best Illustrations.  I am excited to bring this project into the world! I hope you will join me!

Once the goal is met, the printer is ready to begin. Printing is estimated to take 30 days. I hope you will join me!

story:
Summary

Technology is great and has so many benefits, but there's a downside when it steals our time and true social interaction. As a parent, I was inspired to write this story to help start the conversation about balancing screen time with my own kids in a fun and approachable way. We realized other parents and educators can use this story to discuss healthy choices when it comes to screens and other activities that spark creativity and ensure time for physical activity.

We were able to self-publish a limited first run through a Kickstarter campaign. With the positive reception of the first print run, we hope to make this book available to a much wider audience. The flexible funding options with Indiegogo ensures every order will be delivered regardless of whether the target goal is met. Funds raised will help cover the cost of moving this book to the next level (we're working with Friesen Press), in making it available in bookstores across Canada and internationally.

The target audience for this story is young children, and with my husband being a teacher, we've sought input from teacher/librarian friends who sampled the story with the children they work with. The insight of these kids was incredibly helpful and positive! To help this message reach more children, we've geared our Indiegogo campaign to include options where purchased books can be donated to local school libraries or classrooms.

 

What we need and what you get

Our goal is to raise at least $3,000 towards the initial costs to move this book to print and a wide distribution through Friesen Press. Those who order through this campaign will receive a number of reward options that include stickers, bookmarks and coloring pages. Eugene, the illustrator, has also created adorable amigurumi versions of these characters. Those who choose this particular reward level can select the color of their choice for their very own Invisibles amigurumi plushie.

 

Impact

Technology is a significant part of our lives today. In many ways, it’s still new territory for children, particularly in how much it affects development, health, and social interactions. Our hope is to inspire conversation about this unique issue and encourage children to develop healthy habits when it comes to screen time.

 

Risks and Challenges

This is our very first venture into publishing on a wide scale. As we determine each new step, there’s always a degree of uncertainty and risk of not meeting our target goal. We are seeking the expertise and guidance of Friesen Press to help us. Support from you will go a long way in ensuring we reach our goal of sharing this story and its important message with kids and families. Also, with the amigurumi being handcrafted, it may take some time to complete. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We hope you will join us on this journey and we look forward to hearing feedback from the children around you and even your own inner child! Please spread the word around by sharing this project on your social media channels and other contacts. Thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Carolyn Shanti. It took me five years to write this novel, 'Trap, Prey, Lust', about sexual abuse. As a child I was severely sexually abused by my father, who was a successful business man in the fashion industry in London. For years, I knew that there was something deep down inside me that was troubled, but it took years to experience the memories of the abuse and I became ill during that time with post traumatic stress. I have a wonderful doctor who has helped me to recover. It has taken five years to heal and I am deeply aware of all the stages of healing.

In my working life I have been a social worker for over thirty years, working mainly in hospitals helping those who are suffering from debilitating illnesses such as cancer. I have also worked with patients suffering from brain injury and those who are terminally ill. I taught at Melbourne University for four years, teaching social work and social policy. But I wrote many articles and conducted research on social issues in the United Kingdom, Australia and India. I also trained later in my life as a healer and had a healing practice in London for many years, and ran courses for others who wish to train for this profession.

My campaign and mission are very important to me because I have suffered and survived years of sexual abuse. I want to create more awareness globally about the problem and what it means for those who experience this kind of suffering. At the same time, I would like to offer hope, in particular to women, that there is the possibility to heal under medical supervision and in the form of holistic therapies. Now I understand the stages of healing - and denial - I can at least point out the journey of healing to others.

I hope to take the book around the United Kingdom and to other countries who are badly affected by these issues to offer help, awareness, and to encourage people to come forward and make a difference in their own communities. The countries that have the highest statistics are; the United Kingdom, India, Africa, Australia and the United States of America.

Contributors to my crowdfunding campaign will be helping to achieve the publishing objectives to get the book printed and circulated in many countries. Further to that, contributions will make it possible for me to go and speak about the book, to raise awareness and hope to those who suffer. In each place, it is envisioned that each community will be supported by my visit and will rally their own resources to help sufferers in their own towns and cities. I will share my story and talk about the stages of healing and recovery in sexual abuse.

Many people see reports of child abuse in the newspapers and in the media every day, but they do not know what to do, what action to take, often feeling powerless to make a difference. Your contribution will help one person, one survivor, to share, and to make a difference on a global level.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funds raised will go towards the production costs for the paperback book and ebook (editing, proofreading, typesetting, printing, ebook conversion, registration with Nielsen, ISBN allocation etc).

  • It will also contribute to the creation of the website, social media platforms, book cover design and other visual assets. As well as PR and marketing to help spread the word. 

  • Further to the creation of the novel, I will be starting my ‘tour’ in the UK and then branching out to the United States, Australia, Europe, Africa and Asia, to host book signings, talks and seminars, with the aim of reaching out to – and helping – the many people who have suffered sexual abuse. Through sharing my story and experiences, I hope to have a positive impact on those suffering similar to what I have undergone.​

  • If we don’t reach the total goal, we will ensure the book is produced to the highest standard possible and that it is available to buy worldwide, and then look at other ways to reach people who will gain so much from meeting me and hearing about my story person-to-person – beyond the book.

The Impact

Sexual crimes are some of the worst crimes now all over the world. The problems of sexual abuse, abuse of children, sex trafficking, pornography, paedophile groups etc are tragically on the rise. Thousands of people suffer everywhere, and the statistics are rising each year. Individuals who are able and experienced need to take a stand, to make a difference, so that as a global community we are fighting against terrible issues such as these.

  • As a social worker over a period of thirty years, both in hospitals and communities, I worked and wrote articles about social issues. In the United Kingdom and Australia I wrote and published articles on the problem of homelessness and in so doing was able over some five years able to make a difference in the law and making better provision for homeless people.

  • In Australia, I wrote and published a paper on the issue of the care of attempted suicide patients in public hospitals. There was poor follow up for this kind of patient and then I visited hospitals hoping to change the kind of policy and patient procedure. This time of publication and networking did - in the end - make a difference. More staff were added to the programmes to take care of the needs of the patients living in the community.

  • There are numerous projects that I have taken on in my role as a social worker in a senior position where I was able to make a difference. 

  • The social issues we have today in many countries seem enormous. But if we take one step each in changing things then we will be able to make a difference.

Risks & Challenges

  • We understand that there are many crowdfunding projects out there and that we are asking for contributions from people who we may not know personally, but, as a team, we strongly support Carolyn and will continue to support her throughout this entire process and beyond. Our immediate goal is the book production. Beyond that, we realise that Carolyn’s desire to take the book – and her personal story – on tour around the world is a bold and brave decision that will rely on the support of many people.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help in another way - and we'll be very grateful for any help you can offer Carolyn and her publishing team:

  • If you can’t support us by donating, please consider sharing this link with your social media friends and people you are connected with. Every little will help and be appreciated.
  • You can follow Carolyn online: http://www.carolynshanti.com
  • Don’t forget you can also use the Indiegogo share tools!

At the same time, I would like to offer hope, in particular to women, that there is the possibility to heal under medical supervision and in the form of holistic therapies. Now I understand the stages of healing - and denial - I can at least point out the journey of healing to others.
I hope to take the book around the United Kingdom and to other countries who are badly affected by these issues to offer help, awareness, and to encourage people to come forward and make a difference in their own communities. The countries that have the highest statistics are; the United Kingdom, India, Africa, Australia and the United States of America.
Contributors to my crowdfunding campaign will be helping to achieve the publishing objectives to get the book printed and circulated in many countries. Further to that, contributions will make it possible for me to go and speak about the book, to raise awareness and hope to those who suffer. In each place, it is envisioned that each community will be supported by my visit and will rally their own resources to help sufferers in their own towns and cities. I will share my story and talk about the stages of healing and recovery in sexual abuse.
Many people see reports of child abuse in the newspapers and in the media every day, but they do not know what to do, what action to take, often feeling powerless to make a difference. Your contribution will help one person, one survivor, to share, and to make a difference on a global level.
What We Need & What You Get

The funds raised will go towards the production costs for the paperback book and ebook (editing, proofreading, typesetting, printing, ebook conversion, registration with Nielsen, ISBN allocation etc).
It will also contribute to the creation of the website, social media platforms, book cover design and other visual assets. As well as PR and marketing to help spread the word. 
Further to the creation of the novel, I will be starting my ‘tour’ in the UK and then branching out to the United States, Australia, Europe, Africa and Asia, to host book signings, talks and seminars, with the aim of reaching out to – and helping – the many people who have suffered sexual abuse. Through sharing my story and experiences, I hope to have a positive impact on those suffering similar to what I have undergone.​
If we don’t reach the total goal, we will ensure the book is produced to the highest standard possible and that it is available to buy worldwide, and then look at other ways to reach people who will gain so much from meeting me and hearing about my story person-to-person – beyond the book.

The Impact
Sexual crimes are some of the worst crimes now all over the world. The problems of sexual abuse, abuse of children, sex trafficking, pornography, paedophile groups etc are tragically on the rise. Thousands of people suffer everywhere, and the statistics are rising each year. Individuals who are able and experienced need to take a stand, to make a difference, so that as a global community we are fighting against terrible issues such as these.

As a social worker over a period of thirty years, both in hospitals and communities, I worked and wrote articles about social issues. In the United Kingdom and Australia I wrote and published articles on the problem of homelessness and in so doing was able over some five years able to make a difference in the law and making better provision for homeless people.
In Australia, I wrote and published a paper on the issue of the care of attempted suicide patients in public hospitals. There was poor follow up for this kind of patient and then I visited hospitals hoping to change the kind of policy and patient procedure. This time of publication and networking did - in the end - make a difference. More staff were added to the programmes to take care of the needs of the patients living in the community.
There are numerous projects that I have taken on in my role as a social worker in a senior position where I was able to make a difference. 
The social issues we have today in many countries seem enormous. But if we take one step each in changing things then we will be able to make a difference.

Risks & Challenges
We understand that there are many crowdfunding projects out there and that we are asking for contributions from people who we may not know personally, but, as a team, we strongly support Carolyn and will continue to support her throughout this entire process and beyond. Our immediate goal is the book production. Beyond that, we realise that Carolyn’s desire to take the book – and her personal story – on tour around the world is a bold and brave decision that will rely on the support of many people.
Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help in another way - and we'll be very grateful for any help you can offer Carolyn and her publishing team:

If you can’t support us by donating, please consider sharing this link with your social media friends and people you are connected with. Every little will help and be appreciated.
You can follow Carolyn online: http://www.carolynshanti.com

Don’t forget you can also use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

“The stories people tell have a way of taking care of them. If stories come to you, care for them. And learn to give them away where they are needed. Sometimes a person needs a story more than food to stay alive. That is why we put these stories in each other's memories. This is how people care for themselves.”

― Barry López, Crow and Weasel

Sistah’s Speak Volume II (voices of women who are living with HIV) is the working title for the second collection of short fiction, poetry, creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays and visual art from women living with HIV/AIDS. This project seeks to create a space for women to share their stories in their own voice sharing with an opens heart as a vehicle for chronicling your lives. The goal of this project is to empower, supports the soul and uplifts the spirit of women people living with HIV/AIDS. This collection women who are HIV positive share themes of dating, intimate partner violence, reproductive rights, disclosure, who will care for my child if I die, speaking openly about living with HIV, addiction and recovery, loss of relationships and many other issues women face.

What We Need & What You Get

Resources to independently publish Sistah’s Speak Volume II

All-in Branding Package, Custom Logo Design Package, a color palette, typography palette, a Stationery Design Package, a Landing Page Design Package, Blog Design Package, with the inclusion of:

Digital Formatting and Distribution (e-Book)

Paperback Publishing

Hardcover Publishing

Cover Interior customization

Image Insertions

Electronic Proof

One-on-one author support

Online distribution thru Amazon, Barnes & Noble and other book retailers

ISBN assignment

US copyright

Library of Congress Control Number

Google Preview

Book Buyer’s Preview

Promotional materials

The Impact

There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.”

― Maya Angelou, I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings

I have asked myself this question. “How can I use my position, knowledge of publishing, writing, editing, and sharing stories to help create additional contributions to the literary world that is diverse, equitable, and doesn’t just represent the same segment of society it always has since its inception? What concrete actions can I take to make actual change and move beyond the tired conversation we’ve been having for decades about the lack of diversity in publishing?”

“Stories you read when you're the right age never quite leave you. You may forget who wrote them or what the story was called. Sometimes you'll forget precisely what happened, but if a story touches you it will stay with you, haunting the places in your mind that you rarely ever visit.”

― Neil Gaiman, M Is for Magi

Continuing my efforts in self-publishing stories and voices of people living with HIV was the answer. Yours support will allow Not Our Status But Our Stories to speak the voices and stories of those under- represented in publishing. Together will be allow the stories and history of our collective community to be told.

The Impact Sistah’s Speak Volume II will continue to create and build community through publishing where, “A person is a person through other people' strikes an affirmation of one’s humanity through recognition of an ‘other’ in his or her uniqueness and difference. It is a demand for a creative inter-subjective formation in which the ‘other’ becomes a mirror (but only a mirror) for my subjectivity. This idealism suggests to us that humanity is not embedded in my person solely as an individual; my humanity is co-substantively bestowed upon the other and me. Humanity is a quality we owe to each other. We create each other and need to sustain this otherness creation. And if we belong to each other, we participate in our creations: we are because you are, and since you are, I am. The ‘I am’ is not a rigid subject, but a dynamic self-constitution dependent on this otherness creation of relation and distance”.

Other Ways You Can Help

Challenge five of your friends to support this campaign, post this campaign link of your Facebook page, send emails to your social network, and log on the campaign link to post comments.  Spread the word about this project and share it on Twitter so we can raise the GoGo Factor for this project.  Use the share tools to push this project out to your community.

story:
Who am I and why should you care?

I am a happily married momma of 4 children; two adult daughters and two teenagers that I currently have the privilege of homeschooling. I have been passionate about words and stories since I was 10 years old, when my insightful Mom handed me my first journal. She recognized the need in helping a young voice to be heard, if only in the blank pages of a book. 
 

I am now passionate about utilizing the written word to help future generations become men and women of integrity. To that end, I started writing a children's book series where each new book contains an adventure and is wrapped around a single truth or value to be learned. ("Katrina: Growing Wings" was first published in 2008 with a company that has since recently dissolved; hence, I am seeking to republish it on my own.). The concepts of these stories are simple enough for a child to identify with, yet challenging enough for adults to adhere to and it is my hope that they will resonate with all ages.

It is my belief that our readers are intelligent and hungry for someone to show them how to become the best possible version of themselves, while looking out for the interests of others and never forgetting their purpose. I also believe in a world with so many voices calling out to our children and telling them who they are and who they are not, we need to work together to help them find that voice that speaks truth; to help them to become strong individuals of integrity who are willing to fight to be heard.

If this mission appeals to your heart as well, I have several different ways in which you can contribute and I want you to know that there is no small contribution. Every single cent is a huge blessing and greatly appreciated by me and all our future readers!

 

Why the Indiegogo campaign and how can I truly help?

Writing is a labor of love but for years I have put it on the back-burner while I homeschooled and picked up odd part-time jobs to bring in some money for our family. But repeatedly, I would be reminded of my "why" and  it always came back to writing. When I operate in this gift and outlet, I am not the only one who benefits; however, to share what I have written takes more finances and commitment than I have been able to give before. 

But with your contribution and commitment to help this passion serve its purpose, we can get these value-based lessons into other families homes and hearts.

 

  • The necessary numbers-

    • Bowkers- This service is where I obtain ISBN's, the ability to market e-books, create QR codes and protect my work with a US copyright. Since I currently have 3 books to publish and would like to get them printed, as well as available via e-books, the package that best suits my needs is the "Self-Publisher Premier" at $490. If you would like to see specifically what else is included in this package, it is available online. (https://www.myidentifiers.com/Learn_More_About_...)
    • Illustators-I am in process of contacting about 10 illustrators to interview for the position of making the next two books in the "Katrina" series really come to life. I am budgeting $500 per book, ($1000 for the two) but it may be less. There are some incredibly talented people who are new to the field and are looking to cut their teeth on the creative opportunities I believe this book series can provide. I so look forward to this process and others to attain their dreams and goals!
    • Website/Blog/Social media setup-To compete well in this fast-paced world of writing and getting our voice out there, we need to recognize that having a consistent presence is key. To this end, I would like to set up and maintain a virtual presence through blogging and social media. However, since I am notoriously inept at social media, I may hire someone to post in my stead occasionally and keep me in the relevance mode. I am budgeting $500 for the set-up of the website, blog, and PR person.
    • That brings my all-in budget to $1990.  I am seeking to raise $1500 of that here with all of you on Indiegogo.

  • I am happy to invest, but what can I expect in return? 
     

  • I have 4 different levels of contributions available.
    Level 1- The High Flier ($100) (15 available)People who choose to contribute at this level will have:
    *Option to have signed copies of all three books-upon availability-for free.
    *Option to buy copies at 30% off retail price for first 90 days of book being in print.
    *They can choose a name to be written into future books.
    *Signed poster of "Katrina."
    * Mailed "Thank-you" card & social media "Thanks" & recognition.
    *Opportunity to become part of the books' launch team.
    *If there are any aspiring authors at this level: I offer a free critique of your first 5000 words or 5 page pdf file. This includes grammar, vocabulary, story flow, etc.
     
  • Level 2-Spreading our Wings ($50) (25 available)People who choose to contribute at this level will have:
    *Option to have signed copies of all three books upon availability for free.
  • *Option to buy copies at 15% off retail price for first 60 days of book being in print.
    *Social media "Thanks" & recognition.

    Level 3-Caterpillar with a dream ($15) People who choose to contribute at this level will have:
    *Signed book of choice

    Level 4-Raffle (2 available)People who choose to contribute at any level, including 1-3, will have:
    *Opportunity to win signed first edition of "Katrina: Growing Wings" with matching journal.
    *Opportunity to become a part of my launch parties when my books are published.

Risks & Challenges

  • All risk is entirely mine and I will cover any costs that I cannot fund with credit cards; however, this is not ideal. IF I do fall short of my goal, all monies contributed will go towards re-publishing "Katrina: Growing Wings," then to illustrating and publishing the next two books.
  • Some of the challenges I currently face,  outside of the financial,  are finding the right illustrator to bring "Katrina" to life, familiarizing myself with the self-publishing world, and maintaining a social media presence.
  • I have some moderate health challenges that I am seeking to heal.

  • Regardless of the fundraiser outcome, backers will receive their perks as requested, as they become available.

  • Overcoming these challenges: I have a super support system in place, have enrolled in the Self-Publishing School and am being mentored by an amazing author, Marcy Pusey.

 

Other Ways You Can Help
I understand that most of us don't have a mighty expendable income and you may feel like there wouldn't be any way you could be of assistance. But, with all due respect, you couldn't be more wrong! There are some very necessary and practical ways that you could help that wouldn't cost you a cent.

  • Help me get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  •  Use the Indiegogo share tools! Just because I am socially inept when it comes to technology, doesn't mean that I assume you are! Facebook, Twitter, Youtube...whatever your flavor, please share.
  • If you are in the habit of praying for others, I would really appreciate all prayers as I seek to grow in my gifts.

story:
איזה כיף שאתם כאן וקוראים את זה! תודה גדולה לפני הכל!

אני מתרגשת לספר לכם על הספר שכתבתי. ספר שיכול לעזור לכם להבין את עצמכם ואת הילדים שלכם טוב יותר. ספר שיצחיק וירגש אתכם, ובעיקר יגרום לכם להסתכל על ילדים, הורים וחינוך מכיוון חדש ואחר.

מי אני?

אני יפעת, נשואה לערן ואימא לתמר וברק. מנחת הורים בגישה אחרת. מה זה אומר? לתפיסתי, הורות היא הזדמנות ללמידה, גדילה והתפתחות. לכן, כל אתגר שמציבים בפנינו הילדים הוא הזמנה עבורנו להתפתח ולגדול.

יכול להיות שקראתם את הטורים שלי במאקו או שהאזנתם לפודקאסט שלי שנקרא ׳הורימובדים׳. יכול להיות שהייתם במופע שלי או השתתפתם בקורס אונליין או בקבוצות הורים שהנחיתי.

ויכול להיות שאתם בכלל לא מכירים אותי. אז נעים מאד.

בעבר הייתי עורכת דין, יועצת משפטית בשדולת הנשים. למשל, את הבג״צ נגד עסקת הטיעון עם קצב אני כתבתי, כמו גם חוקים לקידום זכויות נשים בעבודה. את התואר השני והדוקטורט עשיתי באוניברסיטת ברקלי בקליפורניה. הדוקטורט שלי הוא על אבות ועל הקושי שלהם לשלב בין עבודה למשפחה. אחרי שנים של פמיניזם וקידום זכויות נשים, כתבתי על אבות וגיליתי עולם מורכב ומרתק. כשסיימתי את הדוקטורט לימדתי באוניברסיטאות ובמכללות בארץ, פרסמתי מאמרים על שילוב בין עבודה למשפחה ונהניתי מאד.

ואז, במקרה, מצאתי את עצמי בקבוצת הורים ובאמצע התהליך משהו מטלטל קרה לי.

הרגשתי שכאילו זז המסך ואני מצליחה לראות מה שלא ראיתי קודם. פתאום הבנתי שלילדים יש שפה שדרכה הם מנסים להעביר לנו מסרים. אם אנחנו לא מבינים את המסר, הם יצעקו אותו, יצרחו, ישתמשו בכל הכלים האפשריים שלהם כדי שנקשיב. הבנתי גם שהאתגרים שהילדים מציבים בפנינו הם שיקוף שלנו עצמנו, של מה שלא פתור אצלנו, ויש לנו בחירה: לכעוס ולהתלונן, או לפתח מודעות ולגדול.

כדי להתפתח בעצמי, נרשמתי ללימודי הדרכת הורים ב״בית למקצועות ההורות״ שהקימה ומנהלת גנית פרג. מאז אני מלמדת עוד הורים לפענח את השפה של הילדים שלהם ולהשתמש באתגרים כדי לגלות עוד על עצמם, ולגדול יחד.

אז על מה הספר?

הספר הזה ינסה לשכנע אתכם שההתנהגות של הילדים שלכם נועדה כדי לשדר לכם מסר. איזה מסר, אתם ודאי שואלים. ואם יש להם מסר, למה הוא כל כך לא ברור? למה הוא כל כך מרגיז וקולני לפעמים? חשבו על המסר של הילדים כעל צופן מורס שאין לכם מושג כרגע מה הוא אומר. הספר הזה ינסה לפענח אתכם את צופן המורס הזה ולעזור לכם לראות באיזה אופן ההתנהגות של הילדים נוגעת בעצבים החשופים שלכם. רובכם פיתחתם במהלך השנים מנגנונים כל כך מוצלחים להדחיק, להסתיר, להסוות. ומאז שנולדו הילדים הם מאתגרים את המנגנונים הללו. וזה קשה. זה מערער.

אבל זו המתנה שלכם. הילדים שלכם כאן כדי להעיר אתכם (לא רק סימבולי... הם גם יעירו אתכם הרבה, במיוחד בשנים הראשונות). למה זו מתנה, אתם אולי שואלים, אנחנו אוהבים לישון, מכוסים במנגנוני ההגנה שבנינו, סביבנו חומות בצורות. זו מתנה בדיוק מהסיבות הללו: כדי להתעורר, לפרק את מנגנוני ההגנה (אל דאגה, יישארו עוד כמה), לנתץ את החומות. להיכנס אל העולם הזה מחדש, אבל באופן שונה. פתוח יותר.

אז כמו שהבנתם, הספר הוא עלינו. הוא עוסק בהורות וחינוך מכיוון שונה מהרגיל, מכיוון של התפתחות אישית. מה שכתוב בספר מבוסס על הניסיון שלי כמנחת הורים אבל לא רק. הוא כולל את התובנות שפיתחתי במהלך השנים בכל התחנות שעברתי בדרך, הן בחיי האישיים והן בחיי המקצועיים. בנוסף, הוא כולל דוגמאות אמיתיות מחיים של הורים אמיתיים שהנחיתי.

הוא כתוב באופן משעשע כי הומור זו הדרך שלי להעביר מסרים, אני לא יכולה אחרת. הוא גם פרקטי, כי אני אישה פרקטית. הספר כולל עצות ורעיונות שניתן ליישם בבית באופן מיידי ולראות את הקסם שמתרחש.

הספר כולל תמהיל מרתק של שיתוף אישי וחושפני לצד טיפים פרקטיים, תוך כדי ערעור חלק מהתפיסות החברתיות העמוקות שהושרשו אצלנו במשך דורות.  כל אימא או אבא ימצאו את עצמם בין השורות כי מה שגיליתי לאורך השנים זה שאנחנו בסך הכל מתמודדים עם אתגרים דומים.

הנה חלק מהנושאים בהם יעסוק הספר:

* התמודדות עם התקפי זעם, כעס ועצב של הילדים

*מריבות אחים

*ההורות של היום לעומת ההורות של פעם

*איומים ועונשים

*פנטזיות לעומת מציאות

עבור מי מיועד הספר?

הספר מיועד להורים שמוכנים לשאול שאלות על דרך החינוך המקובלת ועל האופן שבו גידלו אותם. הורים שלא מקבלים כלום כמובן מאליו ויהיו מוכנים לערער לעיתים על המוסכמות גם במחיר של לאבד את התדמית ״הנחמדה״. הורים שמרגישים שהתקשורת בינם לבין הילדים לא טובה כמו שהיו רוצים, שמנסים להבין מה בדיוק לא עובד ואיך אפשר לשפר את המצב. הורים שמוכנים לחפור עמוק, גם בידיעה שמה שימצאו יהיה אולי קשה בהתחלה. הורים שמוכנים להיענות לאתגר האישי ולא מפחדים לעשות שינויים.  

וכאן אתם נכנסים לפעולה:

כדי שהספר ייצא לאור אני צריכה את תמיכתכם, המורלית והכספית. כל סכום יושקע בתהליך הוצאת הספר, משלבי העריכה וההגהה הלשונית ועד שלבי העימוד וההדפסה. 

בשביל זה הכנתי לכם תשורות מדהימות!

אתם קונים את התשורות עבורכם או עבור אנשים שיקרים לכם, וכך מסייעים לספר לצאת לאור!

הכנתי מבחר של אפשרויות שתוכלו לבחור מתוכו, מקניית הספר עצמו לכשייצא (דיגיטלי או מודפס) ועד שיעורים אינטרנטיים ממוקדים על נושאים ספציפיים או קורס דיגיטלי שלם ו/או ושיחות ייעוץ אישיות איתי.

ניתן לבחור כמה תשורות שאתם רוצים, עבורכם ועבור הורים אחרים.

מעבר לכך, אני ממש אודה לכם אם תוכלו להפיץ את הבשורה בקרב חברים ואנשים שאתם מכירים וחושבים שיוכלו למצוא בכך עניין.

זכות גדולה נפלה בחלקי להעביר הלאה את הידע והתובנות שלי כדי לעזור לעוד הורים ועוד ילדים. כל תמיכה שלכם תהיה עוד צעד בדרך שלנו לשנות את העולם ולהפוך אותו לטוב יותר עבור כולנו.

תודה ענקית מכל הלב! אני מעריכה מאוד את זה שקראתם עד לפה ואת התמיכה שלכם.

הנה לינק לאתר שלי, תוכלו למצוא בו הרבה חומר טוב: 

https://www.courageous-parenting.com/

story:
What is "Goodnight Fort Smith?"

"Goodnight Fort Smith" is a children's book by Maestro John Jeter that takes readers on a tour of the historical landmarks and cultural attractions in Fort Smith, Arkansas. Its pages feature stunning images by local photographer Melissa Harms. Storybook Strings is publishing "Goodnight Fort Smith" in full color, hardback, with an enclosed CD that features Storybook Strings' original music performed with a narration of the book.

Who is Storybook Strings?

Storybook Strings (www.storybookstrings.com) is a musical group performing for children and families in educational venues throughout western Arkansas.

The highlight of each Storybook Strings concert is our musical interpretation of children's literature. "The World's Greatest Storybook Reader," Mr. Jim Loyd, reads popular children's books while four musicians accompany the stories with original music on violin, viola, cello, and double bass. Each story has a different musical style, with roots in boogie-woogie, classical, hip hop, Latin, folk, and movie music.

Founded in 2013, Storybook Strings is a member of the Arkansas Arts Council's "Arts on Tour" roster. Our members maintain diverse musical careers in schools, orchestras, churches, and jazz/bluegrass combos of northwest Arkansas and the Arkansas River valley.

How will my contributions be spent?

Our goal of $1350 covers the cost of an ISBN number, the copyright process, and 50 hardback copies of "Goodnight Fort Smith." Each book is printed on heavy, glossy paper, and includes a CD of the music written and performed with the narrative by Storybook Strings.

If we exceed our $1350 goal, or if demand exceeds 50 copies, profits from this book will be divided between Storybook Strings and the Fort Smith Symphony. The Fort Smith Symphony is Arkansas' oldest professional symphony orchestra, with a vibrant school outreach program that brings live music to children in grades 3-6 at more than 40 schools each year.

How can I get a copy of "Goodnight Fort Smith?"

  • Contributors at $50 or above will receive an advance copy of "Goodnight Fort Smith," with a CD of Storybook Strings narrating the book, accompanied by original music.
  • Contributors at $100 or above will receive the book, the accompanying CD, AND a gift copy of Storybook Strings' debut album, "First Edition."
  • After publication, "Goodnight Fort Smith" will be available for purchase at concerts, on the Storybook Strings website, and at bookstores and events around Fort Smith, AR.

How can I help?

We appreciate every financial contribution we receive! However, a successful crowdfunding campaign depends not only on your contributions, but also on your help in spreading the word about our project.

  • Share this campaign with your friends! If you want to see "Goodnight Fort Smith" in schools, libraries, and homes, you're probably not alone. Your friends might want to help, too!
  • Find us on social media! We want to keep you in the loop not only about this project, but also about upcoming concerts and future creative endeavors.

Thank you for your support!

Storybook Strings is publishing "Goodnight Fort Smith" in full color, hardback, with an enclosed CD that features Storybook Strings' original music performed with a narration of the book.


Who is Storybook Strings?

 Storybook Strings (www.storybookstrings.com) is a musical group performing for children and families in educational venues throughout western Arkansas.
The highlight of each Storybook Strings concert is our musical interpretation of children's literature. "The World's Greatest Storybook Reader," Mr. Jim Loyd, reads popular children's books while four musicians accompany the stories with original music on violin, viola, cello, and double bass. Each story has a different musical style, with roots in boogie-woogie, classical, hip hop, Latin, folk, and movie music.
Founded in 2013, Storybook Strings is a member of the Arkansas Arts Council's "Arts on Tour" roster. Our members maintain diverse musical careers in schools, orchestras, churches, and jazz/bluegrass combos of northwest Arkansas and the Arkansas River valley.
    How will my contributions be spent? Our goal of $1350 covers the cost of an ISBN number, the copyright process, and 50 hardback copies of "Goodnight Fort Smith." Each book is printed on heavy, glossy paper, and includes a CD of the music written and performed with the narrative by Storybook Strings.
If we exceed our $1350 goal, or if demand exceeds 50 copies, profits from this book will be divided between Storybook Strings and the Fort Smith Symphony. The Fort Smith Symphony is Arkansas' oldest professional symphony orchestra, with a vibrant school outreach program that brings live music to children in grades 3-6 at more than 40 schools each year.
    How can I get a copy of "Goodnight Fort Smith?" 

Contributors at $50 or above will receive an advance copy of "Goodnight Fort Smith," with a CD of Storybook Strings narrating the book, accompanied by original music.
 
Contributors at $100 or above will receive the book, the accompanying CD, AND a gift copy of Storybook Strings' debut album, "First Edition." 
After publication, "Goodnight Fort Smith" will be available for purchase at concerts, on the Storybook Strings website, and at bookstores and events around Fort Smith, AR.    How can I help? We appreciate every financial contribution we receive! However, a successful crowdfunding campaign depends not only on your contributions, but also on your help in spreading the word about our project.  
Share this campaign with your friends! If you want to see "Goodnight Fort Smith" in schools, libraries, and homes, you're probably not alone. Your friends might want to help, too! 
Find us on social media! We want to keep you in the loop not only about this project, but also about upcoming concerts and future creative endeavors.   Thank you for your support!

story:
Dear LeVan D. Hawkins,

Congratulations. You have been accepted into the Quarry at Marble House Project.  We received many applications and the process was extremely competitive.  We were thrilled to have the opportunity to view your selection of artistic work and at this time we would like to offer you a residency at Marble House Project for our 2016 season. The residency session we would like to offer you is:  September 26th – October 14th 2016

-------

What an excellent time for this residency!  In a few days, my book proposal, written to attract an agent for my book, What Men Do, will be completed.  Doing the proposal has helped me create a strong structure for my book.  New scenes and memories came to me every day.  I completed a rough draft last November.  I’m looking forward to working on a rough draft of the book at Marble House and returning home with that momentum. 

I have been working on this book since I first attended Antioch University – LA in June 2009. I received my MFA in June of 2011. A draft of What Men Do was my creative thesis.  What Men Do is a familial love story, an unlikely relationship between me and my oldest nephew who I didn’t meet until he was twenty-seven.  Upon our first meeting, he snarled and deemed me “bourgeois (or more accurately, ‘bourgie’)” In my mind, I called him “ghetto.”  What Men Do addresses issues of class conflict in urban communities, mentoring, masculinity, fatherless sons, family obligations, and race.  I call it a family saga with sociological underpinnings. 

I’m excited about the great response I’ve received from writers I respect and from the various workshops and residencies like Marble House Project who have invited me to attend as result of sending in various chapters from What Men Do. I have worked on this book for seven years.  Seven years! I’ve read about other writers working on a book that long but never thought I had the patience.  Now, I know I’m in it until it’s done.

Marble House Project’s website is at www.marblehouseproject.org.  It’s a beautiful estate and looks so peaceful, I am uplifted every time I look at the pictures.  In the eighteen days, I am there, I will have the opportunity to get important work done. And clear my mind.  This year has been tremendously stressful financially and emotionally.  I’m trying to integrate as much possible my creative life with the life of a caregiver. That’s difficult but not impossible. It’s all about focus, organization, discipline, and time management in the face of challenge. Despite my success, I know it’s time for me to get away for a while. My brother will take on more duties and I have someone who will take my place while I’m gone. I need extra funds for that in addition to travel, food and entertainment, and incidentals so I’m looking for help from my friends, family, fans of my work, and friends of the arts. 

Thanks for reading.

story:
Womby’s School for Wayward Witches—In Audiobook Format

Hi, I’m Sarina Dorie, a fantasy and science fiction author. I also write mystery, romance and humor, and have sold over 150 short stories to magazines. I have over 40 novels published.

By day, I’m a public-school art teacher, artist, belly dance performer and instructor, fashion designer, and a few other things. By night, I write.

My most popular novels are from Womby’s School for Wayward Witches Series. Not only is the Womby’s series a fun cozy mystery for witch lovers everywhere, but it will expose you to what it’s like to be an art teacher in a public-school setting: overcrowded classrooms, budget cuts, and plenty of drama and awkward situations.

(I'm quite certain, that's a portrait of me as a teacher.)

Why Put the Fun Back into Funerals—er—Fundraising?

I’m often asked why I don’t have an audiobook for my entire series yet. While I love the enthusiasm of my fans, the simple explanation is that producing an audiobook is costly and all that money is needed upfront. As a school teacher, there’s no way I can afford to produce an eighteen-book series of audiobooks by myself, so I need your help!

Why Audiobooks?

Besides the demand of my fans, the reason I’m enthusiastic about audiobooks as a medium for telling my stories is because it makes them more accessible, especially for those with disabilities.

After my concussion (resulting in a traumatic brain injury), I discovered how aggravating not being able to read or use computers could be, and I can only imagine how frustrating that must be for people who are permanently disabled.

My dream is to make my hex-positive, witchy mystery novels available to every eager reader, regardless of format. The first step to that goal is making an audiobook.

Additionally, as part of this fundraiser, I am including ways to donate to the Talking Book and Braille Library to help provide more materials to more people who need them.

Thank you for helping make that dream a reality!

 

What You Get

I am super thankful to Indiegogo donors and my readers for helping me raise funds for the first book in the series. I raised $1,309, enough to produce the first audiobook. I estimate the audiobook of Tardy Bells and Witches’ Spells will be ready later in March.

If I can raise another $1500, I can produce the second book in the series.

As a ‘thank you’ for donating, I have many fun presents or “perks” you can choose from:

  • Books in audio format prior to them being published on Audible.
  • Books not yet released on Amazon like The Vega Bloodmire Cozy Witch Mystery Series’ first book, Ghoulish Charms offered in EPUB, PDF, and MOBI formats.
  • The Felix Thatch Hex Files Mysteries (not yet released) offered in EPUB, PDF, and MOBI formats.
  • Original art create by the author for book covers.
  • Witch-related grab bags, notepads, stickers, or other items.
  • SECRET PERKS! I only offer these to fans who are already on my newsletter. They are not open to the public, so sign up for my newsletter and stay tuned for details. Sign up by clicking HERE.

To check out the currently available perks, view them in the sidebar. Each day I will release a new perk!

Funny Story

Sometimes people ask me why I don’t do the audiobook narration myself. Short answer? I’m a writer, and my time is best spent writing.

Longer, funnier answer? I did try. To see that video, click HERE I couldn’t get Thatch’s Received Pronunciation British accent right to save my life. That’s why a professional should do it. Trust me, it’s better for you and me.

Also, I’m very much like Clarissa. Anything electronic I touch breaks (while miraculously working again when my husband inspects it—he’s a Morty and doesn’t believe in magic.)

The Impact

With your contribution:

  • You will help enrich the lives of others through literacy. Or at the very least, entertain them with hex-positive books.
  • You will make these books available for those who listen to audiobooks for their source of literature due to preference, literacy level, or vision impairment.
  • For every patron who participates in this fundraiser, I will donate $1 to the Talking Books and Braille Library. Additionally, you can choose that perk from the sidebar or donate to them directly using the link at the bottom of the page.
  • Help me make a living doing what I love—teaching, art, and writing. The picture below sums up my life effectively.

How to Mitigate Challenges with a Merlin-class Celestor

For you, as a reader, your biggest risk is investing in a project and hating a narrator’s voice—and not wanting to listen to the books afterwards. As an audiobook listener myself, I know how that is. Some narrators have made me wince with their shrill voices or forceful speech patterns.

Unfortunately Alan Rickman is no longer available to narrate—may he rest in peace—and we all have different tastes.

Fortunately for listeners, I am picky and have champagne tastes, just like Vega Bloodmire. I will only use someone who is the Merlin-class Celestor of audiobook narrators and reads with magic. I am pleased with the narrator I interviewed and put through rounds of testing.

I think you will be too!

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand not everyone will be able to contribute financially, and that’s fine. There are other ways you can help!

  • Sign up for my mailing list. That way I can keep you up to date on my progress, new releases, and when I have giveaways: http://eepurl.com/dEd4oL
  • If you are enrolled in Kindle Unlimited, you can get the entire series for free as part of that program. Authors get paid for every page read in KU, so read them all!
  • Leave an honest review on Amazon. This helps create author credibility, boosts ranking, and helps new readers know what to expect. Your opinions matter and help other readers find the books they cherish.
  • Share the books with a friend, book club, or on social media. My Facebook page is: https://www.facebook.com/sarina.dorie1/ Share away!
  • Donate directly to initiatives to help those with reading impairments. For the Talking Books and Braille Library, go here: https://apps.oregon.gov/ECommerce/TBABS/

story:
We need your help to complete the first phase of our project, the printing of the first book of the series Defenders of the Land of Dreams. 

Each contribution will provide a child in a public school system in Atlanta, GA with a copy of the book.

"Defenders of the Land of Dreams: Custodians of the Golden Armor" is a book that aims to show parents and children how to fight sadness and depression with a fresh dose of self-esteem and love for the others.  

Halfway of the book, we included a prayer that could be used by children of any belief or religion to obtain the necessary strength to find their place in life and be light for all those who still live in darkness.

All contributors will receive an autographed hardcopy special edition of the book and for all those participating on the Save The Kindom perk, the book will be accompanied by a framed and autographed version of the Legion of Dreams's Prayer.

 

"Help us spread the word and bring our message to the children who might need it"

 

 

The Legion of Dreams's Prayer

This is me.

In moments of fear, I am courageous.

In moments of weakness, I am strong.

In moments of darkness, I am light.

And with that light, I guide the steps of those who cannot see for themselves, and I go to meet those who are lost to help them find their way.

 

With my dreams as a flag,

and love as shield and sword,

I face and defeat my fears,

so all those around me never lose hope.

 

I am one with my dreams,

and my dreams will guide me to be better every day.

 

So be it.
