story:
Executive Summary
Book & Foundation Launch

This campaign is a lot more than just funding another book or business.

This is about starting something that can change everything.

I am here because, after studying our greatest minds through history, I found something truly important that can really help a lot of people and our society. 

I really need your help to bring it to the world.

(You can learn more about the books in the second video and on https://7Way.Me)

Do You:

  • Wish to Know Why You Are Here & The Meaning of Life?
  • Dream About Being Healthy, Happy & Successful?
  • Regret Not Finishing or Doing Things Well?
  • Desire Lasting Positive Relationships & Families?
  • Want to Know What to Do Every Day to Be Your Best?
  • Hope to Be Influential, Significant, & Make a Real Positive Difference in the World?
  • Need to Find that Missing Piece or a Total Solution?

If you answered Yes to any of these questions you need:  The Way

(See Many More Questions Answered within The Way below and here: https://7way.me/the-way/what-you-will-learn-que...)

The problem is that if you are to be your best, live a meaningful life and make a real difference in the world, you need to integrate a wide variety of vital information into your life as quickly as possible.

This is why The Way was created.

If The Way is the answer or even contains part of the solution that you have been seeking, you don’t want to let this opportunity slip by and always wonder who you could have been.

So, the question is will you take this opportunity to look a little deeper?

You Found The Way at this Critical Moment for a Very Important Reason.

So Why Not Take Moment and Learn More?

You have Nothing to Lose and Everything to Gain.

I discovered The Way on April 3, 2015, while sorting the beginning and the ending of another book I have been working on for over 30 years covering how to be our best in all facets of life.
I keep finding my references to "this is key to true success," and once I put the "7 keys" together in the right order, it was like a secret code got unlocked, and I discovered The Way.  After this discovery, I wrote for 3 days straight without much sleep or doing anything else. I then worked over the next 5 years to finish the book. (You can learn more about The Way in the second video above, within the text below and on our website: https://7Way.Me)

I know The Way claims to cover many topics that may sound too good to be true. I was right there with you. I could not believe what I found. However, sometimes, big discoveries do happen. This is something where the truth of it cannot be denied.  The people I have shared the book with so far have expressed to me the positive impact it has had on their lives and how grateful they are for these new perspectives.  They love the book and believe it will help a lot of people. You can see the testimonials within the campaign text and on our website, https://7Way.Me. The Way is not just another book nor The 7th Foundation just another company. This is a discovery and organization that can change everything in a very positive way, very quickly.  


Key Facts:

  1. The Way has a publisher and is being released in spring 2020.
  2. Its Life Manual and Child & Family Guide have been written, are in editing, and are due late 2020 or early 2021.
  3. At LEVEL 1: $15,000 we can cover 3 months of basic marketing and publicity for The Way.
  4. At Levels 2 and above ($150,000) we can work to:
    • Cover more publicity and marketing opportunities regarding the first book.
    • Publish, market, and promote volume 2 and 3.
    • Establish The 7th Foundation that will support everything.
    • Create audio-books, courses, certifications, training materials, apps, other books, and much more!

The goal of this campaign is to give The Way and The 7th Foundation the great launch they deserve. With your help, we will make this happen! Below are more details on the campaign.

Please Visit https://7Way.Me for information on the books, foundation, author, mission, and movement. 

I'm sorry I could not spend a lot of money and time creating a slick information page and videos like some others. I simply don't have the time or resources. If I did, I probably would not need to be here asking for your help ;-)

If You Can't Fund this Project, Please Help Spread the Word!!

 

 

Why Do We Need
The Funding?

As you may or may not know, publishing, marketing, and publicizing a book is expensive and Publishers do not provide much support unless you are famous. Instead, they expect the author to do virtually everything. Add on the creation of a company, courses, videos, social media management, additional content, events and all the rest, and it becomes even more expensive. While the last 5 years have not been easy, I have gained strength by keeping my eye on the goal. The truth is that the time is short and the need is great, and I can't do everything by myself.
I need your help so I can hire professionals who can give The Way and The 7th Foundation the great launch they deserve. With your help, we will make this happen! 

Higher levels of funding simply mean we can grow bigger, better, and faster! There is no amount of funding that would be too much or go to waste. You can learn more and give directly on our website  https://7Way.Me

How Much is Needed &
How Will it Be Used?

 

Level 1:  $15,000

$9,000: Publicity and Marketing Traditional & Online Media (TV, Radio, Magazines, Podcasts, etc.): $3000 per month for 3 months. The firm we are using has over 30 years' experience and is very well connected.

$1800: Promotions & Ads: Amazon, Choosy Bookworm, Book Gorilla, Pixel of Ink, Library Thing, GoodReads, Worldcat, GoogleBooks, ABA Buyers Guide, & more. $600 a month for 3 months.

$3000: Tax @15%

$1200: Crowdfunding Platform Fee @ 8% (5% Plus 2.9 processing, plus $0.20 per pledge transaction)

$15K to $150k:  All funds up to the next level will be used to pay taxes on that amount, further promote the first book and prepare the next volumes.

Additional Publicity, Marketing & Products Oppourintines Looking to Cover: Below is a list of other publicity, marketing, and products we can cover and create with more funding. The goal is to go wide to reach the most people while we get the most "bang for the buck" as they say. In the levels below, all PR and Marketing spending reference this list. The main PR firm we are using has over 30 years' experience and is very well connected. Other help comes from various vendors who are also at the top of what they do.

  • Continued Podcast, Radio, TV & Print Publicity & Advertising Campaigns.
  • Online & Print Review Campaigns
  • Social Media, Influencer, Fan, Tribe & Movement Building Campaigns
  • Content Marketing Campaigns
  • Billboard & Airport Store Campaigns
  • Public, Professional & Librarian Review Outreach
  • Testimonial & Quote Outreach
  • Book Store, Specialty Shop, Supermarket & Military Base Store Marketing
  • International Public, Prison & University Library Campaigns
  • Meetups, Events & Networking Coordination
  • Online/Physical Book Tours & Signings
  • Opt-in Email Marketing and Book Giveaways
  • Youth, Recovery, Peace & Help Organization Outreach.
  • Promotions & Ads: Amazon, Choosy Bookworm, Book Gorilla, Pixel of Ink, Library Thing, GoodReads, Worldcat, GoogleBooks, ABA Buyers Guide, & more.
  • Book Club, Fair, & Book Blog Outreach.
  • Promotional Discounted Days & Discount Club Promotions.
  • Development & Sale of Promotional Products
  • Creation of Audio Book, Translations, Videos, Training, Courses, and more

Level 2: $150,000

$39,250: Launch the first book with an even more powerful campaign: (see the additional list above for the opportunities we will go after.)

$37,000: Edit the 2nd & 3rd volumes. The two books together are currently about 217,000 words. This will change as edited, but it gives us a good starting point. Below are the average costs. Actual costs will vary depending on the editor. It could be doubled for high-level talent.

    • $17,360: 1 round of Developmental editing. $0.08 per word x 217,000 = $17,360.
    • $11,718: 3 rounds of Copy Editing. $0.018 x 217,000=3906.  $3906.0 x 3 =$11718.
    • $7356.30: 3 rounds of Proofreading. $0.0113 x 217000 = $2452.1  3 x 2452.1= $7356.3

    • $17,360: 1 round of Developmental editing. $0.08 per word x 217,000 = $17,360.

That being said, because of the content, they also will appeal to fans. Here we will be able to do joint promotion but also promote each book separately.

Level 4: 1Million+

1Million+ will mean we can do everything listed above better and faster. It will also mean we can:

  • Professionally record the audiobooks
  • Go international with all the books.
  • Create multi-language translations in print and audio
  • Create higher grade materials, courses, videos, and more.
  • Hire people to work at key positions within The 7th Foundation

There is so much more planned I can't list it here. Know that there is no amount of funding that is too much or that would be wasted. All it would mean is that we can do more, faster, and for a longer period of time. Ultimately we are creating an institution to last through the ages. With your help, we can get this started. If you would like to invest, sponsor, or donate directly, please go to our website and contact us.

You Can Make A Real Difference!

Help Us Help You & Others

Help Spread the Word!

 

Information on Rewards

VIP vs. Value Added: We are offering more valuable, longer-term rewards to everyone who helps us. You can see what "All First Funders Will Receive" Below. We have limited physical gifts to higher-level rewards and offer 2 options. This will allow more time and money for the project. 

  • The VIP Rewards do not include a complex reward; thus, saving us time and money.
  • The Value-Added can include extras like signed first edition copies.

Please remember that we are required to remove at least 23% in taxes and crowdfunding fees on all money collected through a crowdfunding platform. On top of all that, rewards require us to take even more time and money way from this project. If you wish to gift us without us having to incur taxes and fees, you can donate directly on our website. These donations are given without any expectation of reward. The savings of 20% can make a big difference! So please support us here and look to donate on our site, if possible.

All First Funders Will Receive:

We will add your name and/or organization and a link to your profile or site if appropriate. We will only do this with your approval. If you wish to stay anonymous, we will honor you by listing you as Anonymous. See 7Way.me/the-wall-of-heroes. Once we grow large enough and have a physical location, we can also create an actual Wall of Heroes with all these names, so our founding funders are always honored and never forgotten.
  • Inner Circle Membership: If you help us out during our startup phase, you are a founding funder, a first follower, and an invaluable member of our team. This means if you help us, you can receive VIP treatment and special access to all we offer as we grow.
  • Future Rewards: While, as noted above, we can't be super generous now, we will make up it up to you! This is not a one-off project. We are building a foundation to make positive changes and last through the ages. We will have a lot of offerings and strategic partnerships that will benefit you. Being a member of the Inner Circle entitles you special consideration. You will get deals, early access, and so much more. You will be automatically entered into giveaways and sweepstakes where you can win cool free stuff and VIP access. The value of what you redeem over time is much greater than anything we could offer now, even being generous. You will not be forgotten! Instead of a small token now, you can be rewarded over a lifetime.

GF&PE, Wall of Heroes, Rewards Note: Within each funding level, you will see references to GF&PE, Wall of Heroes, Rewards. Because space is limited, we cant add each one separately nor write the full names. So please know that when you see GF&PE, Wall of Heroes, Rewards, it refers to what is described below.

Additional Rewards

Digital Books: The Way digital version will be available during the spring release 2020. The Life Manual and The Child & Family Guide digital version will be available at release late 2020 or early 2021. Due to limited room within the pledge text, you may see gifts combined as in: "Digitial Life Manual/Child Guid" or "Digital Way, Manual, Guide" to indicate you will receive both versions or all three. 

Collector Edition - Reward - 1st Addition Signed Hardcover: Some rewards include signed copies. It's important to note that there will be a very limited number of 1st Additions signed. Your version will come from the first printings and among the first to ever be signed. It will also be stamped, noting you as a first funder. These collectors edition copies will be among the most valuable. Free Shipping in the continental USA Only- all other locations will be charged shipping separately. Time with Andrew:  A couple of high-level pledge levels gift time with the Author of The Way and creator of the 7th Foundation. You can split the hours as you wish. The meetings are to take place online or over the phone and must be set up in advance during normal business hours pacific time, USA. You can use these sessions to get advice on your life and/or organization. You can discuss current events or anything that you need help or insight on. Sessions with Andrew can start to be claimed one month after The Way has been released.

Learn More About The Books

Note: The second video at the top of the campaign is an introduction to The Way. Also please visit https://7Way.Me for more information.

Welcome and peace. Thank you for reading. The Way is not about me. It was written because I discovered something truly important that can help a lot of people and our society. I really help you and our world. .

How Can You Achieve The Primary Goal of Life?

Do You:

  • Wish to Know Why You Are Here & The Meaning of Life?
  • Dream About Being Healthy, Happy & Successful?
  • Regret Not Finishing or Doing Things Well?
  • Desire Lasting Positive Relationships & Families?
  • Want to Know What to Do Every Day to Be Your Best?
  • Hope to Be Influential, Significant, & Make a Real Positive Difference in the World?
  • Need to Find that Missing Piece or a Total Solution?

If you answered Yes to any of these questions you need: The Way

The problem is that if you are to be your best, live a meaningful life and make a real difference in the world, you need to integrate a wide variety of vital information into your life as quickly as possible. This is why The Way was created. If The Way is the answer or even has part of the answer you have been seeking, you don’t want to let this opportunity slip by and always wonder who you could have been.

You Found The Way at this Critical Moment for a Very Important Reason

So Why Not Take Moment and Learn More?

You have Nothing to Lose & Everything to Gain

 

 

I discovered The Way on April 3, 2015, while sorting the beginning and the ending of “The Book” I have been working on for over 30 years covering how to be our best physically, mentally, emotionally, spiritually, financially, in relationships, as a family, and in society. Within “The Book” and its “4 Pillars” of “Self,” “Society,” “Universe,” and “God,” I found my notes referring the “Keys” to “True Success.”

When I collected them all and put the “7 Keys” together in the right order, it was like a secret code got unlocked, and I discovered The Way. After this discovery, I wrote for three days straight without much sleep or doing anything else. I then worked over the next five years to finish the book at the exclusion of most other things. The Way is the book I wish I found at the start of my quest. It is a positive message that can help a lot of people and possibly change everything.

Since this discovery, I have been compelled to get this message out in as many ways as possible. The ultimate goal of The Way, The 7th Foundation, The Movement, and everything else that will follow, is to be a catalyst that spurs meaningful positive change within people's lives and our society to create a world of lasting peace and happiness that everyone can enjoy.

Know that this was not the work of one person, a few, or even a team. The Way is the collective work of humanity and took thousands of years to create. The solution, I have named The Way, was only made possible because I was able to join the knowledge and wisdom from our most celebrated minds throughout the ages. To be clear, this is not about me; it’s about the message.

 

The Way Answers
Many Important Questions

Some are Listed Below.  
There are many, many more.

1. What is your purpose?
2. What is the meaning of life?
3. Why are you here?
4. How can you be significant, influential, and make a real positive difference in the world?
5. What is the difference between Success and True Success?
6. How can you become your True Self and be Truly Successful?
7. How do we end hate and bridge the divide?
8. How do we find the truth and create real understanding?
9. How do we find hope and build a future all of us can be rightly proud of?
10. How can we create a world of happiness and peace?
11. How can you become the best person you can be mentally, physically, emotionally, spiritually, financially, within relationships, your family and society?
12. What is the human condition and does it affect your fate/destiny?
13. What is a belief system/moral code and how does it determine your fate/destiny?
14. What are the 10 Laws that make up a core value system that can guide you throughout life?
15. What is life and why should you care about it?
16. How do you care for life and our world?
17. How should you treat other people?
18. What does equality mean and why does it matter to you?
19. How can we unify faith in God with philosophy, the humanities, and science?
20. What are the soul, spirit, and heaven?
21. What is religion and how can they be unified?
22. If you believe in God, how are you judged and how do you get to Heaven?
23. How do you master time and make it work for you?
24. What are the keys to rituals and how can you use them to make life more enjoyable and fun?
25. What do humans value the most and how do you get it for yourself?
26. How do you create a life plan to meet your current goals and take yourself to the next level and beyond?
27. How do you create positive habits and how long does it take?
28. How do you get rid of bad habits/negative thinking and how long does that take?
29. How can you do all your life tasks and projects in the best way possible?
30. How do you care for your health so you can live a long, active, and healthy life?
31. How do you train yourself every day to be your best?
32. How do you get a restful and healing sleep throughout my life?
33. How do you fuel yourself correctly with Light, Air, Water, Food, and Information to thrive?
34. How can you become the correct weight and then maintain it without dieting?
35. How do you overcome addiction, depression and suicidal thoughts?
36. How do you put your best foot forward in the world and be a good role model? 
37. How can you be a good friend and make better friends?
38. How can you communicate so you are understood and learn?
39. How do you deal with negative and damaging relationships so you can become better and help them?
40. How do you raise positive, productive, and happy children?
41. How do you create a nurturing, healthy, and loving family?
42. How do you participate in society in a meaningful way?
43. How can you join with others to force positive change?
44. What are the systems that run society and how do we make them serve us better?
45. What is power, how does it work and how can you help direct power in a positive direction?
46. What is government, how does it work and how can you help direct our government in a positive direction?
47. What is wealth, how does it work and how can you help direct wealth in a positive direction in our society?
48. How do you care for your money/wealth so you can have security throughout my life?
49. How do you keep what is already good yet make what is not better?
50. How do you start and what do you do next to become your best right now?  

 

What is The Way?

Basically, the main questions and problems of life, as well as their answers and solutions, have been placed into one book that is divided into three volumes: The Way, the Life Manual, and the Child & Family Guide.

The Way covers the main philosophy and all "7 Steps" on how to Live a Meaningful Life & Make a Real Difference in the World.

The Life Manual shows us how to master the "The Foundations of Life" and is designed to work with "Step 5" of The Way, yet can be used anytime by jumping to the section of interest.

The Child & Family Guide shows us how to create a nurturing and loving family and how to raise positive, productive, and happy children. This guide can be used anytime by jumping to the section of interest, yet it will become of even greater value after an understanding of The Way and Life Manual have been gained.

How Do You Use The Way?

The Way can be used as a transformative guide to improve your life or as a life reference where you can find information to help you manage a specific issue you are dealing with.

Transformative Guide: All three volumes of The Way are designed to change you in positive ways through merely understanding the message. Here you simply read or listen to the books and then follow the instructions going as far as you desire at the speed of your choosing.

Life Reference: The Way, Life Manual, and Child & Family Guide are designed as a quick reference book that you can use anytime. Within these books, you find the details and lists that you will need at different times of life. In this way, once you understand the 7 Steps and the layout of the manual and guide, you can jump to crucial sections when you and yours are in need.

 

Testimonials & Endorsements

At this time, The Way is in editing and will be published soon. So this means we only have limited feedback. However, the feedback received was credible and shows the great promise of the book. Below are a sample of testimonials from those who have read advanced copies.

A 15-year-old read it and told me, “This is exactly what I needed.” to a 95-year-old woman who said, “This is one of those books that needs to be published for the sake of humanity.” to a young mother who said, “I wish I had this information before I gave birth.” to a mid-thirties professional male who said, “This is like the wisdom of the ages in one book!” to a mid-thirties professional woman who said, “This is the kind of book you read and then keep in easy reach for there is so much goodness to reflect on I want to read it again and again” to a twenty-something woman who said, "Everyone needs to know this, we are just not taught this stuff but should be, this needs to be a movement!"

After a professional review of the manuscript by a published author, I received this comment, "I say that you have everything you need, first and foremost, because of your writing. It’s commercial and intelligent. It’s unique. And you have an engaging writing style. You’re also bringing something new, valuable, and marketable to your category, and I like that your work explores meaningful themes. Not every book has to “matter” but I prefer that type of book (and author). In addition, your marketing background makes it much more likely you’ll get where you want to go. In short, you have a lot to be optimistic about, and lastly, I like that you’re coachable and committed and have a sense of humor (the longer I do this, the more I pay attention to those things, too).”

One of my publishers, who has read hundreds of self-help, self-development, and success books as well as publishes them, found great wisdom within The Way that he had not found anywhere else, and this helped them through a very challenging life event.

A Hollywood type said, "Wow, this is like the Rocky Story plus The Secret on Steroids!

There is something for everyone within The Way. This can’t be said for most books, and that’s the point. The Way is not like most books. It’s as one of my publishers said after he and others reviewed The Way. “We have never seen anything like this, as most self-help and success type books are all just regurgitation of past work of people like Covey and Robbins. This is truly original and mind-blowing. It could change everything!”

Some have called it "The Handbook for Humanity."

 

The Way Is Needed
Now More Than Ever

We need only to pick up a newspaper or turn on the news to see the negativity that is rising around the world. The negativity and wrongness of the world are clearly evident. What is even more evident is that people are rising up and clamoring for real practical positive solutions all around the world. Our connectedness has helped us all become more aware of our similarities as well as our growing global power to create positive change.

The questions answered within The Way can be seen as a formula that once input into a human and our society, the code will affect positive change from within. The Way is a catalyst and codified in a way that focuses and moves us in positive directions. The Way is a complete solution that will save us time and help us become better people, improve our relationships, and help create a better society. It not only includes all the information and implementation strategies but also charts, lists, and examples that can be customized to create a plan that fits your life. So far, all who understand The Way have said this is needed more than ever. One need only start reading to understand why.

 

About The Author

Andrew was born in Detroit, Michigan, USA, on March 18, 1966. He is not someone that you would have expected to write a book. He was born with a lazy eye, which made him legally blind in one eye. As a result, he wore a patch over his good eye to improve his vision. He has dyslexia and other “learning disabilities,” so he struggled with reading, writing, and arithmetic. Little was known about “learning disabilities” at the time, so learning and adapting to life’s challenges at an early age was difficult.

Along with these issues, he was also bullied by his peers and adults, with one elementary school teacher even going as far as to ridicule him in front of the class, telling him to drop out of school and get a job because he was too stupid to ever graduate.

He learned to compensate and even became an avid reader and listener to books with a lot of extra effort on his part, the support of his mother, sister, a special teacher, and aid from services for the blind and handicapped. It's important to note that along with these “learning challenges” came some great gifts that allowed him to do and see things others could not. He has always been a very spiritual person with a special connection to nature.

He went on to not only graduate from high school as the Vice President of the student body but went on to earn a BA in Speech and Communications as well as minors in Religious Studies and Eastern Philosophy. After graduation, he then spent a few years teaching English in Japan and traveling the world, which enhanced his knowledge before returning to the USA.

Throughout his life, Andrew has always worked hard. He was forced into it because of his learning disabilities, but he also likes doing a good job even if no one will see or know about it. Andrew has won many accolades throughout his career and is known as an innovator, an out of the box thinker, and someone who gets the job done. He started working when he was very young by doing odd jobs and selling things for money or trade. For example, in elementary school, he created a little business selling collectibles he got from the ice cream man that got so popular the principal called his parents to shut it down because it was taking all the other children’s lunch money.

At various times he was a paperboy, lifeguard, swimming teacher, gas station attendant, construction worker, stock boy, cashier, appliance repairman, handyman, gardener, janitor, dishwasher, landscaper, food server, personal trainer, security guard/bouncer, martial arts and self-defense teacher, cook, furniture mover, teleprompter operator, teacher, salesman, sales manager, IT manager, recruiter, recruiter manager, marketer, trainer, public speaker, business partner, business owner, startup developer, website programmer, internet marketing and SEO expert, founder, owner and CEO of Consulting Ace Inc. since 1999, and now the author of The Way and the founder of The 7th Foundation.

Andrew has always been very healthy and fit and is what many would call a health and fitness fanatic. He stopped eating all forms of junk food, by choice, at 13 years old after learning about the benefits of real food compared to the harmful effects of junk food. Since then, he has studied all facets of food, health, the human body, mind, longevity, and ways to train and repair ourselves.

He participated in sports while in school, including track, cross-country, basketball, and crew (rowing team). He has competed in triathlons, is an expert swimmer, mountain biker, and yoga practitioner, as well as earned degrees in many forms of martial arts.

Andrew was also forced to learn even more profound lessons of the body and mind as he was injured seriously many times in life. While some of these injuries left him with permanent issues, today, few people could recognize any physical limitations aside from the inability to sit in one place for too long.

There is so much more to Andrew as he has lived quite the adventurous life and has had many nail-biting and mind-blowing experiences. It would take a whole book even to begin to tell his story correctly. You will also learn a little more about him in the first chapter of The Way.

Hopefully, the little taste we have given you here is enough to see that while most people would not have picked Andrew as someone who should write a book, knowing his life and his knowledge base, Andrew is definitely someone we want doing so.

 

“Learning Disabilities” Note: What society has negatively labeled as “Learning Disabilities” are really just “Learning Differences” and alternative ways of thinking that often come with great gifts. This simply means, in most cases, the cookie-cutter teaching methods that work for most everyone, just need to be altered to reach these people. If we can master educating this group, it will help our society, for many, if not most, of our greatest achievers and thinkers, have one or more of these issues. Some of whom include: George Washington, Leonardo da Vinci, Alexander Graham Bell, Thomas Edison, Albert Einstein, George Patton, Winston Churchill, Henry Ford, Walt Disney, Pablo Picasso, Ludwig van Beethoven, Alexander Graham Bell, John F. Kennedy, Dr. Temple Grandin, Daymond John, Gavin Newsom, Cher, Agatha Christie, Woopie Goldberg, Steve Jobs, Erin Brockovich, Keira Knightley, W.B. Yeats, Keanu Reeves, Jay Leno, F. Scott Fitzgerald, Tom Cruise, John Lennon, Muhammad Ali, Tommy Hilfiger, Richard Branson, and Elon Musk.

 

More Than Just a Book
It's Our Mission
The 7th Foundation

We are not only releasing the books and all the supporting materials but also starting a foundation and movement.

Our mission is to be a catalyst that spurs meaningful positive change within people's lives and our society in order to create a world of lasting peace and happiness that everyone can enjoy.

Our motto is “All for one, one for all, united we stand, divided we fall!” which we have borrowed from The Musketeers.

The 7th Foundation is dedicated to spreading the messages found within The Way and helping the founder with his great mission. We are a consulting group and think tank dedicated to solving the problems facing people and our world. We offer and are developing a lot of products and services, as well as planning events that may be of interest to you. Learn how you can join the movement by visiting www.7Way.Me 

​

Are You are Ready to
Become Truly Successful?

The 7 Steps found within The Way will Guide You There.

Now is the Time for You to Build a Firm Foundation

Not Only is Achieving True Success Possible - it’s Life-Changing!

The Way is Here to Help You...Every Step of The Way.

We Live in a World Filled with Challenges, Tests, Confusion, & Distraction.

We All Need Something to Help Our Hopes & Dreams Come True.

Well, this All Changes Soon Because The Way is Almost Here.

You Can Help Make The Way a Reality

 

Click Here to Go to Our Website - 7Way.Me
There You Can Learn More About The Books,
The 7th Foundation, Our Mission & Movement

 

You Can Make a Positive Difference

Right Here

Right Now

Please Support Our Mission!

Please Fund this Campaign - Every Dollar Counts!

If You Cant Fund, Please Help Spread the Word!

We Need Your Help! 

 

I appreciate your time and attention.

Wishing you peace, happiness, and true success always.

 Learn More About The BooksNote: The second video at the top of the campaign is an introduction to The Way. Also please visit https://7Way.Me for more information.Welcome and peace. Thank you for reading. The Way is not about me. It was written because I discovered something truly important that can help a lot of people and our society. I really help you and our world. .How Can You Achieve The Primary Goal of Life?Do You:
Wish to Know Why You Are Here & The Meaning of Life?
Dream About Being Healthy, Happy & Successful?
Regret Not Finishing or Doing Things Well?
Desire Lasting Positive Relationships & Families?
Want to Know What to Do Every Day to Be Your Best?
Hope to Be Influential, Significant, & Make a Real Positive Difference in the World?
Need to Find that Missing Piece or a Total Solution?
If you answered Yes to any of these questions you need: The Way
The problem is that if you are to be your best, live a meaningful life and make a real difference in the world, you need to integrate a wide variety of vital information into your life as quickly as possible. This is why The Way was created. If The Way is the answer or even has part of the answer you have been seeking, you don’t want to let this opportunity slip by and always wonder who you could have been.You Found The Way at this Critical Moment for a Very Important ReasonSo Why Not Take Moment and Learn More?You have Nothing to Lose & Everything to Gain  I discovered The Way on April 3, 2015, while sorting the beginning and the ending of “The Book” I have been working on for over 30 years covering how to be our best physically, mentally, emotionally, spiritually, financially, in relationships, as a family, and in society. Within “The Book” and its “4 Pillars” of “Self,” “Society,” “Universe,” and “God,” I found my notes referring the “Keys” to “True Success.”When I collected them all and put the “7 Keys” together in the right order, it was like a secret code got unlocked, and I discovered The Way. After this discovery, I wrote for three days straight without much sleep or doing anything else. I then worked over the next five years to finish the book at the exclusion of most other things. The Way is the book I wish I found at the start of my quest. It is a positive message that can help a lot of people and possibly change everything.Since this discovery, I have been compelled to get this message out in as many ways as possible. The ultimate goal of The Way, The 7th Foundation, The Movement, and everything else that will follow, is to be a catalyst that spurs meaningful positive change within people's lives and our society to create a world of lasting peace and happiness that everyone can enjoy.Know that this was not the work of one person, a few, or even a team. The Way is the collective work of humanity and took thousands of years to create. The solution, I have named The Way, was only made possible because I was able to join the knowledge and wisdom from our most celebrated minds throughout the ages. To be clear, this is not about me; it’s about the message. The Way AnswersMany Important QuestionsSome are Listed Below.  There are many, many more.1. What is your purpose?2. What is the meaning of life?3. Why are you here?4. How can you be significant, influential, and make a real positive difference in the world?5. What is the difference between Success and True Success?6. How can you become your True Self and be Truly Successful?7. How do we end hate and bridge the divide?8. How do we find the truth and create real understanding?9. How do we find hope and build a future all of us can be rightly proud of?10. How can we create a world of happiness and peace?11. How can you become the best person you can be mentally, physically, emotionally, spiritually, financially, within relationships, your family and society?12. What is the human condition and does it affect your fate/destiny?13. What is a belief system/moral code and how does it determine your fate/destiny?14. What are the 10 Laws that make up a core value system that can guide you throughout life?15. What is life and why should you care about it?16. How do you care for life and our world?17. How should you treat other people?18. What does equality mean and why does it matter to you?19. How can we unify faith in God with philosophy, the humanities, and science?20. What are the soul, spirit, and heaven?21. What is religion and how can they be unified?22. If you believe in God, how are you judged and how do you get to Heaven?23. How do you master time and make it work for you?24. What are the keys to rituals and how can you use them to make life more enjoyable and fun?25. What do humans value the most and how do you get it for yourself?26. How do you create a life plan to meet your current goals and take yourself to the next level and beyond?27. How do you create positive habits and how long does it take?28. How do you get rid of bad habits/negative thinking and how long does that take?29. How can you do all your life tasks and projects in the best way possible?30. How do you care for your health so you can live a long, active, and healthy life?31. How do you train yourself every day to be your best?32. How do you get a restful and healing sleep throughout my life?33. How do you fuel yourself correctly with Light, Air, Water, Food, and Information to thrive?34. How can you become the correct weight and then maintain it without dieting?35. How do you overcome addiction, depression and suicidal thoughts?36. How do you put your best foot forward in the world and be a good role model? 37. How can you be a good friend and make better friends?38. How can you communicate so you are understood and learn?39. How do you deal with negative and damaging relationships so you can become better and help them?40. How do you raise positive, productive, and happy children?41. How do you create a nurturing, healthy, and loving family?42. How do you participate in society in a meaningful way?43. How can you join with others to force positive change?44. What are the systems that run society and how do we make them serve us better?45. What is power, how does it work and how can you help direct power in a positive direction?46. What is government, how does it work and how can you help direct our government in a positive direction?47. What is wealth, how does it work and how can you help direct wealth in a positive direction in our society?48. How do you care for your money/wealth so you can have security throughout my life?49. How do you keep what is already good yet make what is not better?50. How do you start and what do you do next to become your best right now?   What is The Way?Basically, the main questions and problems of life, as well as their answers and solutions, have been placed into one book that is divided into three volumes: The Way, the Life Manual, and the Child & Family Guide.The Way covers the main philosophy and all "7 Steps" on how to Live a Meaningful Life & Make a Real Difference in the World.The Life Manual shows us how to master the "The Foundations of Life" and is designed to work with "Step 5" of The Way, yet can be used anytime by jumping to the section of interest.The Child & Family Guide shows us how to create a nurturing and loving family and how to raise positive, productive, and happy children. This guide can be used anytime by jumping to the section of interest, yet it will become of even greater value after an understanding of The Way and Life Manual have been gained.How Do You Use The Way?The Way can be used as a transformative guide to improve your life or as a life reference where you can find information to help you manage a specific issue you are dealing with.Transformative Guide: All three volumes of The Way are designed to change you in positive ways through merely understanding the message. Here you simply read or listen to the books and then follow the instructions going as far as you desire at the speed of your choosing.Life Reference: The Way, Life Manual, and Child & Family Guide are designed as a quick reference book that you can use anytime. Within these books, you find the details and lists that you will need at different times of life. In this way, once you understand the 7 Steps and the layout of the manual and guide, you can jump to crucial sections when you and yours are in need. Testimonials & EndorsementsAt this time, The Way is in editing and will be published soon. So this means we only have limited feedback. However, the feedback received was credible and shows the great promise of the book. Below are a sample of testimonials from those who have read advanced copies.A 15-year-old read it and told me, “This is exactly what I needed.” to a 95-year-old woman who said, “This is one of those books that needs to be published for the sake of humanity.” to a young mother who said, “I wish I had this information before I gave birth.” to a mid-thirties professional male who said, “This is like the wisdom of the ages in one book!” to a mid-thirties professional woman who said, “This is the kind of book you read and then keep in easy reach for there is so much goodness to reflect on I want to read it again and again” to a twenty-something woman who said, "Everyone needs to know this, we are just not taught this stuff but should be, this needs to be a movement!"After a professional review of the manuscript by a published author, I received this comment, "I say that you have everything you need, first and foremost, because of your writing. It’s commercial and intelligent. It’s unique. And you have an engaging writing style. You’re also bringing something new, valuable, and marketable to your category, and I like that your work explores meaningful themes. Not every book has to “matter” but I prefer that type of book (and author). In addition, your marketing background makes it much more likely you’ll get where you want to go. In short, you have a lot to be optimistic about, and lastly, I like that you’re coachable and committed and have a sense of humor (the longer I do this, the more I pay attention to those things, too).”One of my publishers, who has read hundreds of self-help, self-development, and success books as well as publishes them, found great wisdom within The Way that he had not found anywhere else, and this helped them through a very challenging life event.A Hollywood type said, "Wow, this is like the Rocky Story plus The Secret on Steroids!There is something for everyone within The Way. This can’t be said for most books, and that’s the point. The Way is not like most books. It’s as one of my publishers said after he and others reviewed The Way. “We have never seen anything like this, as most self-help and success type books are all just regurgitation of past work of people like Covey and Robbins. This is truly original and mind-blowing. It could change everything!”Some have called it "The Handbook for Humanity." The Way Is NeededNow More Than EverWe need only to pick up a newspaper or turn on the news to see the negativity that is rising around the world. The negativity and wrongness of the world are clearly evident. What is even more evident is that people are rising up and clamoring for real practical positive solutions all around the world. Our connectedness has helped us all become more aware of our similarities as well as our growing global power to create positive change.The questions answered within The Way can be seen as a formula that once input into a human and our society, the code will affect positive change from within. The Way is a catalyst and codified in a way that focuses and moves us in positive directions. The Way is a complete solution that will save us time and help us become better people, improve our relationships, and help create a better society. It not only includes all the information and implementation strategies but also charts, lists, and examples that can be customized to create a plan that fits your life. So far, all who understand The Way have said this is needed more than ever. One need only start reading to understand why. About The AuthorAndrew was born in Detroit, Michigan, USA, on March 18, 1966. He is not someone that you would have expected to write a book. He was born with a lazy eye, which made him legally blind in one eye. As a result, he wore a patch over his good eye to improve his vision. He has dyslexia and other “learning disabilities,” so he struggled with reading, writing, and arithmetic. Little was known about “learning disabilities” at the time, so learning and adapting to life’s challenges at an early age was difficult.Along with these issues, he was also bullied by his peers and adults, with one elementary school teacher even going as far as to ridicule him in front of the class, telling him to drop out of school and get a job because he was too stupid to ever graduate.He learned to compensate and even became an avid reader and listener to books with a lot of extra effort on his part, the support of his mother, sister, a special teacher, and aid from services for the blind and handicapped. It's important to note that along with these “learning challenges” came some great gifts that allowed him to do and see things others could not. He has always been a very spiritual person with a special connection to nature.He went on to not only graduate from high school as the Vice President of the student body but went on to earn a BA in Speech and Communications as well as minors in Religious Studies and Eastern Philosophy. After graduation, he then spent a few years teaching English in Japan and traveling the world, which enhanced his knowledge before returning to the USA.Throughout his life, Andrew has always worked hard. He was forced into it because of his learning disabilities, but he also likes doing a good job even if no one will see or know about it. Andrew has won many accolades throughout his career and is known as an innovator, an out of the box thinker, and someone who gets the job done. He started working when he was very young by doing odd jobs and selling things for money or trade. For example, in elementary school, he created a little business selling collectibles he got from the ice cream man that got so popular the principal called his parents to shut it down because it was taking all the other children’s lunch money.At various times he was a paperboy, lifeguard, swimming teacher, gas station attendant, construction worker, stock boy, cashier, appliance repairman, handyman, gardener, janitor, dishwasher, landscaper, food server, personal trainer, security guard/bouncer, martial arts and self-defense teacher, cook, furniture mover, teleprompter operator, teacher, salesman, sales manager, IT manager, recruiter, recruiter manager, marketer, trainer, public speaker, business partner, business owner, startup developer, website programmer, internet marketing and SEO expert, founder, owner and CEO of Consulting Ace Inc. since 1999, and now the author of The Way and the founder of The 7th Foundation.Andrew has always been very healthy and fit and is what many would call a health and fitness fanatic. He stopped eating all forms of junk food, by choice, at 13 years old after learning about the benefits of real food compared to the harmful effects of junk food. Since then, he has studied all facets of food, health, the human body, mind, longevity, and ways to train and repair ourselves.He participated in sports while in school, including track, cross-country, basketball, and crew (rowing team). He has competed in triathlons, is an expert swimmer, mountain biker, and yoga practitioner, as well as earned degrees in many forms of martial arts.Andrew was also forced to learn even more profound lessons of the body and mind as he was injured seriously many times in life. While some of these injuries left him with permanent issues, today, few people could recognize any physical limitations aside from the inability to sit in one place for too long.There is so much more to Andrew as he has lived quite the adventurous life and has had many nail-biting and mind-blowing experiences. It would take a whole book even to begin to tell his story correctly. You will also learn a little more about him in the first chapter of The Way.Hopefully, the little taste we have given you here is enough to see that while most people would not have picked Andrew as someone who should write a book, knowing his life and his knowledge base, Andrew is definitely someone we want doing so. “Learning Disabilities” Note: What society has negatively labeled as “Learning Disabilities” are really just “Learning Differences” and alternative ways of thinking that often come with great gifts. This simply means, in most cases, the cookie-cutter teaching methods that work for most everyone, just need to be altered to reach these people. If we can master educating this group, it will help our society, for many, if not most, of our greatest achievers and thinkers, have one or more of these issues. Some of whom include: George Washington, Leonardo da Vinci, Alexander Graham Bell, Thomas Edison, Albert Einstein, George Patton, Winston Churchill, Henry Ford, Walt Disney, Pablo Picasso, Ludwig van Beethoven, Alexander Graham Bell, John F. Kennedy, Dr. Temple Grandin, Daymond John, Gavin Newsom, Cher, Agatha Christie, Woopie Goldberg, Steve Jobs, Erin Brockovich, Keira Knightley, W.B. Yeats, Keanu Reeves, Jay Leno, F. Scott Fitzgerald, Tom Cruise, John Lennon, Muhammad Ali, Tommy Hilfiger, Richard Branson, and Elon Musk. More Than Just a BookIt's Our MissionThe 7th FoundationWe are not only releasing the books and all the supporting materials but also starting a foundation and movement.Our mission is to be a catalyst that spurs meaningful positive change within people's lives and our society in order to create a world of lasting peace and happiness that everyone can enjoy.Our motto is “All for one, one for all, united we stand, divided we fall!” which we have borrowed from The Musketeers.The 7th Foundation is dedicated to spreading the messages found within The Way and helping the founder with his great mission. We are a consulting group and think tank dedicated to solving the problems facing people and our world. We offer and are developing a lot of products and services, as well as planning events that may be of interest to you. Learn how you can join the movement by visiting www.7Way.Me ​Are You are Ready toBecome Truly Successful?The 7 Steps found within The Way will Guide You There.Now is the Time for You to Build a Firm FoundationNot Only is Achieving True Success Possible - it’s Life-Changing!The Way is Here to Help You...Every Step of The Way.We Live in a World Filled with Challenges, Tests, Confusion, & Distraction.We All Need Something to Help Our Hopes & Dreams Come True.Well, this All Changes Soon Because The Way is Almost Here.You Can Help Make The Way a Reality Click Here to Go to Our Website - 7Way.MeThere You Can Learn More About The Books,The 7th Foundation, Our Mission & Movement You Can Make a Positive DifferenceRight HereRight NowPlease Support Our Mission!Please Fund this Campaign - Every Dollar Counts!If You Cant Fund, Please Help Spread the Word!We Need Your Help!  I appreciate your time and attention.Wishing you peace, happiness, and true success always.

story:
Pre-orders for Doors of Love and Light Auracle card deck.

This Doors of Love and Light Auracle Card Deck Project and the Doors of Love and Light Healing Meditations book are designed to bring the energy healing I have learned, to you, through sacred geometry images and energy healing meditations.

My Story: My name is Rita Morgin and I can help you engage the guardians of your land to heal past trauma and clear old energies so you can experience a return to joy and realize your true mission.

Seven years ago I started noticing the effects of adrenal fatigue. This was a big wake up call for me, and I gave up those jobs that were draining my life to begin a process of creatively coming back to spirit. I created my art studio with an Indiegogo funding  "I Make Gardens Sing" campaign.

Through creating pieces of Magical Garden Art that open doors to love, light and care for myself and others, I rediscovered friends I had abandoned years ago: The Guardians of the Land.

What the guardians told me was that they’ve been waiting for me to ask for their help in returning my body and my life back to balance. They reminded me that they reside in all the spaces of life: the land, your home, your work, and even online spaces like websites. They want to partner with me and others to create greater balance, harmony and joy.

While I thought I was a "magical garden artist", I transformed into a healer, beginning with myself. Using energy healing to Harmonize energy in my living and working spaces has brought me new found joy and wellness.

As I worked with my  guardians, I noticed that I could help others to connect with and engage the guardians of their land and spaces to achieve the great results with LAND Healing (Light Aligned Nourishes Dreams Healing).

I have come to the conclusion that each of us has our own unique modality inside of us; AND my greatest joy is assisting others to discover that unique ability and fine tune it.

I have maxed out my credit cards to publish this book and card deck so that I may offer it to you and your spaces. During this process I have experienced a broken arm and loss of home due to inability to work as my arm healed, Corona virus shutdowns and limited work.

I am now well, able to work, and desperately desire to clear this debt.  Your support will not only help me get back on my feet, but will help share this New LAND (Light Aligned Nourishes Dreams) Healing modality for creating harmony in your spaces.

Please join me in financing pre-orders for Doors of Love and Light Auracle card deck by Rita Morgin, Artist, Author, LAND Healer

I was Scheduled to publish on April 4th 2020.  And this date was pushed out due to Corona virus limitations and a backlog of printing orders in the USA.

About the Auracle Cards and Meditation Book:

"Clear your spaces and your personal energy with these messages of love and light. Bring the healing energy required to the spaces in need: in your home, your work, yourself and all the spaces of your ancestors…… 

Each card is a door into your greater awareness of joy, peace and calm.

Some doors invite you to clear your environment: the places you live and work, your ancestral lineage, the spaces you travel through in your daily living; Some doors invite you to journey inward to discover your whole being and the message of your heart; Other doors invite you to care for both spaces at the same time.

This is not a Tarot deck or Future telling. This Auracle card deck provides an exploration in awakening to your intuition. “Auracle” instead of “Oracle” because you are invited to hear (auricle) your own intuition, rather than be told (oracle) what you need to know. 

Each of us has intuitional access to all of the information in the universe. The Doors of Love and Light Auracle Card deck supports your journey to clearing, balancing, harmonizing, welcoming and energizing this intuition in support of your wellbeing on your journey to create your most joy-filled life.

These cards are infused with sacred geometry and Healing Crystal energy to support your wellness journey." excerpt from the Doors of Love and Light book and booklet

What We Need & What You Get

The specials offered:

- Just want to Donate? PDF with Single card image with written meditation and my profuse thanks. $10

Perk #1. The 60-card deck with booklet in a boxed set  $50 US 

 Includes: a five minute personal session to discuss how you want to utilize your card deck, a live group zoom call for learning to use your deck to bring love and light to the land, plus a google doc link with active links to over 30 healing meditation journeys and energy activations for these cards. 

 

Perk #2. My Deck (all of offer #1) plus two personalized 45 minute land healing sessions  for only $300 

(my comprehensive land healing two session package ranges from $500 to $2,500) These sessions may be used in any 45 minute combination of my current services as you desire: LAND Healing, Moto-Ki, EFT or burnout energy support sessions. When your space is aligned to you in current time and older energy influences released, your space becomes welcoming and joyful for you. 

  • I need at least $8,900 to break even with my publishing costs.
  • If I don't reach my entire goal, the funding goes to pay of as much of the debt I already accrued in creating the publishing. The publisher I have hired is already taking this project to print for publication in April, 2020.

The Impact

Not only will your purchase fund this project to bring Love and Light to the spaces you enjoy, it will allow me the priveledge of bringing land healing energy to the public at low cost.

Risks & Challenges

I have already taken the risks and challenges. You are helping me by clearing my debt quicker so that I may find safe housing faster.

AND you are helping me to spread loving healing light to the places you love on this planet. Thank you so much.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please share to get the word out and make some noise about the Doors of Love and Light campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools. https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/doors-of-lov...
  • If you know of any live-in housing exchange near Palo Alto, California, USA that my son and I may utilize temporarily as I get on my feet please let me know.

story:
Qui sommes-nous ?

Des fous, qui ont beaucoup travaillé en presse musicale, et qui ont dirigé pendant plus d'une décennie la rédaction de magazines comme Guitar Part, Rock Wanted, Rock First et bien d'autres, avant de décider que l'aventure d'un magazine indépendant, exigeant et qui ne ressemblerait pas à un catalogue de pub, ça se tentait. Alors on l'a tentée.

Et on est devenus éditeurs indépendants, il y a un peu plus de 4 ans, de Rockawa, le magazine qu'on avait toujours voulu lire. Tiré à 5.000 exemplaires, pas disponible en kiosques mais seulement via www.rockawa.com, il n'est jamais frappé d'obsolescence puisqu'il étudie de fond en comble, à grand renfort d'anecdotes et de rubriques épatantes, la grande histoire du rock, décennie après décennie, des années 1950 à nos jours. 

  •  Le 1er numéro paraît en octobre 2013. On tremble, on se dit qu'on est malades de lancer un magazine au moment où la presse musicale est en plein marasme.
  •  Surprise, tout s'enchaîne, on a des lecteurs militants formidables, qui nous soutiennent sans relâche. On lance l'abonnement sur le volume 9, un an et demi après les débuts.
  • Aujourd'hui, on prépare le volume 25 (sortie début janvier 2018). On a une super-application mobile qui permet de rester connecté à Rockawa tous les jours, un chouette site (www.rockawa.com) où on peut vendre des anciens numéros, des podcasts, des t-shirts, etc.

Mais Rockawa n'est fait que par un très petit nombre de personnes, et a des coûts incompressibles (imprimerie, droits photographiques, coûts postaux qui grimpent d'année en année et que nous refusons de répercuter trop largement sur nos lecteurs…).

Au départ, pour être franc, on ne se voyait pas aussi loin… Pourtant, on s'est pris au jeu. Mais aujourd'hui, si Rockawa est toujours là et bat fièrement le pavillon du rock, il ne peut pas pour autant "voir plus loin" qu'un, voire deux numéros. Tous les bénéfices générés par les abonnements servent aux frais de fonctionnement et sont directement réinvestis dans l'aventure. Et à l'exception des prestataires inévitables (imprimerie, droits photos, frais postaux), aucun des contributeurs, tant pour la rédaction que la maquette ou la partie administrative, n'est aujourd'hui rémunéré pour réaliser le magazine.

Ce dont nous avons besoin

Sécuriser autant que faire se peut cette activité fièrement indépendante. 20.000 €, c'est la somme que nous essayons de réunir. Ça peut paraître beaucoup, mais voilà ce que nous pourrions financer avec cette somme : 

  •  L'impression pour 3 numéros d'avance. 
  •  Les droits photographiques pour 3 numéros d'avance.
  •  Une machine à café (si !)
  •  Agrandir un petit peu l'équipe
  •  Nous faire connaître en effectuant une campagne de promotion

Le défi

Oui, c'est complètement dingue. Mais nous voulons réussir. Pour prouver qu'une vie hors des kiosques est possible, sans intermédiaire, reposant sur une profession de foi éditoriale forte et des lecteurs militants. Nous comptons sur ces derniers, sensibilisés à la problématique globale de l’économie fragile d’un magazine de rock. L'achat du magazine est un acte militant, en étant certain de recevoir son magazine 72 heures après sa commande, tout en profitant du contenu en accès gratuit sur www.rockawa.com et sur l'application mobile.

Plus besoin ainsi de courir les kiosques, de craindre les grèves de distributeurs ou les problèmes de trésorerie de l’éditeur, le lecteur de Rockawa, fidèle et passionné, en devient son principal ambassadeur, en connection quotidienne avec son média favori. Le mode de distribution de Rockawa implique une forte volonté d’ajuster nos tirages au plus près de la demande, contrairement aux magazines distribués de manière « classique » en kiosque et affichant un tirage démesurément élevé par rapport à leurs ventes réelles. Tout le monde sait que la musique est en crise, que la presse est en crise… mais nous proposons une alternative réaliste, un nouveau mode de fonctionnement.

Le problème de la presse, c’est qu’aujourd’hui, le public la juge par le prisme du web : des articles écrits à la va-vite, bourrés de fautes d’orthographe, lorgnant sans vergogne sur le sensationnel… Tout doit aller vite. L'écriture et la lecture ! Tant pis pour l’enquête, et parfois même, tant pis pour la vérification des sources… Avec Rockawa, nous avons voulu réhabiliter une certaine forme de journalisme, à l’ancienne. De longues enquêtes, des angles originaux, pointus, parce que cela ne se fait plus trop ailleurs. Nos modèles sont les magazines musicaux anglo-saxons.

Notre volonté, c’est que les gens adhèrent à cette philosophie, qu’ils ne se disent pas qu’ils achètent un mag pour le lire en un quart d’heure, dont cinq minutes à feuilleter des pubs… Rockawa affiche un taux de 98% d’éditorial, c’est un sacré pari. Celui que les gens qui ont la sensation d’avoir un véritable magazine nous suivront sur la durée.

Les quelques annonceurs qui nous suivent ne nous forcent pas à écrire des trucs sympas sur eux, ils jouent le jeu en sachant que nos lecteurs sont de véritables fans de musique, et c’est cette cible qu’ils espèrent toucher de toute façon.

Notre mag étant conçu comme un objet de collection, jamais obsolète, il est conservé, reste en vente sur notre boutique, peut être lu n'importe quand. Chaque exemplaire vendu sera lu, conservé, repris en main. On ne va pas en kiosque pour être coincé trois semaines entre un mag de bricolage et un autre de cuisine pour disparaître… Quel intérêt aujourd’hui ? 

Bien sûr, nous n’avons pas les moyens de nous développer aussi vite que d’autres, d’investir dans de grandes campagnes promotionnelles, mais on aime assez le côté « épicerie ». C’est énormément de travail, mais nous sommes en direct avec nos lecteurs, c’est quand même fabuleux, et c’est surtout primordial de tenir compte des retours, discuter, enlever les œillères.

Mais il ne faut pas se mentir, l’équation économique est compliquée lorsqu’on regarde l’offre que nous proposons et que l’on tient compte des services « offerts » gratuitement sur le web. Notre pari, c’est que les gens vont « adhérer » à notre profession de foi, et comprendre que pour bénéficier de ces services gratuits, il faut acheter le mag, un t-shirt, et tout faire pour que le magazine, encore méconnu, accélère le processus de bouche-à-oreille qui lui a permis jusqu'à aujourd'hui de demeurer en vie.

D'autres façons d'aider

Bien sûr, il y a cette collecte, la possibilité d'acheter nos anciens numéros, des podcasts, des articles à l'unité, des abonnements, des t-shirts, tout ça sur www.rockawa.com, mais certaines personnes ne peuvent tout simplement pas contribuer. Cela ne veut pas dire qu'elles ne peuvent pas aider :

  •  Demandez aux gens de passer le mot et de faire de la publicité autour de ce projet.

Tous ensemble, nous pouvons préserver ce magazine un brin utopique, et poursuivre son développement. En 4 ans, Rockawa s'est déjà doté des outils ancrant son univers dans la modernité exigée par les lecteurs d'aujourd'hui.

story:
FROM THE AUTHOR:

To all of the Moms, around the world, this book is for YOU!  San Francisco made!! Single Mom and the City, CreateTime, Money and a Rich Life, is a guidebook for thriving, sanity and peace of mind.  This book has nothing to do with burping your kid, playing with them or sticking a breast or bottle in their mouth's.  This book is about more health and wellness for moms, more time, getting our financial house in order, creating , more income, and ultimately, creating and living the life we want and deserve. 

On the airplane prior to take off, the flight attendant tells you to put on your mask first in the event of an emergency. Why?  Then you are better equip to help others.  When mom is happy and healthy the entire family thrives.

A little about me!

I was born and raised in the city of San Francisco.  When I became a first time mom, I really had no clue.  Often as brand new moms we’re just trying to make it.  We just Created A Human.   That little human used our body as a house for 9 months. Let that sink in....Nothing short of a miracle!

When I first became a new mom, I wished there were an all encompassing book out there to guide me through the incredible, yet challenging journey called motherhood.  I needed that book more then ever when I became a single mom.  Alas, there wasn't one, and I just could not leave parenting to chance.  So, I began reading, researching, talking to thriving moms and experts , learning from the successes and pitfalls of moms, including my own experiences, which included things we would change, and so much more....

As time moved along friends and family would constantly ask me, how I do it all?  Why do I seem so happy?  How do I have time and energy to do the things I love?  How can I afford that?  I wanted to share it all, beyond my friends. Through my education, experiences, and life’s lessons, Single Mom and the City, was born.

THE GOAL $7500

$7500 will allow us to:

• Publish and print first run of 2000 - 3000 books.  First books will be shared with backers of this campaign and the remaining books will be used as initial inventory.

• Edit book for all distribution platforms.

• Book interior design.

• Professional audio voiceover. 

• Establish distribution and fulfillment through online realtors such as Amazon, Barnes and Noble, public libraries,  and brick and mortar locations.
 

STRETCH GOAL $10,000

• Accomplish our stretch goal and we will 100 books (200 total) to 2 organizations dedicated to helping moms that need it most.

• Help us reach our stretch goal and Single Mom and the City will offer a comprehensive workbook to go alongside the book.

PERKS

• Coloring Pages: A  containing 25 detailed black and white coloring pages with inspirational quotes will be emailed to backers within a week of the end of the campaign.

• Books: Each book book will be individually numbered and signed by the author. Following the end of the campaign, books will take 2-3 months to complete final design, print, record and ship/distribute.

• YOUR name printed in the book: Certain perks give you the opportunity to have your name printed in the beginning of the book! Supporters will be asked by email how they want their name to appear.  Sizes will vary from standard, medium and large print depending on which perk is selected (sizes listed in perks will be standard unless otherwise notated). You have the option to remain anonymous, as well.  Names will be printed in the order in which they are received. 

• Personalized autograph:  A unique opportunity to  a hand written personalized message in the book. Send a book to someone you love and admire. Signed by the author. 30 words or less.

• Donate a book.  This option will allow you to generously a book to a non profit that helps moms.  tbd (you will not receive this copy it will be directly gifted to a mom)

• VIP Launch Party Tickets:  A launch party will be scheduled in San Francisco, CA when books are physically available.  This event will likely be held at a hotel in Union Square/Downtown San Francisco.  Media will be present.  The launch party date will be announced at least 30 days in advance and will likely be Saturday or Sunday evening.

 

THE STATISTICS & WHY SINGLE MOM AND THE CITY IS SO IMPORTANT

Once largely limited to poor women and minorities, single motherhood is now becoming the new “norm”.

• Approximately, 4 out 10 children are born to unwed mothers.  Nearly two-thirds are born to mothers under the age of 30.

• Today 1 in 4 children under the age of 18  are being raised without a father.

• According to 2017 U.S. Census Bureau, out of about 12 million single parent families with children under the age of 18, more than 80% were headed by single mothers.

• Only one third of single mothers received any child support, and the average amount these mothers received was only about $430 a month.

• Among children living with mother only, 40% lived in poverty. In contrast, only 12% of children in two parent families were counted as poor.

• Families headed by single mothers are among the poorest households, more than a third lived in poverty, and as such, are extremely vulnerable to homelessness.

• Single mothers often spend over half of their income on housing expenses and a third on childcare, leaving them with less for educational expenses.

THE IMPACT

This positive results from publishing and distributing, Single Mom and the City, are limitless.  Public programs are helpful but this book is a "fishing pole".  If you give a person a fish they will eat,  be content temporarily, and soon need more.  Teach them how to fish and they will eat for a lifetime. 

Single Mom and the City, Time, Money and a Rich Life will help children, mothers and families grow and prosper.

• The entire family benefits when there is a stable and thriving family environment.

• The positive, insightful power of this book is sure to be infectious.  Single Mom and the City will impact individual lives and communities.  This book is practical, insightful mixed with sprinkles of humor.      

Takiyah's family has not only witnessed every step of this book.  They've lived it!   In addition to living it they have all benefited and flourished as a result.  For my family to see this book become a reality will be a priceless lesson in perseverance, tenacity and grit.  "Just do it!", belongs to Nike but its my tagline for life!  And why not?  We all have just one life.  Live it!  "Just do it!" 

"We can all be the best mom, yet it will always look different."  Takiyah

Your contribution, at any level, is greatly appreciated.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Single Mom and the City WILL be published.  This is so much more then a campaign.  It's a movement.

We have partnered with experienced organizations and individuals that will help us navigate each step of the book publishing process.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Share this campaign with everyone you know. Even if they are not a mother, they likely will know a mom, have a close connection to a mom, or want to support the cause themselves. There are easy tools here to help you share on social media. Tag your friends in posts to make sure they see them!

If you are connected with media outlets that would find value in this movement , please send us a message.

Wishing you , happiness, health and love,

Single Mom and the City
