story:
CSATLAKOZZ 

A TÜNTETÉSHEZ ITT!

JOIN TO THE DEMONSTRATION HERE!


/// FOR ENGLISH DESCRIPTION PLEASE SCROLL DOWN ///


MI a t#k#m az a Humán Platform?

2012-ben alakult civil szervezet (jaj!) amely a humán területek (jajjaj!) civil szervezetei (wtf?!!) közötti együttműködéseket igyekszik elősegíteni (lol!!)
OK, elmagyarázzuk.
Civil szervezet vagyunk, amely valóban pályázott és nyert is pénzt a Norvég Civil Támogatási Alaptól (HAH!!!). Igen, mi szerveztünk tüntetést - többek között - Lázár János ellen (HAH-HAH!!) amikor ő betámadta az egykori origo szerkesztőségét, ezzel támadva a magyar sajtó szabadságát. Igen, emiatt sokan külföldi ügynöknek tartanak bennünket, és igen, még az összeesküvés-elméletekre kevésbé fogékony polgártársakban is van egyfajta félsz velünk kapcsolatban. De egyrészről azt gondoljuk, hogy ez rendben van - nyugodtan legyünk szkeptikusak és kritikusak egymással szemben, ez csak építi az amúgy súlyosan rohadó közállapotainkat - másrészt pedig nézzetek körbe a honlapunkon, mert ennél sokkal több dologgal foglalkozunk! Az elmúlt egy évben szerveztünk fórumot a Múzeum Negyed tervezett megépítése kapcsán ugyanúgy, ahogy tanszereket vettünk a hiánnyal küzdő iskoláknak, bemutatva a központosítás működésképtelenségét. Szerveztünk oknyomozó workshopot, adatbázist építettünk a 2010-2014 közötti kormányzati döntésekről, kritikáját adtuk a Magyar Művészeti Akadémia működésének, és csináltunk még ezeken kívül is sok más mindent. 

OK, és MI a baj az oroszokkal, hát a gáz is onnan jön! Azzal mi nincs rendben, hogy nem akarunk télen megfagyni?!

Haló! És az rendben lenne, hogy az a nép, amely '89-'90-ben nemet mondott az egypártrendszerre, a KGST-re, Gorbacsov és Jelcin állameszményére, az most Orbán szűklátókörűsége és harácsolhatnékja miatt az orosz népet (és az ukránt, a tatárt, a csecsent, stb.) elnyomó, az emberi jogokat szemberöhögő volt titkosügynök karjaiba akarja visszavezetni a hazánkat? 

Szerintem a ruszkik nem hülyék. Ha nem bírnák a pasast, akkor elkergetnék a választáson, vagy tüntetnének ellene. 

Hát, sajnos az a baj, hogy megpróbálták mindkettőt, sőt még annál is többet, de nem jártak sikerrel. Putyin uralkodása alatt több mint 100 újságírót öltek meg vagy zártak rács mögé. Bizonyított tény, hogy Putyin 2011-ben brutálisan elcsalta a parlamenti választásokat.  Oroszországban törvényben tiltják a káromkodást a színházi előadásokban, filmekben és tévé adásokban. Ugyanígy tiltva van a "homoszexuális propaganda" ami tovább fokozta a leszbikus, meleg, biszexuális és transznemű emberekkel szembeni gyűlöletet, és számos, velük szemben elkövetett brutális bűncselekményt "eredményezett". Oroszországban a legnagyobb a jövedelmi egyenlőtlenség: kisszámú, de bitang gazdag oligarcha kezében összpontosulnak hatalmas vagyonok, miközben milliók nyomorognak. Míg Moszkva a világ legdrágább fővárosa, addig az orosz és az amerikai átlagkereset között ötszörös (!) a különbség. Ja, és a tüntetések! Ha valaki "folytatólagosan" szervez tüntetést, nyilvános találkozót fél éven belül, akkor akár 1 millió rubelre is büntethetik. Akar a halál magának ilyen politikai szövetségest, épp elég nekünk a hazai eresztés! 

OK, ez tényleg elég tré szitu! De mit tudnak tenni mókusörsék a világ egyik szuperhatalmának vezetőjével szemben???? LOL :-))))))))) 

Hát mi magunkban szinte semmit. És nem, ez nem a klasszikus lehúzós duma, hogy támogass, és többen leszünk. Nem. Olyan kampányt akarunk készíteni, amelyhez sokan csatlakozhatnak, és mindenki, aki szeretné, kifejezheti a maga egyéni módján a nemtetszését Putyinnal szemben. Mert szerintünk ez klassz dolog.


Azért kérjük, hogy támogass minket, hogy

1) közösen belekiáltsuk az önkényuraink fülébe - Putyin: NYET!

A Keleti Pályaudvartól a Nyugati Pályaudvarig vonulunk február 16-án 18.00-tól. A vonulás során kis teherautóval szeretnénk kísérni és motiválni a tömeget hangszórókkal, illetve nagy színpaddal várni mindenkit. 
2) szobrot állíthassunk Putyinnak!
Igen, folytatva a régi, szép állam-kapitalista hagyományokat, a testvér-ország diktátorának szobrot kívánunk állítani a belvárosban (jégből, yeah:-), hogy méltóképpen éltessük megjelenését a városban!
3) fórumokat szervezhessünk, és neten streamelhessük őket!
Február 12-én és 14-én a Stúdió K-ban, meghívott szakértőkkel a putyini politizálás veszélyeinek elemzéséért, hogy pontosan értsük, mi a baj! Ha nem élsz Pesten, vagy nem akarsz otthonról este már kimozdulni, akkor sincs baj, mert ha összejön a lóvé, akkor lesz online stream is mindkét rendezvényről!

Nem is rossz. De azért ez g@ci sok pénz amit kértek. Mi a garancia, hogy nem pattantok meg?

Az összes költésről részletes elszámolást fogunk közzétenni a Humán Platform facebook oldalán. Ahogy ezt tettük az összes korábbi tüntetésünk, és az NCTA pályázatunk kapcsán is. A tüntetés/kampány szervezői semmilyen díjazásban nem részesülnek, a munkájukat önkéntes alapon fogják végezni. Az esetlegesen felhasználásra nem kerülő pénzek sorsáról a közösségnek fogjuk átengedni a döntés jogát, a facebookon lebonyolított szavazás keretében, február 17-ét követően. 

OK. Van más módja is a segítségnek?

Persze! Rengeteg (!) önkéntesre és rendezőre lesz szükségünk az elkészült cuccok terítése és a tüntetés megvalósítása során. Ha van rá lehetőséged, jelentkezz az info@humanplatform.hu email címre, és megírjuk miben számítunk a közreműködésedre!


Oszd meg az esemény hírét, támogasd a kampányt, csatlakozz aktivistaként, hogy egy életre megmutassuk a hazaiaknak és a világnak: 

Putyin: NYET!



/// ENGLISH DESCRIPTION ///

Well guys, this is the situation: the Russian dictator Vladimir Putin is going to come to Hungary, Budapest on the 17th February. It is not 100% clear right now what is the reason of his visit: it could be something related to the Hungarian-Russian trade offer about the new nuclear plant designed and financed by Russia, or the gas-transportation, or (most probably) Putin tries to convince Hungary's PM Viktor Orbán NOT to vote with yes on the planned sanctions against Russia in the EU. As we said Putin's aims are not clear. There is only one clear thing: any offer, contract between him and Orbán would be a disaster for the Hungarian nation and for the entire European community. Of course we disagree with Putin on several things (including the anti-gay "propaganda" law, the laws against protestors, the cheats on the voting system, etc.) and we truly believe he is a disaster for the Russian nation too. That's why we want not just protest against the bastard, but show solidarity with the Russian nation, and minorities who are facing great dangerous because of the irresponsible governance of his and his alliances. We're a Hungarian NGO: our main activities are related to advocacy for other NGOs in the human fields (mainly: education, social-care and culture), so we often hold demonstrations, public forums, etc. But this is just part of our activities: beside these we organized workshops for investigative journalists, have made social campaigns to raise awareness of the dramatic situation of the state schools, the state-captured situation of the Hungarian art-institutions, etc. 

In this campaign we try to raise money in order to organize a pre-campaign, a march and a demonstration in the capital of Hungary for the visit of Putin. 

Thank you in advance for any contribution to our campaign! If you have the possibility please come on the 16th demonstration to Hungary join to us and hold a transparent with our slogan in your language! We need common political activities and solidarity more than ever!
story_txt:
CSATLAKOZZ 
A TÜNTETÉSHEZ ITT!
JOIN TO THE DEMONSTRATION HERE!


/// FOR ENGLISH DESCRIPTION PLEASE SCROLL DOWN ///

MI a t#k#m az a Humán Platform?
2012-ben alakult civil szervezet (jaj!) amely a humán területek (jajjaj!) civil szervezetei (wtf?!!) közötti együttműködéseket igyekszik elősegíteni (lol!!)
OK, elmagyarázzuk.

Civil szervezet vagyunk, amely valóban pályázott és nyert is pénzt a Norvég Civil Támogatási Alaptól (HAH!!!). Igen, mi szerveztünk tüntetést - többek között - Lázár János ellen (HAH-HAH!!) amikor ő betámadta az egykori origo szerkesztőségét, ezzel támadva a magyar sajtó szabadságát. Igen, emiatt sokan külföldi ügynöknek tartanak bennünket, és igen, még az összeesküvés-elméletekre kevésbé fogékony polgártársakban is van egyfajta félsz velünk kapcsolatban. De egyrészről azt gondoljuk, hogy ez rendben van - nyugodtan legyünk szkeptikusak és kritikusak egymással szemben, ez csak építi az amúgy súlyosan rohadó közállapotainkat - másrészt pedig nézzetek körbe a honlapunkon, mert ennél sokkal több dologgal foglalkozunk! Az elmúlt egy évben szerveztünk fórumot a Múzeum Negyed tervezett megépítése kapcsán ugyanúgy, ahogy tanszereket vettünk a hiánnyal küzdő iskoláknak, bemutatva a központosítás működésképtelenségét. Szerveztünk oknyomozó workshopot, adatbázist építettünk a 2010-2014 közötti kormányzati döntésekről, kritikáját adtuk a Magyar Művészeti Akadémia működésének, és csináltunk még ezeken kívül is sok más mindent. 

OK, és MI a baj az oroszokkal, hát a gáz is onnan jön! Azzal mi nincs rendben, hogy nem akarunk télen megfagyni?! Haló! És az rendben lenne, hogy az a nép, amely '89-'90-ben nemet mondott az egypártrendszerre, a KGST-re, Gorbacsov és Jelcin állameszményére, az most Orbán szűklátókörűsége és harácsolhatnékja miatt az orosz népet (és az ukránt, a tatárt, a csecsent, stb.) elnyomó, az emberi jogokat szemberöhögő volt titkosügynök karjaiba akarja visszavezetni a hazánkat? 
Szerintem a ruszkik nem hülyék. Ha nem bírnák a pasast, akkor elkergetnék a választáson, vagy tüntetnének ellene. 
Hát, sajnos az a baj, hogy megpróbálták mindkettőt, sőt még annál is többet, de nem jártak sikerrel. Putyin uralkodása alatt több mint 100 újságírót öltek meg vagy zártak rács mögé. Bizonyított tény, hogy Putyin 2011-ben brutálisan elcsalta a parlamenti választásokat.  Oroszországban törvényben tiltják a káromkodást a színházi előadásokban, filmekben és tévé adásokban. Ugyanígy tiltva van a "homoszexuális propaganda" ami tovább fokozta a leszbikus, meleg, biszexuális és transznemű emberekkel szembeni gyűlöletet, és számos, velük szemben elkövetett brutális bűncselekményt "eredményezett". Oroszországban a legnagyobb a jövedelmi egyenlőtlenség: kisszámú, de bitang gazdag oligarcha kezében összpontosulnak hatalmas vagyonok, miközben milliók nyomorognak. Míg Moszkva a világ legdrágább fővárosa, addig az orosz és az amerikai átlagkereset között ötszörös (!) a különbség. Ja, és a tüntetések! Ha valaki "folytatólagosan" szervez tüntetést, nyilvános találkozót fél éven belül, akkor akár 1 millió rubelre is büntethetik. Akar a halál magának ilyen politikai szövetségest, épp elég nekünk a hazai eresztés! 
OK, ez tényleg elég tré szitu! De mit tudnak tenni mókusörsék a világ egyik szuperhatalmának vezetőjével szemben???? LOL :-))))))))) 

Hát mi magunkban szinte semmit. És nem, ez nem a klasszikus lehúzós duma, hogy támogass, és többen leszünk. Nem. Olyan kampányt akarunk készíteni, amelyhez sokan csatlakozhatnak, és mindenki, aki szeretné, kifejezheti a maga egyéni módján a nemtetszését Putyinnal szemben. Mert szerintünk ez klassz dolog.

Azért kérjük, hogy támogass minket, hogy

1) közösen belekiáltsuk az önkényuraink fülébe - Putyin: NYET!

A Keleti Pályaudvartól a Nyugati Pályaudvarig vonulunk február 16-án 18.00-tól. A vonulás során kis teherautóval szeretnénk kísérni és motiválni a tömeget hangszórókkal, illetve nagy színpaddal várni mindenkit. 
2) szobrot állíthassunk Putyinnak!
Igen, folytatva a régi, szép állam-kapitalista hagyományokat, a testvér-ország diktátorának szobrot kívánunk állítani a belvárosban (jégből, yeah:-), hogy méltóképpen éltessük megjelenését a városban!
3) fórumokat szervezhessünk, és neten streamelhessük őket!
Február 12-én és 14-én a Stúdió K-ban, meghívott szakértőkkel a putyini politizálás veszélyeinek elemzéséért, hogy pontosan értsük, mi a baj! Ha nem élsz Pesten, vagy nem akarsz otthonról este már kimozdulni, akkor sincs baj, mert ha összejön a lóvé, akkor lesz online stream is mindkét rendezvényről!


    Nem is rossz. De azért ez g@ci sok pénz amit kértek. Mi a garancia, hogy nem pattantok meg?
Az összes költésről részletes elszámolást fogunk közzétenni a Humán Platform facebook oldalán. Ahogy ezt tettük az összes korábbi tüntetésünk, és az NCTA pályázatunk kapcsán is. A tüntetés/kampány szervezői semmilyen díjazásban nem részesülnek, a munkájukat önkéntes alapon fogják végezni. Az esetlegesen felhasználásra nem kerülő pénzek sorsáról a közösségnek fogjuk átengedni a döntés jogát, a facebookon lebonyolított szavazás keretében, február 17-ét követően.  OK. Van más módja is a segítségnek?

Persze! Rengeteg (!) önkéntesre és rendezőre lesz szükségünk az elkészült cuccok terítése és a tüntetés megvalósítása során. Ha van rá lehetőséged, jelentkezz az info@humanplatform.hu email címre, és megírjuk miben számítunk a közreműködésedre!

Oszd meg az esemény hírét, támogasd a kampányt, csatlakozz aktivistaként, hogy egy életre megmutassuk a hazaiaknak és a világnak: 
Putyin: NYET!

/// ENGLISH DESCRIPTION ///Well guys, this is the situation: the Russian dictator Vladimir Putin is going to come to Hungary, Budapest on the 17th February. It is not 100% clear right now what is the reason of his visit: it could be something related to the Hungarian-Russian trade offer about the new nuclear plant designed and financed by Russia, or the gas-transportation, or (most probably) Putin tries to convince Hungary's PM Viktor Orbán NOT to vote with yes on the planned sanctions against Russia in the EU. As we said Putin's aims are not clear. There is only one clear thing: any offer, contract between him and Orbán would be a disaster for the Hungarian nation and for the entire European community. Of course we disagree with Putin on several things (including the anti-gay "propaganda" law, the laws against protestors, the cheats on the voting system, etc.) and we truly believe he is a disaster for the Russian nation too. That's why we want not just protest against the bastard, but show solidarity with the Russian nation, and minorities who are facing great dangerous because of the irresponsible governance of his and his alliances. We're a Hungarian NGO: our main activities are related to advocacy for other NGOs in the human fields (mainly: education, social-care and culture), so we often hold demonstrations, public forums, etc. But this is just part of our activities: beside these we organized workshops for investigative journalists, have made social campaigns to raise awareness of the dramatic situation of the state schools, the state-captured situation of the Hungarian art-institutions, etc. In this campaign we try to raise money in order to organize a pre-campaign, a march and a demonstration in the capital of Hungary for the visit of Putin. Thank you in advance for any contribution to our campaign! If you have the possibility please come on the 16th demonstration to Hungary join to us and hold a transparent with our slogan in your language! We need common political activities and solidarity more than ever!

story:
Short Summary

A little over a year ago, I was able to return to Rwanda, Africa where I spent some extended time with the Ba'Twa people just outside Kigali. I was captivated by their original stories and upon research, found that their stories were not preserved anywhere. I told them I would like to capture their stories, put them in print, give them back to them, and release them to the world. I told them a portion of the profits of these books would come back to the tellers of these wonderful stories. One older lady was almost in tears upon hearing that they could make money from these precious stories. She then got very serious and asked what would happen when she died.....I told her I would make sure that her children and her children's children would get the money for the stories she told me. I thought she was going to hug me right then and there. I later learned that this tribe used to rely on their pot making skills to provide food for their village. Their ancestors had told them that this skill would keep them fed. As time has gone on, their pots have not sold and starvation was a real threat. They felt like their ancestors had lied to them. This project can provide much needed income to these people and a sense of importance as the keeper of the stories of Rwanda.

I'm Flavia Everman and I have been to Rwanda a total of 5 times, each one getting more exciting as I discover more opportunities to help people worldwide. I have collected a total of 10 stories, have gotten them twice translated for accuracy and even have the paintings and music score for one of the stories. I'm stuck at the publishing and copyright stage and THIS is where you come in. I have to have money up front to get these stories ready for the publishers, get them published and make sure they are correctly copyrighted so that the Ba'Twa are the OWNERS of these stories, which means an international copyright is needed. This concept is very important to me as these stories belong to them and I want to make sure THEY receive full acknowledgement for them. I am returning to Rwanda in a few months to collect more stories so your donation will also be used for transportation, translators, guides, artists, art supplies and publishing. I really appreciate your help and may God bless you.

What I Need & What You'll Get

With $2,000, I'll be able to pay for a part of my transportation (I've been saving on my own and have most of the plane ticket) which will include motorcycle taxis, bicycle taxis and buses. I'm not afraid to use public transportation. I'll be staying with friends when I'm there, so my housing will be minimal. That way, I can use the funding for what I really need to use it for: Publishing, Copyright, Artist, Art Supplies, Translators, paper supplies and everything else that publishing books will cost. If I don't get full funding, I will use what I get along with local donations to go as far as I can. As said earlier, I have 10 stories already in my possession, but I need the money to get them out to the world. As I receive funding, they WILL BE INTERNATIONALLY COPYRIGHTED AND PUBLISHED! If I receive MORE than I am requesting, then that money will be used to collect MORE stories, get them translated, hire Rwandan artists and get MORE stories out to the world. Oh, this is exciting!

For ALL of those who donate at any level, you will get a running blog of my journey, complete with photos along the way. The internet is spotty over there, so it might not be every day, but I dare say  it will be an interesting read when you get them. I've done this in the past for my travels. For donations of $100 or more, I'll make sure you get at least one completed Ba'Twa original story, complete with Rwandan art done by a Rwandan genocide survivor, who also will be paid for his/her services for each book. This is an unique situation also. Rwandan jobs are largely given to relatives. As the orphans left after the 1994 genocide have no family, jobs are hard to get, no matter how qualified. This opportunity to paint for these books is a huge blessing for them. 

Thank you once again for considering giving to this campaign. This money will go a long way in Rwanda and will be appreciated by so many people. I'm hoping to make bookmarks of some of the Rwandan artwork for the books, so if you want one, let me know!

The Impact

The stories I collect will be one-of-a-kind because the Ba'Twa have been passing these stories down through word of mouth throughout their generations. These stories are original folklore of the people of Rwanda. Many more citizens of Rwanda are becoming educated and are essentially throwing their old ways out the window, including their stories. I was talking to a Canadian couple the last time I visited and mentioned that I was afraid some of these stories might be lost in just a generation or two. They said it might be sooner than that. With this project I want to stress to the Rwandans just how important their literature is to them and the world. It reflects their culture, their history, them. 

The Ba'Twa are the poorest members of the country and I'd like to reward them for carrying the stories of their countrymen throughout the ages. This means that I will be giving them a JOB! For every book that I collect, I will include on the cover the name of the Ba'Twa who told me the story and include a little history of the story. That person, every time that book sells, will get 33% of the proceeds. I'm also employing genocide orphans as artists for these stories. In Rwanda, most jobs are given to relatives by a manger or owner of a company. The orphans generally have no relatives left and therefore have an extremely hard time finding employment. This project will also help them, as the illustrator for each book will also receive 33% of the proceeds of that book. 

With your help, we can preserve something that may one day become extinct without this project, we can help the poor by teaching them the value of their words, stories and artwork. I'm really looking forward to learning more about these people and sharing this story with you and the rest of the world. I hope you can join me. 

Risks & Challenges

I have just found out that my favorite translator is doing a volunteer work in Germany and won't be in Rwanda while I am there. God gave him to me by an accidental meeting at the Rwandan Library and so I am confident that God will supply another equally talented translator this year.

On my last trip, I began learning Kinyarwandan (the language) and became quite proficient on the public transportation. I still have things to learn and this year will be no exception. I live humbly and simply, like the people there.

Other Ways You Can Help

Oh, if you don't have the extra money at the moment, please just take a spare minute of your time and share this with your friends and family who might have an extra dollar or two and might be interested in helping. Let's RAISE THE ROOF!!

Indiegogo makes it easy by supplying easy share tools. Thanks again!

Also, if you are in my area and would like to donate yarn, art supplies (glue, colored pencils, watercolors and such) let me know as I'll be taking as many art supplies as the airlines will allow me to take.

story:
PHOENIX: CHANGING THE WAY YOU SEE THE WORLD WITH HIS NEW BOOK PROJECT:

PHOENIX RISING: LIFE’S NEW BEGINNING


By donating to this project you will be helping change the world.

A TIME FOR HEALING

By reaching out and helping this book project launch, it will enlighten you and those who read it.

A NEW PATH

Your contributions will empower you to make a difference.

MAKE A CHANGE

This book production is already set in motion and the book is already being written. Your appreciated donation will bring the book into fruition. As you can see, we have already created the promotional videos to intrigue your interest.

 We have thankfully achieved our first goal of this project with the help of receiving generous donations from friends and colleagues in the entertainment industry and the corporate world who believed in me and saw my visions, and for that I am forever grateful.

I, Phoenix, have created and designed the book cover artwork and conceptualized the promotional video trailer for the book. I am a very visual person and it only inspires me to write more creatively when I see my vision before me in a book cover form or an artistic video trailer.

We are now seeking outside help to jump start this book project while I am still in the writing and editing phase. We gladly appreciate any donation you can afford. The magnitude of any donation is worth more than you could know.

By showing that you care, this project is 100% guaranteed and will become a reality. The next phase will be the book composition and layout design required before sending to the printers.

As the author, I seek to motivate, inform and inspire those who read my forthcoming book.

PHOENIX RISING: LIFE’S NEW BEGINNING

An eloquently written inspirational guide to helping people find the key to their life anew and Phoenix’s brilliant masterpiece

ARE YOU READY TO MAKE A CHANGE IN YOUR LIFE?

Dynamic author, motivational speaker and entrepreneur, PHOENIX has won numerous awards and has funded several charitable organizations and programs for children.

Government officials have bestowed upon him Proclamation Awards for his success and outstanding work and dedication to the community.

Phoenix has worked with world renowned celebrities in the entertainment industry as well as pro athletes from the MLB, NBA, and NFL.

Phoenix has helped countless people find the key to their life and a new beginning.

·  Balance Your Life

·  Find the key to success

·  Get spiritually connected

·  Help strengthen “you”

·  Overcome your weaknesses

·  Develop new life skills

Share Phoenix’s experience of what he endured, what enlightened him, and how he is beginning life anew!

In order to free yourself, one must free their mind.

Start living today and live free!

**IMPORTANT** Your Tax Deductible Donation Does Double Time!!

Not only are we crusading to raise funds to publish Phoenix Rising: Life’s New Beginning, but portions of the proceeds raised from my crowdfunding campaign will be donated to the Alzheimer’s Association.

Anyone who knows someone with Alzheimer’s disease or has seen the movies “The Notebook” starring Gena Rowlands, James Garner and Rachel McAdams, and recent Oscar winner, “Still Alice,” starring Julianne Moore, Alec Baldwin, and Kristen Stewart, knows this deadly disease can plague anyone since it cannot be prevented, cured or even slowed.

Fact: An estimated 5.2 million Americans have Alzheimer's disease in 2014,including approximately 200,000 individuals younger than age 65 who have younger-onset Alzheimer's.

Fact: More than 500,000 seniors die each year because they have Alzheimer's. If Alzheimer's was eliminated, half a million lives would be saved a year.

Fact: Alzheimer's is officially the 6th leading cause of death in the United States and the 5th leading cause of death for those aged 65 and older. It kills more than prostate cancer and breast cancer combined.

Fact: Deaths from Alzheimer's increased 68 percent between 2000 and 2010, while deaths from other major diseases decreased. Alzheimer's disease is the only cause of death among the top 10 in America that cannot be prevented, cured or even slowed.

Please help in the fight for this deadly incurable disease by donating to our inspiring project and worthy cause.

“Let us always remember and never forget.” ~words by Phoenix ~

Thank you from the bottom of my heart for reading my story and please share my campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, and other social media outlets with those that want to be inspirited, those that have a heart, those that like to read and those that want to gain knowledge.

For those who may want to know more about me, PHOENIX, the author, here’s a brief summary of my career below:

BIOGRAPHY

Phoenix the dynamic author, philosopher, motivational speaker, intellectual and logician, has helped countless people find the key to their life and a new beginning. Phoenix has funded several charitable organizations and programs for children. Phoenix has made numerous contributions and volunteered his time and efforts for many worthy causes such as the Board of Education, American Cancer Society, Make A Wish Foundation, United Negro College Fund, and AIDS Foundation. Organizing and sponsoring a celebrity softball game, Phoenix brought together recording artists such as The Jacksons, and professional athletes from the NFL and NBL to help raise money for abused and homeless children.  Phoenix donated his time to helping the Youth on the Rise Foundation, founded by former Oakland Raiders player, A.C. Caswell, helping to bring programs for the Valley of the Sun’s underprivileged youth.  In his never-ending quest to bring happiness and joy to children, Phoenix brought celebrity performers to St. Joseph’s Hospital Children’s Ward to brighten the lives and spirits of the children in the hospital during the holiday season. 

Phoenix also participated in and helped develop the Dreams Do Come True Foundation annual events for higher learning by coming together and joining forces with Governor of Arizona, Jane D. Hull; the Mayor of Phoenix, Arizona, Skip Rimsza; and the Mayor of Los Angeles, California, Richard J. Riordan. The Dreams Do Come True Foundation and its programs were designed to help children learn to say no to drugs, get an education, and follow their dreams. Phoenix was honored with special Proclamation Awards from the Mayor of Los Angeles, California, Richard J. Riordan and the Mayor of Phoenix, Arizona, Skip Rimsza.

Phoenix, born Arthur Phoenix and raised in Brooklyn, New York, was also commended for his dedication to his hometown community of Brooklyn, New York, by the Mayor of New York City, Michael R. Bloomberg, and Brooklyn Borough President, Marty Markowitz, who have bestowed upon him Proclamation Awards for his success and outstanding work and dedication to the community.

Phoenix, a former spokesperson for the Jackson family has also managed one of the famous Jackson brothers, Tito Jackson. Seeing the potential and diversity in Tito Jackson as a performer, Phoenix is responsible for helping to pioneer Tito’s solo career and launch him as a Blues artist. Phoenix has been interviewed by the media in news outlets around the world regarding his professional commentary and expertise on Michael Jackson and the Jackson family. 

Phoenix, the acclaimed author, has also written three compelling books:

Touched by the Jacksons, a riveting music autobiography that intertwines Phoenix’s life story with a unique, in-depth chronicle of the Jacksons’ careers Michael Jackson: The Lie Becomes the Truth, a vivid, first-time-ever told, insightful perspective on the life of the late Michael Jackson. Phoenix Rising: Life’s New Beginning, an eloquently written powerful and inspiring guide to helping people find the key to their life anew and Phoenix’s brilliant masterpiece

Phoenix’s talents and his extraordinary abilities have taken him all over the globe.  His career even expanded into the lucrative world of modeling, as he has modeled high fashion clothing for top designers such as Gianni Versace, Hermes, and Jean Paul Gaultier.

Using his expertise, Phoenix has gone behind the scenes, working with major corporations, record labels, and film companies worldwide.  Managing and operating his own public relations firm, Phoenix has worked with such prestigious clients as former heavyweight boxing champion, Mike Tyson, BET’s 20th Anniversary, SoSoDef Sports Management, the 1998 Billboard Music Awards, Smokey Robinson, and many others.  He is highly acclaimed as an author, a music historian, and an expert in the field of entertainment.

The Dancing Machine Review show, the first and only Tribute to the Jackson Five, is the brainchild of its founder and producer, Phoenix. The Dancing Machine Review is a breathtaking show that features a nostalgic medley of The Jackson Five and The Jacksons number #1 classic hits from the 70’s and 80’s including I Want You Back, ABC, The Love You Save, I’ll Be There, Dancing Machine, Shake Your Body (Down to the Ground), along with the King of Pop, Michael Jackson’s multi-million selling hit, Don’t Stop ‘til you Get Enough, Wanna Be Startin’ Somethin’, and many more. It is a truly awesome retrospect that renders a standing ovation each and every time!  The Dancing Machine Review is a must-see show for all audiences around the world that captures the nostalgia of The Jackson Five and the magic of The Jacksons. 

Phoenix is a man of many talents including music biography author, performer, show producer, and music and entertainment historian. His expertise in the field of music and entertainment spans over a century, from the black and white motion picture films from the silent and talkie eras, to the birth of Jazz, Blues, then Rock and Roll, to the more modern forms of music today. Most specifically, Phoenix’s expertise lies in the last four decades of music and entertainment, to which he has lived and witnessed firsthand.

Phoenix can quote with the utmost accuracy, times, dates and events of the last forty years of entertainment history without any reference other than his own internal cerebral encyclopedia of facts. Without question, he clearly surpasses most other music historians of this generation with his knowledge of entertainment history and its effect on the culture and people from that moment in time.

Phoenix is one of the most informed music historians of our time who will provide powerful insight, detail, and fact, and how it all ties in together with the artist of whom he is speaking, for a truly unforgettable experience.

Phoenix also ventured into another media realm with his own Phoenix Rising Radio Show featuring Phoenix discussing hot topics on relationships, success, life skills and so much more.

Currently, Phoenix’s mission is to spread consciousness and awareness to people of all ages and nationalities worldwide by enlightening and educating the populace with his superb speeches of encouragement and inspiration.

“I want to continue to be the voice that leads many for so very few that can’t speak and the echo that carries the words of the great leaders that have left their legacy for mankind.”

  ~Phoenix~
story_txt:
PHOENIX: CHANGING
THE WAY YOU SEE THE WORLD WITH HIS NEW BOOK PROJECT: 
PHOENIX
RISING: LIFE’S NEW BEGINNING


By donating to this project you will
be helping change the world. 
A TIME FOR HEALING
By reaching
out and helping this book project launch, it will enlighten you and those who
read it.
A NEW PATH
Your
contributions will empower you to make a difference.
MAKE A CHANGE
This book
production is already set in motion and the book is already being written. Your
appreciated donation will bring the book into fruition. As you can see, we have
already created the promotional videos to intrigue your interest. We have thankfully
achieved our first goal of this project with the help of receiving generous
donations from friends and colleagues in the entertainment industry and the
corporate world who believed in me and saw my visions, and for that I am forever
grateful.
I, Phoenix, have created and designed the
book cover artwork and conceptualized the promotional video trailer for the
book. I am a very visual person and it only inspires me to write more creatively
when I see my vision before me in a book cover form or an artistic video
trailer. 
We are now seeking outside help to jump
start this book project while I am still in the writing and editing phase. We gladly
appreciate any donation you can afford. The magnitude of any donation is worth
more than you could know.
By showing
that you care, this project is 100% guaranteed and will become a
reality. The next phase will be the book composition and layout design required
before sending to the printers.
As the author, I seek to motivate,
inform and inspire those who read my forthcoming book.


PHOENIX
RISING: LIFE’S NEW BEGINNING
An eloquently
written inspirational guide to helping people find the key to their life anew
and Phoenix’s brilliant
masterpiece 
ARE YOU READY TO MAKE A CHANGE IN YOUR
LIFE?
Dynamic author, motivational
speaker and entrepreneur, PHOENIX has
won numerous awards and has funded several charitable organizations and
programs for children.
Government officials have
bestowed upon him Proclamation Awards for his success and outstanding work and
dedication to the community. 
Phoenix has worked with world
renowned celebrities in the entertainment industry as well as pro athletes from
the MLB, NBA, and NFL. 
Phoenix has helped countless people find the key to their
life and a new beginning.
· 
Balance
Your Life
· 
Find
the key to success
· 
Get
spiritually connected
· 
Help strengthen
“you”
· 
Overcome
your weaknesses
· 
Develop
new life skills
Share Phoenix’s
experience of what he endured, what enlightened him, and how he is beginning
life anew!
In order to free yourself, one must free their mind.
Start living today and live free!
**IMPORTANT**
Your Tax Deductible Donation Does Double Time!!
Not only are we crusading to raise funds to publish Phoenix
Rising: Life’s New Beginning, but portions of the proceeds raised from
my crowdfunding campaign will be donated to the Alzheimer’s Association.
Anyone who knows someone with Alzheimer’s disease or has
seen the movies “The Notebook” starring
Gena Rowlands, James Garner and Rachel McAdams, and recent Oscar winner, “Still
Alice,” starring Julianne Moore, Alec Baldwin, and Kristen Stewart, knows
this deadly disease can plague anyone since it cannot be prevented, cured or
even slowed. 
Fact: An estimated 5.2 million
Americans have Alzheimer's disease in 2014,including approximately 200,000 individuals
younger than age 65 who have younger-onset Alzheimer's.
Fact: More than 500,000 seniors die
each year because they have Alzheimer's. If Alzheimer's was eliminated, half a
million lives would be saved a year.
Fact: Alzheimer's
is officially the 6th leading cause of death in the United States and the 5th
leading cause of death for those aged 65 and older. It kills more than prostate
cancer and breast cancer combined.
Fact: Deaths
from Alzheimer's increased 68 percent
between 2000 and 2010, while deaths from other major diseases decreased. Alzheimer's disease is the
only cause of death among the top 10 in America that cannot be prevented, cured
or even slowed. 
Please help in the fight for this deadly incurable disease by
donating to our inspiring project and worthy cause. 
“Let us always remember and never forget.” ~words by Phoenix ~ 
Thank you from the bottom of my heart for reading my story and
please share my campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, and other social media
outlets with those that want to be inspirited, those that have a heart, those
that like to read and those that want to gain knowledge.
For those who may want to know more about me, PHOENIX, the author, here’s a brief summary
of my career below:

philosopher, motivational speaker, intellectual and logician, has helped
countless people find the key to their life and a new beginning. Phoenix has funded several charitable
organizations and programs for children. Phoenix has made
numerous contributions and volunteered his time and efforts for many worthy
causes such as the Board of Education, American Cancer Society, Make A Wish

story:
****PLEASE NOTE  PHOTOS SHOWN ARE ONLY EXAMPLES FOR A PROFESSIONAL CHILDREN'S BOOK ILLUSTRATOR.

Hi, my name is Biff Yeager.  My daughter Katrina and I have co-authored a children's book.  It's titled SMOKEY THE CAT (finds her purr), and is about a cat that wakes one day thinking she lost her purr.  She goes all over the house looking in closets, under the couch, in her bed.  She asks all the other pets in the household and finally finds her purr in the most important place of all.

Although a nice bedtime story for children it has a twofold message.  Assuring that security and comfort is found with those who love you, and subtly teaching children the responsibilities and rewards of taking care of pets.

About us, we're somewhat of an entertainment family.  Katrina graduated LAMDA as a stage lighting designer and has lit productions in both England and the US.  She now resides in Portland OR, with her SO and their two year old son Andrew.  She is devoting more and more of her time to her first love, writing. 

I've been a character actor all my life and have been lucky to make enough of a living to keep a roof over my head and send Katrina to college.  Semi-retired in the mountains in Frazier Park CA, I'm spending more time with various art projects and writing, including this book and a few others we have in mind.

Both my daughter and I have written off and on pretty much all our lives.  Not as professionals, but for our own or our friends' enjoyment.  Now we would like your help in self publishing this delightful illustrated children's book.

We plan to print hard copies and donate one book to all 20 libraries in both Portland and Frazier Park, and to as many pre-schools as we can, as well as hard copies for perks to contributors.  We are also looking into self publishing through Amazon.

We are looking for $4500 to fund this book. Most of these funds will help with the costs of either paying an illustrator or outright buying appropriate photographs that will help move the story along visually.  We would prefer illustrations over photographs, and a good illustrator charges anywhere from 30 to 100 dollars per illustration.   We need about 33 illustrations.   The funding will also go towards an ISBN number, printing hard copies of the book for the above mentioned donations to libraries, pre-schools,  and some of the perks, plus shipping costs.

A little more about me, as it has to do with some of the perks:  I have sold prints of some of my art work and I am offering various limited edition prints  for some contributors.  We are also offering a very limited edition of a signed trading card of a character I played on Star Trek The Next Generation. To any Trekkie into Star Trek trivia, I played Lt Commander Argyle in a couple of episodes of STTNG.  A movie fan company had me sign a bunch of trading cards.  I have five of my own that I'm going to put up as perks for any contributor that may be interested.

We hope you can help with a contribution, but if not we fully understand and thank you for reading this or watching the video.  If you believe in our project perhaps you can help in other ways just by getting the word out on twitter, facebook or other social media or by using the Indiegogo share tools.  If so, thanks again.

Brief list of perks,
*  PDF, digital, soft copy or hard cover copy of book.
*  Plush, Smokey the cat toy.
*  Limited edition prints of art work.
*  Very limited (only 5 copies) personally signed Star Trek TNG trading card.

Biff & Katrina Yeager

story:
Cormònslibri: Festival del libro e dell’informazione (www.cormonslibri.it, www.cormonslibri.eu ), è una co-organizzazione tra il promotore e sostenitore Comune di Cormòns e il coordinamento e l’ideazione dell’associazione Culturaglobale. Con il sostegno della Regione FVG, Fondazione Cassa Risparmio Gorizia, Provincia di Gorizia, Ilcam Spa, ospita personaggi del mondo della letteratura, del giornalismo, dell'arte e molto altro; una finestra sul mondo della creatività letteraria e artistica, ma anche un modo per informare e dare conoscenza; voci e opinioni diverse di personaggi di livello nazionale e internazionale. Attraverso la testimonianza, ricerca e inchiesta di scienziati, giornalisti, scrittori, filosofi, uomini di culto e opinionisti, con punti di vista diversi e innovativi, interessano il pubblico con argomenti di attualità come legalità, diversità, ambiente, economia, informazione, filosofia, religione, politica, problematiche come la migrazione e la violenza sulle donne.

Diverse le collaborazioni, come MicroMega, Festival Vicino Lontano Premio Terzani, èStoria, Associazione ApertaMente, Conservatorio J. Tomadini di Udine, Università degli Studi di Udine, Club UNESCO di Gorizia e Udine, Biblioteca Statale Isontina, e altre.

Tra i molti ospiti illustri passati nella sala Italia di Cormòns, menzioniamo: 
Marco Travaglio, Dacia Maraini, David Riondino, Marcello Veneziani, Fausto Bertinotti, Riccardo Iacona, Paolo Flores D'Arcais, Ferdinando Imposimato, Piercamillo Davigo, Nicola Gratteri, Antonio Nicaso, Armando Spataro, Margherita Hack, Fulvio Ervas, Piero Angela, Loris Mazzetti, Sandro Ruotolo, Giulietto Chiesa, Benedetta Tobagi, Massimo Somaglino, Franco Feruglio, Marcel-lo Fois, Nicolò Ammaniti, Telmo Pievani, Edoardo Boncinelli, Stefano Bartezzaghi, Devis Bonanni, Emilio Casalini, Maurizio Pal-lante, Andrea Molesini, Pierluigi Cappello, Tommaso Cerno, Giovanna Casadio, Nada Malanima, Gad Lerner, Lirio Abbate, Fabio Franzin, Gianmario Villalta, Gianni Vattimo, Giulio Giorello, Gianni Mura e Tommaso Notarianni per Emergency, Zap Mangusta, Olivero Beha, Luca Bianchini, Lidia Ravera, Andrea Segrè, Carlo Tecce, Fabio Stassi, Umberto Curi, Giorgio Pressburger, Giusep-pe O. Longo, Marco Rovelli, Jovica Jovic, Shady Hamadi, Sahar Delijani, Ibrahim Kane Annour, Boris Pahor, Dobnik Ivan, Ferk Janko, Hirschman Jack, Hocevar Andrej, Janus Gustav, Veeselko Vlasta, Mariko Masuda, Szuliowsky Sarolta, Stanisic Bozidar, Octavio Prenz Juan, Vivian Lamarque, Veit Heinichen, Fabio Tonacci, Pierpaolo Farina, Tullio Avoledo, Ferdinando Camon, Ales-sandro Mantovani, Pino Roveredo, Michele Serra, Giovanna Zucconi, Franco Loi, don Virginio Colmegna, don Albino Bizzotto, don Pierluigi Di Piazza, Vittorio Cogliati Dezza Presidente nazionale di Legambiente, Roberto Burdese Presidente nazionale di Slow Food, Gaspare & Zuzzurro, Gianni Mura, Bruno Pizzul, Sergio Staino, Salvo Sottile, Beppino Englaro, Paolo Maurensig, Giuliana Sgrena, Vauro, Antonio Caprarica, Luca Mercalli, Marco Giovanetti, Nello Cristianini, Teatro dei Piedi di Veronica Gon-zales, Sergio Canciani, Gualtiero Bertelli, Stefania Limiti, Zap Mangusta, Dino Zoff, Francesco Guccini, Loriano Macchiavelli, Cé-cile Kyenge, Anna Vinci, Adriana Valerio, Stefano Malatesta, Flavio Tranquillo, Sergio Tavcar, Mina Welby, Peppe Dell'Acqua, Flavio Caroli, Claudio Fava, Lucia Capuzzi, Remo Anzovino, Mauro Covacich, Corradino Mineo, Francesco Facchinetti, Omero Antonutti, Marco Ardemagni, Massimo Cirri, Live" in sala della trasmissione radiofonica "Un giorno da pecora" condotta da Claudio Sabelli Fioretti e Giorgio Lauro con gli ospiti Deborah Serracchiani, Mauro Corona e Maurizio Zamparini e Divino Otel-ma, Massimo Somaglino, Paolo Zoppolatti e Mauro Improta, Vicsia Portel e Mercedes Vela Cossio (inviati di Ballarò) con una intervista sul tema “La felicità necessaria”, I Mombu, Daniele Biacchessi, Veronìca Gonzalez, Teatro Incerto, Federica Manzon, Furio Honsell, Dario Vergassola, Teatro del Piccione di Genova, Teatro Rivarrun di Cagliari, Eraldo Pecci, Marina Viola, Stefano Valenti, Stefano Piedimonte, Cristiano Cavina, Angelo Ferracuti, Flavia Perina, Marcello Simoni, e molti altri; per i bambini si sono tenuti incontri e laboratori con: Guido Quarzo, Roberto Piumini, Bruno Tognolini, Anna Lavatelli, Nicoletta Costa, Febe Sillani, Chiara Carminati, Giusi Quarenghi, Luca Cognolato, Anna Vivarelli, Sergio Bozzi, Luciano Comida e Alfredo Stoppa, Anto-nio Ferrara … 

È un festival in continua ascesa, nell’edizione 2014, che ha contato circa 80 eventi in 40 giornate, hanno assistito gratuitamente oltre 20 mila spettatori/visitatori, compreso il Festival di Poesia&Musica, provenienti da tutta la Ragione e oltre, sia per la mostra mercato del libro, che per gli incontri con gli ospiti, a dibattiti, spettacoli, musica, teatro, arte, con una notevole ricaduta sul territorio. Personaggi, quelli presenti nelle edizioni, di rilievo nazionale e internazionale, che fanno diventare questa manifestazione una delle più importanti in Regione e in Italia, grazie al grande successo di critica e di pubblico, e alla visibilità data dai mezzi di comunicazione televisivi e radiofonici, sul web, sui giornali e settimanali. Nata come kermesse orientata a presentare gli autori ed i loro libri, Cormònslibri è da sempre aperta alle varie contaminazioni dell’arte; interessa mediamente 1.300 studenti delle scuole di ogni ordine e grado con conferenze (sulla legalità), spettacoli, laboratori, film e molto altro. Diverse nelle edizioni le produzioni firmate Culturaglobale: dal teatro alla pubblicazione di libri. Cormònslibri è teatro civile e letture sceniche, Arte con 3-4 mostre allestite negli spazi espositivi dislocati sul territorio comunale; è anche solidarietà con diverse raccolte di fondi; è Musica d’autore dalla classica a quella contemporanea soffermandosi particolarmente alla musica jazz che a Cormòns è motivo di diverse manifestazioni internazionali.

Nel contesto di Cormònslibri sono inserite diverse manifestazioni. Come la 7a edi-zione del Festival itinerante internazionale di Poesia&Musica “Acque di acqua” (www.festivalinternazionalepoesia.it ), la maggiore manifestazione poetico-musicale della regione.

il Premio letterario Cormònslibri (www.premioletterariocormonslibri.it ), gratuito e libero a tutti nella partecipazione.

AmbientArti (www.ambientarti.info ), un fine settimana dedicato all’ambiente e all’arte, alla sostenibilità e alla bellezza.

Si svolge dal 25 novembre all'8 dicembre 2015.
A Cormòns (GO) in Sala Italia, Teatro Comunale, Sala Civica e altri siti

Diversi eventi si svolgono nelle maggiori città della Regione: Monfalcone, Udine, Cividale del Friuli e altre.

L'ingresso a tutti gli eventi è libero e gratuito

Ci sono diverse iniziative come il piatto Cormònslibri nei ristoranti e altro

nazionale e internazionale. Attraverso la testimonianza, ricerca e inchiesta di
scienziati, giornalisti, scrittori, filosofi, uomini di culto e opinionisti,
con punti di vista diversi e innovativi, interessano il pubblico con argomenti
di attualità come legalità, diversità, ambiente, economia, informazione,
filosofia, religione, politica, problematiche come la migrazione e la violenza
sulle donne.
Diverse le collaborazioni, come MicroMega, Festival Vicino
Lontano Premio Terzani, èStoria, Associazione ApertaMente, Conservatorio J.
Tomadini di Udine, Università degli Studi di Udine, Club UNESCO di Gorizia e
Udine, Biblioteca Statale Isontina, e altre.
Tra i molti ospiti illustri passati nella sala Italia di Cormòns, menzioniamo: Marco Travaglio, Dacia Maraini, David Riondino, Marcello Veneziani, Fausto Bertinotti, Riccardo Iacona, Paolo Flores D'Arcais, Ferdinando Imposimato, Piercamillo Davigo, Nicola Gratteri, Antonio Nicaso, Armando Spataro, Margherita Hack, Fulvio Ervas, Piero Angela, Loris Mazzetti, Sandro Ruotolo, Giulietto Chiesa, Benedetta Tobagi, Massimo Somaglino, Franco Feruglio, Marcel-lo Fois, Nicolò Ammaniti, Telmo Pievani, Edoardo Boncinelli, Stefano Bartezzaghi, Devis Bonanni, Emilio Casalini, Maurizio Pal-lante, Andrea Molesini, Pierluigi Cappello, Tommaso Cerno, Giovanna Casadio, Nada Malanima, Gad Lerner, Lirio Abbate, Fabio Franzin, Gianmario Villalta, Gianni Vattimo, Giulio Giorello, Gianni Mura e Tommaso Notarianni per Emergency, Zap Mangusta, Olivero Beha, Luca Bianchini, Lidia Ravera, Andrea Segrè, Carlo Tecce, Fabio Stassi, Umberto Curi, Giorgio Pressburger, Giusep-pe O. Longo, Marco Rovelli, Jovica Jovic, Shady Hamadi, Sahar Delijani, Ibrahim Kane Annour, Boris Pahor, Dobnik Ivan, Ferk Janko, Hirschman Jack, Hocevar Andrej, Janus Gustav, Veeselko Vlasta, Mariko Masuda, Szuliowsky Sarolta, Stanisic Bozidar, Octavio Prenz Juan, Vivian Lamarque, Veit Heinichen, Fabio Tonacci, Pierpaolo Farina, Tullio Avoledo, Ferdinando Camon, Ales-sandro Mantovani, Pino Roveredo, Michele Serra, Giovanna Zucconi, Franco Loi, don Virginio Colmegna, don Albino Bizzotto, don Pierluigi Di Piazza, Vittorio Cogliati Dezza Presidente nazionale di Legambiente, Roberto Burdese Presidente nazionale di Slow Food, Gaspare & Zuzzurro, Gianni Mura, Bruno Pizzul, Sergio Staino, Salvo Sottile, Beppino Englaro, Paolo Maurensig, Giuliana Sgrena, Vauro, Antonio Caprarica, Luca Mercalli, Marco Giovanetti, Nello Cristianini, Teatro dei Piedi di Veronica Gon-zales, Sergio Canciani, Gualtiero Bertelli, Stefania Limiti, Zap Mangusta, Dino Zoff, Francesco Guccini, Loriano Macchiavelli, Cé-cile Kyenge, Anna Vinci, Adriana Valerio, Stefano Malatesta, Flavio Tranquillo, Sergio Tavcar, Mina Welby, Peppe Dell'Acqua, Flavio Caroli, Claudio Fava, Lucia Capuzzi, Remo Anzovino, Mauro Covacich, Corradino Mineo, Francesco Facchinetti, Omero Antonutti, Marco Ardemagni, Massimo Cirri, Live" in sala della trasmissione radiofonica "Un giorno da pecora" condotta da Claudio Sabelli Fioretti e Giorgio Lauro con gli ospiti Deborah Serracchiani, Mauro Corona e Maurizio Zamparini e Divino Otel-ma, Massimo Somaglino, Paolo Zoppolatti e Mauro Improta, Vicsia Portel e Mercedes Vela Cossio (inviati di Ballarò) con una intervista sul tema “La felicità necessaria”, I Mombu, Daniele Biacchessi, Veronìca Gonzalez, Teatro Incerto, Federica Manzon, Furio Honsell, Dario Vergassola, Teatro del Piccione di Genova, Teatro Rivarrun di Cagliari, Eraldo Pecci, Marina Viola, Stefano Valenti, Stefano Piedimonte, Cristiano Cavina, Angelo Ferracuti, Flavia Perina, Marcello Simoni, e molti altri; per i bambini si sono tenuti incontri e laboratori con: Guido Quarzo, Roberto Piumini, Bruno Tognolini, Anna Lavatelli, Nicoletta Costa, Febe Sillani, Chiara Carminati, Giusi Quarenghi, Luca Cognolato, Anna Vivarelli, Sergio Bozzi, Luciano Comida e Alfredo Stoppa, Anto-nio Ferrara … È un festival in continua ascesa, nell’edizione 2014, che ha
contato circa 80 eventi in 40 giornate, hanno assistito gratuitamente oltre 20
mila spettatori/visitatori, compreso il Festival di Poesia&Musica,
provenienti da tutta la Ragione e oltre, sia per la mostra mercato del libro,
che per gli incontri con gli ospiti, a dibattiti, spettacoli, musica, teatro, arte,
con una notevole ricaduta sul territorio. Personaggi, quelli presenti nelle
edizioni, di rilievo nazionale e internazionale, che fanno diventare questa
manifestazione una delle più importanti in Regione e in Italia, grazie al
grande successo di critica e di pubblico, e alla visibilità data dai mezzi di
comunicazione televisivi e radiofonici, sul web, sui giornali e settimanali.
Nata come kermesse orientata a presentare gli autori ed i loro libri,
Cormònslibri è da sempre aperta alle varie contaminazioni dell’arte; interessa
mediamente 1.300 studenti delle scuole di ogni ordine e grado con conferenze
(sulla legalità), spettacoli, laboratori, film e molto altro. Diverse nelle
edizioni le produzioni firmate Culturaglobale: dal teatro alla pubblicazione di
libri. Cormònslibri è teatro civile e letture sceniche, Arte con 3-4 mostre
allestite negli spazi espositivi dislocati sul territorio comunale; è anche
solidarietà con diverse raccolte di fondi; è Musica d’autore dalla classica a
quella contemporanea soffermandosi particolarmente alla musica jazz che a
Cormòns è motivo di diverse manifestazioni internazionali.
Nel contesto di Cormònslibri sono inserite diverse
manifestazioni. Come la 7a edi-zione del Festival itinerante internazionale di
Poesia&Musica “Acque di acqua” (www.festivalinternazionalepoesia.it ), la
maggiore manifestazione poetico-musicale della regione.
il Premio letterario Cormònslibri
(www.premioletterariocormonslibri.it ), gratuito e libero a tutti nella
partecipazione.
AmbientArti (www.ambientarti.info ), un fine settimana
dedicato all’ambiente e all’arte, alla sostenibilità e alla bellezza.
Si svolge dal 25 novembre all'8 dicembre 2015.A Cormòns (GO) in Sala Italia, Teatro Comunale, Sala Civica
e altri siti
Diversi eventi si svolgono nelle maggiori città della
Regione: Monfalcone, Udine, Cividale del Friuli e altre.
L'ingresso a tutti gli eventi è libero e gratuito
Ci sono diverse iniziative come il piatto Cormònslibri nei
ristoranti e altro

story:
Hey everyone!

             My name is Brian Zolenski.  I do freelance computer work as well as assistant work for various clients.  I've lived all over the world, but call Boston my home, and I reside in Los Angeles, California. I've always been fascinated with the human emotions and the extreme states of it, being from artifacts, other people, or just memories that trigger it.  Recently I've been put through one of the most extreme cases of it, and started documenting the most powerful photos and descriptions to my personal journal.  Doing this gave me the idea of how my journal was so unique, but how would it look compared to other people's memories and triggers?
                So my idea is to combine user submitted photographs of their most extreme memories from being completely empty inside and depressed, to loving life fully and being content to the max and share them to the world.  It will be a flip book, where the memories that nurture the soul and give warmth to the heart fully no matter what will be on the "Hope This Finds You Well" side, and if you flip the book over, you will get the memories that destroy the soul and hit you down to the grit in your bones under "I Hope This Finds You Better".  I will also be gathering short non-specific stories behind the photo that I will randomly show at the end of each book, so you as a reader can try and complete the story of the photo yourself.
                  I feel a book like this with such raw emotion will have the reader stuck to the couch just feeling the photos talk to them, and trying to figure out the story behind it, instead of just skimming through a photo book and never picking it up again.  This book will be a great conversation starter, as well as a great test to see how people look at the world and their perspectives. 
                  With your contribution, you will help me bring this book to life.  You will also help tell the story that people want to tell, and help bring healing, pure happiness, and other emotions and experiences in various ways to the people who submitted, as well as the readers who can relate and who has the photos speak to them.  


What We Need & What You Get


  • This project will need a goal of $11,000 to make 1,000 copy print run given out to backers as well as inventory to give to people after the campaign is over. This will also maintain a quality of a print run you would expect from any other successful coffee table book with the ink, hardcover bounding, etc.  This may sound like a lot, but checking with printing houses, and other crowd sourced coffee table books, this is the average request.
  • So I already have some D and B list celebrities promising to submit to the project.  Also have some cool perks that will be given out like personal photographs with the story behind it written on the back by the person who submitted it, as well as a stretch goal to have a book signing party in Los Angeles on launch.
  • If we don't reach the goal, I will see how far away we were. If we have enough to just cover the backers, then I will do a smaller print run.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know times can be tough, and sometimes it just isn't in the running to donate to a campaign that screams at you...so don't worry, there is other ways you can donate!

  • Get the word out!!! Social media now a days is key to showing friends cool projects they should check out.  Well here is one of them.  Share with your friends, spray paint it on walls, tattoo the link to your arm...doesn't matter, lets just get people talking about this!
  • Also don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jess Hagemann. In January 2015 I launched a ghostwriting business called Cider Spoon Stories to help seniors, veterans, and small business owners write their life stories as books. I then decided to offer this same service free of charge to terminally-ill patients at an Austin-based hospice care organization. As a hospice volunteer, I facilitate the Life Review process for patients with life-limiting illnesses, asking open-ended questions and recording their answers. The biggest part of the job is LISTENING, as many patients have no friends or family members to make them feel heard.

Life Reviews are time-consuming projects, but these patients deserve a compassionate ear. While Cider Spoon clients pay for my services, hospice patients never do. Your donation will help 'pay' for non-paying patients to have their life stories promptly and professionally published, granting them the peace of mind that accompanies knowing they will not be forgotten---their stories will survive them!

An accomplished biographer with a Masters degree in Creative Writing, I have both the skills and the heart necessary to help these people literally until their dying day. Cider Spoon began when I wrote my grandfather's life story, completing it just 4 days before he died. What a gift his book was to his grandchildren! Today, you too can give the unlimited gift of legacy to hospice patients in Austin, Texas.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The average cost to write + produce a printed book is $5,000.
  • I'm aiming to write one book that compiles the stories of 5 unique patients.
  • For every $5,000 raised beyond that, five more patients will get the chance to tell their stories.
  • Individual donors in excess of $50 will receive one free perfect-bound copy of the final book + the opportunity to learn from some incredible life lessons. Every donor, regardless of donation level, will receive that warm fuzzy feeling that comes with knowing you helped contribute something AMAZING to the world.

The Impact

  • Think of Life Reviews as time capsules for the current era. You might take everything about modern-day society for granted because you live in it, but fifty years from now the world will look nothing like it does today. Hospice patients, who range in age from 12 to 112, are their own time capsules, bursting with wisdom and dreams and stories. When you help fund a Life Review, you help preserve the past in the present for the future.
  • Kathy* was a hospice patient for whom I completed a Life Review in April. As one of the first female law school graduates in the 1970s, Kathy loved sharing her story of an empowered woman who fought the odds to achieve her life goals! How many more incredible stories can I preserve for posterity with your help?
  • For more excerpts from collected stories, see the Cider Spoon Stories website.

Risks & Challenges

  • Hospice work can naturally be time-sensitive. Not every patient is actively dying, but many wait until very near the end to go on hospice care. As the funds are raised, I will work with Austin hospice organizations to proactively contact patients and arrange interview sessions to record their stories while we still can!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • No money? Trust me, I get it. If you can't donate, please share my campaign through social media and word-of-mouth. 
  • THANK YOU for making a difference in the lives of many right here in Austin, Texas!

Donate now: http://igg.me/at/hospicestories

For more info: www.ciderspoonstories.com

Filmmaker: www.andrewcfisher.wordpress.com

story:
Doors slam, lights flicker, chairs rock, dolls are knocked off of shelves and the sound of a little girl giggling is often heard . A blond hair , blue eyed girl from the 1800’s is seen regularly in our kitchen helping  wash dishes.  We have a ghost, a fun playful ghost that has been  a very interesting addition to our household, her name is Millee.

Millee & Me is a true story about a haunted doll. A couple of years ago while spending the weekend with a friend investigating paranormal activity in the California Gold Country, I acquired an old vintage Raggedy Ann doll at an antique store.  The doll is about 50 years old and very well loved.  After acquiring the doll, almost from the “get-go” weird  “things” started to happen; doors slammed, lights turned on and off and on several occasions a female child’s  voice was heard in the house, when no other females were present. 

After a few weeks of some strange happenings, and me beginning to feel like I was losing my mind, I contacted my friend Jessica and we got out our investigation equipment and lo’ and behold…. We got a response! From the doll!

I named the doll Millee and she is my traveling companion. Millee & I travel through the United States exploring ghost towns, historic buildings, National Parks, haunted hotels and Missions   This book is about living and traveling with Millee. And Millee loves to travel! Millee makes friends wherever she goes,  she always has a blast in Virginia City and she has a fondness for the various California Missions.  She is a very active spirit and the more we travel, the more active she becomes. When Millee & I travel we hide "lucky" caches in various locations, just to have fun & let people know we were there.

 

The book has been written and the photos have been processed. Everything is ready to go to the publisher!!! I am choosing to go with either LuLu.com or Outskirts Press, instead of trying a free ebook self-publisher. Reason being, I want this to succeed, I have never published a book before and I want to make sure it is done correctly.


The funds that I am asking for will be used for the publishing and promoting of the book; Millee and Me.   If there are additional funds that are needed after the $3199, I will be providing them. I want to do this right the first time. There is no risk to you, the book will be published by the end of 2015.  The Millee & Me book will be a 6X9 full color paperback book. The book is about Millee, my haunted doll and traveling with her through-out the USA. We explore a lot of ghost towns, haunted historic buildings, California Missions and we love staying in haunted hotels!  The book will be full of color photos, stories, maps and random musings. This is a "grass roots" project ... I really need your help and support and I cannot tell you enough how much I would appreciate it!


A little about myself; I have recently retired from a very successful career in “Corporate America”. The last 20 years I was employed as an Advertising Consultant for a major publisher. I have extensive experience in marketing and advertising.  I am also a professional photographer and have won several awards in many local photo exhibits; I actually specialize in wildlife and landscape photography.  I have had many pictures published in a variety of different publications.  I am also the photographer for a paranormal group here in California.

My husband and I have been married for 28 years and live in California, we have two grown children, a grand baby on the way and several rescue cats. 

I am a huge history buff and love photographing, traveling and spending my time in the many National Parks of America.  I have a fondness for ghost towns, cathedrals, Missions and historical buildings. I am a paranormal investigator and a  volunteer docent for several historic buildings in No. California. 

Millee and I appreciate your support! We are offering some wonderful rewards for our Contributors; such as limited edition photos, paperback books, calendars and Millee and Me lucky charm caches. Millee and I thank you! You will love this book!

story:
Short Summary

The April 25, Earthquake in Nepal caused a mass of devastation, including avalanches and landslides. One area hit quite badly was the beautiful Langtang Valley, where entire villages were wiped out by a massive landslide, stretching 2-3 kilometres wide.

It is thought around 200 people were killed and still over 60 people who were in the area at the time are unaccounted for, including 23 foreigners from 10 different countries.

Most of the International search and rescue teams have now been recalled. And it is almost impossible to get clearance for them to return. Individual search efforts are difficult due to the scale of the devastation and number of people missing. There is also much competition for resources, with helicopters and people power allocated to ongoing relief efforts.

It makes sense to pool funds in a joint mission. With over 20 years experience, Search and Rescue Dogs Nepal is currently on standby to assist. Located in the nearby town of Pokhara, the dogs and their handlers are professionally trained and know the terrain well. 

Once funded, the team will helicopter into Langtang with 4 Cadaver dogs and spend 10-12 days on a search and recovery mission, in an effort to locate and repatriate any foreigners and locals buried in the landslide.

Search and Rescue Dogs Nepal are non government funded and rely on donations. They estimate that this will cost around US$18,000. 

Sadly, it is not a mission with a happy ending, but it is one of human spirit, compassion and dignity. 

If we surpass this fundraising effort, the extra funds will go to Search and Rescue Dogs Nepal, to assist in ongoing training and future SAR missions for locals and International trekkers.

Short Summary The April 25, Earthquake in Nepal caused a mass of devastation, including avalanches and landslides. One area hit quite badly was the beautiful Langtang Valley, where entire villages were wiped out by a massive landslide, stretching 2-3 kilometres wide.
It is thought around 200 people were killed and still over 60 people who were in the area at the time are unaccounted for, including 23 foreigners from 10 different countries.
Most of the International search and rescue teams have now been recalled. And it is almost impossible to get clearance for them to return. Individual search efforts are difficult due to the scale of the devastation and number of people missing. There is also much competition for resources, with helicopters and people power allocated to ongoing relief efforts.
It makes sense to pool funds in a joint mission. With over 20 years experience, Search and Rescue Dogs Nepal is currently on standby to assist. Located in the nearby town of Pokhara, the dogs and their handlers are professionally trained and know the terrain well. 
Once funded, the team will helicopter into Langtang with 4 Cadaver dogs and spend 10-12 days on a search and recovery mission, in an effort to locate and repatriate any foreigners and locals buried in the landslide.
Search and Rescue Dogs Nepal are non government funded and rely on donations. They estimate that this will cost around US$18,000. 
Sadly, it is not a mission with a happy ending, but it is one of human spirit, compassion and dignity. 
If we surpass this fundraising effort, the extra funds will go to Search and Rescue Dogs Nepal, to assist in ongoing training and future SAR missions for locals and International trekkers.

story:
the plan

We're travelling (mostly) overland from Tbilisi, Georgia to Beiging, China and then all the way to St, Petersburg, Russia by rail. Here’s a very detailed itinerary and map that shows the whole route.

We’ll be immersing ourselves in the cultural and culinary wealth of the places we’ll visit and condensing it all into a cookbook and phrasebook. 

You can learn more about us and follow the trip on our blog and feel free to click around the map to see when we’ll be where and how. If you have any questions, check out our exhaustive and exhausting FAQ and we’d appreciate any feedback, comments and general good will you have to spare. Thanks for your support! – Mike and Kai.

the budget

The full budget for the trip is posted on our blog.

other ways you can help

Like what were doing, but can't afford to contribute? Worry not. There's still plenty you can do online or on the ground.

Help us out by spreading the word.Tell your friends, your friends' friends, and your neighbor's dog. 

Make us / take us out to lunch: we'll give you a shout out on our blog.

Make us / take us out to dinner: we'll send you a post card from Prague and show you around if you're in town.

Give us a traditional recipe (and preferably cook it for us!): You get credit in a soon-to-be-widely acclaimed international culinary opus.

Putting us up: you'll get a huge thank you on the blog. Amazing stories! And friends for life!

Visit us like a wealthy aunt and pay for us for a couple days, we’ll even find you the cheapest flight and tell you how to get a visa.

Or if you like driving, join us in the Stans and get your riding goggles on!

story:
Hello!

My name is Monique P. Rousseau. I'm 23 years old, and a full-time psychology major at Oregon State University. I've long had a love of listmaking books, and during a session with my therapist, I had a brain spark - I should write one of my own! This isn't any old listmaking book though. This book is meant to help you dig deep and find out things about yourself you may not already know - things like your innermost fears, your closest relationships, and your goals in life. It can be used in conjunction with a therapist, or by yourself. By donating to this fund, you'll be helping me support myself and pay the fees associated with continuing to write and eventually publish "List, Know, Grow: Self-Exploration Through Listmaking."


What I Need

I'm trying to raise $6,000. Most of the money will go towards formatting, editing, proofreading, cover design, and finally...publishing! The remaining money will go towards living expenses incurred while writing "List, Know, Grow." If I'm unable to reach my entire goal, I'll put what I've raised towards the above and continue to scrimp and save in order to get this book to my loyal supporters (you!).

Why Am I Doing This?

I've been fortunate enough throughout my life to have access to therapists and medical professionals to help me deal with my clinical anxiety and depression. Through these sessions, I've discovered a lot about myself and about my ability to help others. I know not everyone has access to the same resources I do, so I'd like to enable people to go on a journey of self-discovery...hopefully in a way they'll enjoy!


How I'll Do This

Writing a book is a long process - from coming up with the idea all the way to getting it into stores. There may be times I'll have writers block or a difficult section, but I'm dedicated to finishing this. I hope that's apparent to you. With your help, I truly believe this is possible and that it can change peoples' lives for the better. I plan to have the first copies printed and ready to ship by February 1, 2016.


Unable to Contribute?

Spread the word! Tell your friends and family, post my link to FaceBook, and Tweet all about it to your followers. I appreciate any and all support you're willing to give.

story:
About us.

My name is Denice Grant. I'm a classical pianist and a music teacher. My husband is a retired business man. Between the two of us, we have four children. 


My husband and I have written a book about God, because so many people believe that God is a killer. And we know that the Bible appears to support that view. But after some very careful research we have arrived at the conclusion that this is not true. God is very gentle, caring, and completely nonviolent. 

If you are wondering whether God is a killer of not, then you must read “Have You Been Lied To? God Is Not a Killer.” The evidence from Jesus, the “true witness” (Revelation 3:14) is overwhelming.


The crime scene: EARTH
The accused: GOD
The prosecution: THE ACCUSER (SATAN)
The “true witness:” JESUS CHRIST
The jury: YOU AND I

The verdict is out. Read to find out. 

This is the ultimate “who done it.” Take a look at the evidence before you decide.

We are about to take you on a quest. Come with us to unearth a story of cosmic proportions. This is not fiction; it is real. 

It is a story of a Father, a Son, a mighty angel – the Father and Son’s consummate creation – and the human race. This is a tale of rebellion, betrayal, defamation, propaganda and even tragedy. But it is also a narrative of redemption, hope and the ultimate eradication of evil and death. This is the story of God, His Son Jesus Christ, the fallen angel Lucifer – and of you and me.

This is the ultimate “who done it” case. It is our hope that a comprehensive forensic analysis of the “crime scene” will provide the reader with an overall picture while answering some very specific questions. What emerges will shed great light on the characters of both God and Satan, and on the nature of Satan’s rebellion. Our aim is to exonerate God of all false accusations and lies His enemy has brought against Him, because the truth is, you have been lied to: God is not a killer.

We are not interested in making money out of this book. In fact, we have made a website devoted solely to this book, where people like you can read it for free: www.godisnotakiller.com. But there are people out there that don't read on the internet, so we are raising funds to be able to also print the book. Your financial contributions will help us to print one thousand hard copies so this book will be available to all kinds of readers. We will then sell these books so that we will raise funds to print another batch of books. 

What We Need

  • We are starting small. We need about $5,000 in order to print and ship the book to an Amazon warehouse. 
  • If at first we don't reach our goal we will put this money in an specified account for this project, and then we will start a new campaign. The funds you provide will be added to the final sum.

The Vision

  • In a world where fear and violence are becoming more and more prevalent, what we need most is to understand that violence is not the solution. We feel this project is extremely valuable to the world because it is a study that promotes nonviolence and peace. The book shows where violence began, and really explains the wisdom of living by the peaceful principles taught by Jesus Christ, and how they are the only hope for a peaceful co-existence in the world.
  • This is our first indiegogo project so we are really excited about this.

Risks & Challenges

Our research has taken years. We finally finished the book on March 21, 2016, and made it available on the website. Nothing is going to stop us now! We want everyone to read this book, because it will make a huge difference in their lives, and in the lives of their loved ones. We have children. We know how precious they are. And each of us are just as precious to God, who wants LIFE for us, and not DEATH through violence. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that not everyone is able to contribute. But if you care about this topic here is how you can help:

  • get the word out and and let your friends know about our campaign.
  • use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • You can also go to our website and share the book to your online friends: www.godisnotakiller.com

Together we can change the world.
