story:
What is 'Lots of Watts'?

My name is Sam Loch and I have 20 unbroken years of indoor rowing experience.  I've learned my craft the hard way with plenty of trial and error, but am now the holder of 3 open world records (1 minute, 1000m and 24hr tandem).  I am also a Princeton University graduate, a two-time Olympian (2008, 2012) and my best 2km is 5:49.4.

The purpose of this campaign is to take the information gleaned from my research and experimentation and cram it into your brain.  Without this project the guidance I intend to provide will extend to a those I coach, but may not become available to the public.  You may never find the most effective means of achieving your maximum capacity on the indoor rower.   

In exchange for your support I will not only produce the aforementioned guide, but pursue the 500m World Record in the necessary manner. I will test myself and my methods under the most acute of circumstances.  

I appreciate all of the support I have received thus far, but this is my Mt Everest and you can help me reach the summit whilst I help you reach yours. 

What I Need & What You Get

The creation of an indoor rowing guide has been on my to-do list for years now, but much like mustering a performance on the rower, I do better when there's a strong sense of obligation - with a commitment to the process.  Without the pressure of an expectant audience I fear this project never comes to fruition.  

I've set the funding target at $20,000.  This is the figure that will allow me the resources to assemble the book and train for the World Record simultaneously. As a return on your investment the following perks will be available . . .

  • Lots of Watts - A innovative guide to indoor rowing (ebook)
  • Apparel from The Watt Farm
  • The Watt Farm banners
  • Random international rowing apparel
  • A Skype consultation to personally discuss your performance goals and how to get there
  • A Skype consultation with a customised training program
  • A in-person coaching session

'Lots of Watts' will include topics such as . . .

  • Technique
  • Programming
  • Mindset
  • Nutriton
  • How to construct a training session
  • Drag Factor
  • Specific strength training
  • Mobility, injury prevention and management
  • Race day planning and execution
  • A World Record training log

The 500m World Record training log will include detailed information such as . . .

  • Programming
  • Training session contents
  • Nutrition
  • Supplementation
  • Recuperative therapies
  • Key metrics such as weight, morning heart rate, sleep cycle
  • Personal insights on the training process

Risks & Challenges

If my target is reached I will most definitely assemble the guide, but that does not guarantee I will be successful in my World Record attempt.  In my opinion it is the gnarliest record in all of indoor rowing and it will take every ounce of my capacity to better that performance.  I will not know if my best is good enough unless I try.  I may fail, but will do everything in my power to succeed. 

You will receive perks for your support, but you will also see a man put his balls on the line whilst striving to reach the upper limits of his ability.

story:
About this project

The BOXING LEGENDS is a new independent publication project that is set out to document the rich history of boxing and tell the stories of the greatest men in world of this cruel kind of sports.

The book delves into the rich history of each boxer by telling a short story about his career and personal life.

We are starting the BOXING LEGENDS project by focusing on this kind of sports and the 50 greatest boxers of all times. The aim then being that if this first volume is a success, we'll move into publishing other sports legends around the globe for future volumes.

Our Team

To give this project a life, we’ve pulled together young and ambitious people to represent their respect for great people in the book. Each one of us has a particular role in developing of a significant product. Designers, editors and independent freelancers are involved to represent you such an important collection of examples of human perservance. The BOXING LEGENDS mission is to record the history, to motivate the new young generation for successes in chosen kind of sports.

The Editors

The past several months have seen us delve deep into researching each boxer set to be featured in the book. We've dedicated nights and weekends to sorting this research into concise and accurate descriptions.

The editors for THE BOXING LEGENDS currently include: Aleksandr Gromyk, Inna Lutenko.

story:
The Indiegogo campaign has ended, but you can still donate at the16stories.com.

Sixteen Stories will explore how culture is preserved — or diluted — after immigration, and how one person's life can affect the next generation.

Sixteen Stories

I never would have dreamed that I would stand in my great-grandfather's ancestral home in southern China, or that I would unearth documents from the 1800's listing all the siblings of another great-grandfather we hardly knew anything about. 

These astonishing and surprisingly emotional experiences moved me to further research and start writing a book, called Sixteen Stories, featuring my eight great-grandparents, four grandparents, parents, my brother, and myself. Each story is written in the first person through the eyes of a different person, taking the reader to a specific year between 1895 and 2015, and to a different place: China, Poland, Russia, Latvia, California, Nevada, London.

Every person's chapter is rich with the details of the specific cultural and historic context. You will discover how one story shapes the next: how one person's own history and character affect others, sometimes as an inspiration, and sometimes provoking tragedy. 

While this is a deeply personal project, my aim is for it to be a touching and intriguing work which speaks to all readers through its universal human truths.

I am launching this Indiegogo campaign because carving out time for this endeavour in the mornings and weekends just isn't enough. Having the funds to cover research, writing and editing time, and the book production itself, will mean that the project can keep moving ahead with its current momentum.

I’ll be doing all of the marketing and social media myself, using my expertise as a branding and marketing professional.

The planned publishing date is October 2018. Three chapters are already finished.

See Kate Hammer, storyteller, explain why Sixteen Stories is so important.

The Funding Target & What You'll Get

The funding aim is £25,000, about $33,750. This is divided into research, writing, editing, book production, shipping and fees from payment processing and Indiegogo, as shown below.

With Indiegogo, everything raised will go toward the project, immediately: every single contribution will help.

Thank you (£5 / about $6.65)

Every single contributor will be acknowledged in the book.

Digital book (£10 / about $13.30)

The ebook and your name in the back of the book.

Paperback book (£12 / about $16)

The paperback book, the ebook and your name in the back of the book.

Signed paperback (£15 / about $19.95)

A signed paperback book, the ebook and your name in the back of the book.

Signed paperback twinset (£25 / about $33.25)

Two signed paperback books, the ebook and your name in the back of the book.

Front row twinset (£50 / about $66.50)

Your name in the front of the book, two signed paperback books, plus the ebook.

What's behind the curtain? (£80 / about $106.40)

A glimpse into the process. A 1/2 hr video call with the author, Madelyn Postman, to follow the book's progress and talk about genealogical, historic and literary research and the writing process. The call can be anytime between now and Oct 2018. Also includes your name in the front of the book, a signed paperback book and delivery, and the ebook.

Launch party (£100 / about $133)

Join us for the launch party in London, planned for October 2018. Does not include transport or accommodation. You will also have your name in the front of the book, two signed paperback books and delivery, plus the ebook.

The infinite gratitude package (£500 / about $665)

Join us for the launch party in London, planned for October 2018. Does not include transport or accommodation. You will also have your name in the front of the book, four signed paperback books and delivery, plus the ebook.

 

Every contributor will receive songs from my brother, Anthony Postman: "37 Hours of Saturday" and "This Road".

 

Stretch Goals

If the £25,000 target is exceeded, the first thing I'd like to do is to put more time into the project straight away, so I can move the publication date forward to summer 2018 instead of autumn 2018. The next goal is to add in photographs and documents, since right now the book is planned as text-only. I am open to your input regarding the stretch goals — please share your ideas with me.

 

The Stories

Of the sixteen people portrayed in the book, only three are still alive: my father, brother and me. My great-grandfather, Joe Shoong, is known as one of the first Chinese American millionaires. In the photo below, he is standing next to his son, my grandfather, who is crying while holding a birthday cake.



Another great-grandfather, Sygmunt Postman, was born north west of Warsaw, Poland, into a Jewish family. He died young, just a few weeks before his only child, my grandfather, was born. Here is a photo of the dapper man from the late 1800s. 



The research itself is ongoing and is taking me on a fascinating journey. In fact, one of the Perks available is a behind-the-scenes glimpse into the research and writing process — a treasure trove of genealogy, historic and literary research. You can see some of the source material in the photo below.

Check out the AMA (Ask Me Anything), held online from November 7th-9th, 2017.

 

Make a Big Noise!

If you are intrigued by this project, please contribute today, and please spread the word in person, by email and on social media. Thank you, from the bottom of my heart.
story_txt:
The Indiegogo campaign has ended, but you can still donate at the16stories.com.
Sixteen Stories will explore how culture is preserved — or diluted — after immigration, and how one person's life can affect the next generation.
Sixteen Stories
I never would have dreamed that I would stand in my great-grandfather's ancestral home in southern China, or that I would unearth documents from the 1800's listing all the siblings of another great-grandfather we hardly knew anything about. 
These astonishing and surprisingly emotional experiences moved me to further research and start writing a book, called Sixteen Stories, featuring my eight great-grandparents, four grandparents, parents, my brother, and myself. Each story is written in the first person through the eyes of a different person, taking the reader to a specific year between 1895 and 2015, and to a different place: China, Poland, Russia, Latvia, California, Nevada, London.
Every person's chapter is rich with the details of the specific cultural and historic context. You will discover how one story shapes the next: how one person's own history and character affect others, sometimes as an inspiration, and sometimes provoking tragedy. 
While this is a deeply personal project, my aim is for it to be a touching and intriguing work which speaks to all readers through its universal human truths.
I am launching this Indiegogo campaign because carving out time for this endeavour in the mornings and weekends just isn't enough. Having the funds to cover research, writing and editing time, and the book production itself, will mean that the project can keep moving ahead with its current momentum.
I’ll be doing all of the marketing and social media myself, using my expertise as a branding and marketing professional.
The planned publishing date is October 2018. Three chapters are already finished.
See Kate Hammer, storyteller, explain why Sixteen Stories is so important.

The Funding Target & What You'll Get
The funding aim is £25,000, about $33,750. This is divided into research, writing, editing, book production, shipping and fees from payment processing and Indiegogo, as shown below.
With Indiegogo, everything raised will go toward the project, immediately: every single contribution will help.


Thank you (£5 / about $6.65)
Every single contributor will be acknowledged in the book.

Digital book (£10 / about $13.30)
The ebook and your name in the back of the book.
Paperback book (£12 / about $16)
The paperback book, the ebook and your name in the back of the book.
Signed paperback (£15 / about $19.95)
A signed paperback book, the ebook and your name in the back of the book.
Signed paperback twinset (£25 / about $33.25)
Two signed paperback books, the ebook and your name in the back of the book.
Front row twinset (£50 / about $66.50)
Your name in the front of the book, two signed paperback books, plus the ebook.
What's behind the curtain? (£80 / about $106.40)
A glimpse into the process. A 1/2 hr video call with the author, Madelyn Postman, to follow the book's progress and talk about genealogical, historic and literary research and the writing process. The call can be anytime between now and Oct 2018. Also includes your name in the front of the book, a signed paperback book and delivery, and the ebook.
Launch party (£100 / about $133)
Join us for the launch party in London, planned for October 2018. Does not include transport or accommodation. You will also have your name in the front of the book, two signed paperback books and delivery, plus the ebook.
The infinite gratitude package (£500 / about $665)
Join us for the launch party in London, planned for October 2018. Does not include transport or accommodation. You will also have your name in the front of the book, four signed paperback books and delivery, plus the ebook.
 
Every contributor will receive songs from my brother, Anthony Postman: "37 Hours of Saturday" and "This Road".
 
Stretch Goals
If the £25,000 target is exceeded, the first thing I'd like to do is to put more time into the project straight away, so I can move the publication date forward to summer 2018 instead of autumn 2018. The next goal is to add in photographs and documents, since right now the book is planned as text-only. I am open to your input regarding the stretch goals — please share your ideas with me.
 

The Stories
Of the sixteen people portrayed in the book, only three are still alive: my father, brother and me. My great-grandfather, Joe Shoong, is known as one of the first Chinese American millionaires. In the photo below, he is standing next to his son, my grandfather, who is crying while holding a birthday cake.
Another great-grandfather, Sygmunt Postman, was born north west of Warsaw, Poland, into a Jewish family. He died young, just a few weeks before his only child, my grandfather, was born. Here is a photo of the dapper man from the late 1800s. 
The research itself is ongoing and is taking me on a fascinating journey. In fact, one of the Perks available is a behind-the-scenes glimpse into the research and writing process — a treasure trove of genealogy, historic and literary research. You can see some of the source material in the photo below.
Check out the AMA (Ask Me Anything), held online from November 7th-9th, 2017.
 

Make a Big Noise!
If you are intrigued by this project, please contribute today, and please spread the word in person, by email and on social media. Thank you, from the bottom of my heart.

story:
Prévente automnale 2017

La Revue Souffle d'Éden, spécialisée dans la publication de récits de science-fiction, fantasy, fantastique pour la jeunesse, lance sa prévente automnale. La revue est soutenue par des auteurs et illustrateurs de talent, passionnés par leur art, mais aussi par des jeunes désireux de vivre une première expérience éditoriale. Le projet Souffle d'Éden compte sur l'implication bénévole de tous les participants, incluant les fondateurs, et nous espérons devenir une revue professionnelle dans les années à venir. Nous sollicitons aujourd'hui votre appui financier pour réaliser ses publications de l'automne 2017.

  • Numéro 5.1 "Même pas peur!"
  • Numéro 6 "Numéro Seuss" (hommage à Theodore Giesel)

Les revues de la prévente automnale seront livrées en octobre 2017 (pour le numéro 5.1) et de décembre 2017 (pour le numéro 6).

À quoi serviront les montants demandés

Les montants reçus serviront à produire, diffuser et distribuer les numéros de la revue. Plus vous êtes généreux, plus nous pourrons proposer différentes activités de lancement tout au long de l'année, dans la province de Québec, où vous seriez invités (donateurs des plans Zonda et Microrafale).

Aussi, en devenant membre votant à vie de la coopérative pour la modique somme de 3$, vous assurez sa survie et son lectorat. Les gens désireux de rejoindre la coopérative à titre de membre votant, ont ainsi la possibilité de recevoir des ristournes sur les profits générés à la fin de l'année, et même de proposer de nouvelles idées lors des assemblées virtuelles. Que vous ayez 13 ou 101 ans, votre quote-part de 3$ vous assure d'être écouté.

Plus nous aurons de précommandes et d'abonnements annuels, meilleurs seront les prix proposés par les imprimeurs. La marge de profit permettra ainsi de payer nos artistes et de donner de meilleures ristournes annuelles aux membres votants.

Votre impact

N'étant pas encore distribuée en librairies, la revue Souffle d'Éden n'est imprimée que pour les particuliers directement. Lorsque vous commandez votre exemplaire du fanzine, vous participez à sa conception et sa distribution directe.

Aussi, lorsque vous devenez membre de la coopérative, vous faites entendre votre voix et permettez une rémunération par ristournes annuelles aux créateurs.

Si vous devenez partenaire ou commanditaire de la revue, votre aide assure non seulement la continuité du projet, mais une plus large diffusion dans la francophonie ainsi que différentes activités de lancement et de promotion tout au long de l'année.

L'origine du projet

Le projet Souffle d'Éden est né de deux passions : la littérature de genres pour la jeunesse, chez Martyne Pigeon, et les arts visuels, chez Jean-Philippe Paré. Le but premier était d'offrir une vitrine et une première expérience de publication dans une revue bénévole conçue pour les jeunes et réalisée en partie par des jeunes.

De par les valeurs judéo-chrétiennes partagées au sein du couple fondateur, il était donc naturel d'y retrouver des textes et illustrations desquelles émaneraient de bons vieux thèmes universels tels que la charité, le respect, l'amour et la foi. Tout ceci dans le but de rehausser l'estime de soi, le courage et la persévérance chez nous futurs jeunes artistes.

Pour en savoir plus

Pour en apprendre davantage sur la revue Souffle d'Éden et ses projets annuels, merci de visiter notre page Facebook Souffle d'Éden. 

Vous avez envie de proposer des textes? C'est très simple : abonnez-vous à notre groupe créateur sur Facebook, le Groupe Souffle d'Éden. Veuillez nous excuser, notre site web est encore en création. Il devrait être en ligne à la fin de l'été.

Vous désirez vous impliquer...

Vous pouvez nous contacter directement au courriel suivant : textesouffleeden@live.com. Si vous connaissez des libraires francophones spécialisés dans la littérature jeunesse de l'imaginaire, si vous avez de bons contacts dans le domaine des imprimeries et de la distribution, nous acceptons toujours des suggestions ou de nouvelles avenues.

Les prochains appels à contribution et dates de tombée

Pour ceux et celles qui aimeraient déposer un projet, voici ce que nous recherchons pour l'année en cours :

  • Des interviews, chroniques artistiques, critiques littéraires ou cinéma et recensions;
  • des textes jeunesse liés aux genres de l'imaginaire;
  • des illustrations;
  • des bandes dessinées pour un lectorat jeunesse et respectant les genres prédestinés par la revue.

Que vous ayez 12 ou 75 ans, vous pouvez soumettre vos projet au : textesouffleeden@live.com. Les dates de tombée sont :

  • Pour "Même pas peur!" - 1er septembre 2017 (les appels à courtes histoires et bédés sont terminées, sauf pour la section "jeunes souffles").
  • Pour "Numéro Seuss" - 1er novembre 2017 (toutes soumissions ouvertes).
  • Pour "L'amour en steampunk - 5 janvier 2018 (toutes soumissions ouvertes).
  • Pour "Suivre le petit lapin de Pâques... de l'autre côté de l'univers" - 15 février 2018 (toutes soumissions ouvertes).
  • Pour "Hommage à Maurice G. Dantec" - 1er mai 2018 (toutes soumissions ouvertes).

Les participants (auteurs, illustrateurs, chroniqueurs, bédéistes, journalistes, réviseurs, monteurs de maquettes, etc.) recevrons tous une version PDF gratuite de la revue à laquelle ils auront participé.

Les nouvelles doivent faire un maximum de 5 000 mots, à interligne et demi, en format Word (.doc ou .docx).

Les poèmes doivent faire un maximum de 3 000 mots,  à interligne et demi, en format Word (.doc ou .docx).

Les bédés doivent faire un maximum de 6 pages recto-verso (12 planches), résolution 150 dpi ou plus, en format .JPEG, pour une revue A5 imprimée.

Les illustrations doivent avoir une résolution de 150 dpi ou plus, en format .JPEG, pour une revue A5 imprimée.

Pour nous rencontrer

Vous préférez nous rencontrer en salons et payer votre abonnement en argent comptant?

Il nous fera plaisir de faire votre connaissance et prendre vos informations (de livraison) aux événements suivants:

  • Pause littéraire Mauricie, édition Shawinigan, le 23 septembre 2017 entre 9h00 et 17h00 à la Plazza de la Mauricie.
  • Comic Con de Québec, les 14 et 15 octobre 2017 au Centre de congrès de Québec (en négociation présentement, information à venir sur notre fil de nouvelles)
  • Salon nouveau genre de Québec #15, le 2 décembre 2017, Église Saint-Fidèle, Limoilou.

Les contreparties numériques

Si vous désirez obtenir les versions PDF des revues, vous avez le choix de 3 contreparties:

  • L'unique PDF (vous permet d'acheter en prévente le numéro 5.1 "Même pas peur!" qui sortira le 31 octobre 2017)
  • Le duo PDF (vous permet d'acheter en prévente les numéros 5.1 "Même pas peur!" et 6 "Numéro Seuss" qui sortiront les 31 octobre et 25 décembre 2017)
  • Les 14 PDFs (vous permet d'acheter toutes les publications sorties à ce jour et de vous abonner aux 5 prochains numéros de l'année 2017-2018. De plus, un don de 4$ sera remis à la Fondation Jasmin Roy)

Pour ceux qui préfèrent acheter les version EPUB sans DRM:

  • Les e-vents (vous permet d'acheter les cinq premiers numéros, le hors série "Victoire", le numéro 5.1 et le 6 en plus de recevoir votre carte de membre par la poste. Un don de 3$ sera remis à la fondation Jasmin Roy)
  • Le Total e-pub (vous permet d'acheter tous les numéros parus à ce jour, de vous abonner à l'année 2017-2018 et de recevoir votre carte de membre par la poste. Tous les numéros vous seront envoyés en format EPUB et PDF, libres de toute protection. Un don de 2.50$ sera remis à la fondation Jasmin Roy.

Les contreparties postales

Le Tivano - 3$

Vous obtiendrez votre carte de membre à vie de la coopérative Souffle d'Éden, au prix de 3$ (payable une seule fois)

La brise - 5$

Vous obtiendrez le numéro 5.1 "Même pas peur!" en format papier, noir et blanc, broché, maximum 100 pages recto-verso dans la semaine du 31 octobre 2017.

Le sirocco - 8$

Vous recevrez votre carte de membre à vie d'une valeur de 3$ et le numéro 5.1 "Même pas peur!" en format papier, noir et blanc, dos broché, 100 pages maximum recto-verso. Livraison dans la semaine du 31 octobre 2017.

L'alizée - 10$

Vous recevrez le numéro 6 "Numéro Seuss" dans la semaine du 25 décembre, couverture couleurs, dos carré collé, 150 pages approx, format A5 d'une valeur de 10$.

Le pampero - 15$

Vous recevrez les numéros 5.1 "Même pas peur" en format papier, noir et blanc, dos broché, 100 pages maximum dans la semaine du 31 octobre 2017. De plus, nous vous enverrons le numéro 6 "Numéro Seuss", couverture couleur, dos carré collé, format A5, dans la semaine du 25 décembre 2017.

Le nordet - 18$

Vous recevrez le numéro 5.1 "Même pas peur" en format papier, noir et blanc, dos broché, 100 pages maximum dans la semaine du 31 octobre 2017, ainsi que votre carte de membre de la coopérative. De plus, nous vous enverrons le numéro 6 "Numéro Seuss", couverture couleur, dos carré collé, format A5, dans la semaine du 25 décembre 2017.

L'auster - 33$

En plus des cadeaux du "Nordet" vous recevrez le numéro hors série "Victoire!" manifeste contre l'intimidation en milieu scolaire au profit de la fondation Jasmin Roy. Les numéros 5.1, hors série et la carte de membre vous seront envoyés dans la semaine du 31 octobre 2017. Quant au numéro 6, il vous sera envoyé dans la semaine du 25 décembre 2017. Un don de 5$ sera remis à la fondation Jasmin Roy.

Le ponant - 50$

Abonnez-vous à l'année 2017-2018 et recevez votre carte de membre d'une valeur de 3$. Tous les numéros vous seront envoyés en format papier aux dates prévues (semaines du: 31 octobre 2017, 25 décembre 2017, 14 février 2018, 31 mars 2018, 24 juin 2018). Les numéros auront entre 100 et 150 pages, dos broché (pour le numéro 5.1) ou dos carré collé, format A5.

Le chinook - 65$

En plus des cadeaux offerts dans l'offre "Le nordet" vous recevrez tous les numéros parus à ce jour en format papier. Un don de 5$ sera remis à la fondation Jasmin Roy.

Le zonda - 75$

En choisissant le "zonda" vous recevrez votre abonnement complet aux cinq numéros de l'année 2017-2018, votre carte de membre à vie d'une valeur de 3$, le numéro hors série "Victoire!" et vous offrez un don de 10$ pour les activités de lancement au Québec. Nous vous enverrons aussi une invitation aux différentes activités de promotion organisées. Un don de 10$ sera remis à la fondation Jasmin Roy. De plus, nous mentionnerons votre nom dans la liste des donateurs durant les différents événements de lancement.

La microrafale - 100$

Vous optez pour la microrafale? Voici ce que vous obtiendrez pour votre achat de 100$:

  • Les numéros 1 à 5 et le hors série "Victoire!" en format papier
  • L'abonnement 5 numéros en format papier, pour l'année 2017-2018
  • Votre carte de membre de la coopérative
  • Votre don de 10$ qui servira au financement des activités de lancement vous octroiera une invitation aux différents événements publics de la revue
  • Votre nom figurera sur la liste des commanditaires officiels de la revue à même nos 5 prochains numéros et sur notre site web (en construction).
  • Un don de 10$ sera remis à la fondation Jasmin Roy

Tous les numéros vous seront envoyés en format papier aux dates prévues (semaines du: 31 octobre 2017, 25 décembre 2017, 14 février 2018, 31 mars 2018, 24 juin 2018). Les numéros auront entre 100 et 150 pages, dos broché (pour le numéro 5.1) ou dos carré collé, format A5.
Le chinook - 65$

En plus des cadeaux offerts dans l'offre "Le nordet" vous recevrez tous les numéros parus à ce jour en format papier. Un don de 5$ sera remis à la fondation Jasmin Roy.
Le zonda - 75$

En choisissant le "zonda" vous recevrez votre abonnement complet aux cinq numéros de l'année 2017-2018, votre carte de membre à vie d'une valeur de 3$, le numéro hors série "Victoire!" et vous offrez un don de 10$ pour les activités de lancement au Québec. Nous vous enverrons aussi une invitation aux différentes activités de promotion organisées. Un don de 10$ sera remis à la fondation Jasmin Roy. De plus, nous mentionnerons votre nom dans la liste des donateurs durant les différents événements de lancement.
La microrafale - 100$


Vous optez pour la microrafale? Voici ce que vous obtiendrez pour votre achat de 100$:

Les numéros 1 à 5 et le hors série "Victoire!" en format papier
L'abonnement 5 numéros en format papier, pour l'année 2017-2018
Votre carte de membre de la coopérative
Votre don de 10$ qui servira au financement des activités de lancement vous octroiera une invitation aux différents événements publics de la revue
Votre nom figurera sur la liste des commanditaires officiels de la revue à même nos 5 prochains numéros et sur notre site web (en construction).
Un don de 10$ sera remis à la fondation Jasmin Roy

story:
Project Summary

Ceaseless Fun is a public access, anonymous lit zine to be distributed around Chicago this fall.  It was created by two ardent supporters of free art and features fiction & photography aimed at capturing the urban experience, perversions of masculinity, and listlessness in the haze of capitalism.

Copies will be distributed impersonally and randomly.  We will leave copies in bars, coffeshops, drug stores, and buses.  We will give copies to strangers and ask our friends to do the same. Readers will be encouraged to pass their copies on to others.  A free PDF version will be made available online so that passing on the print copy does not prevent future access to the contents of the zine.

What We Need

Costs are simple:

  • $9.99 buys the necessary domain name for a year.
  • Indiegogo's minimum is $500.  with the remaining $490.01, we can print approximately 200 copies of Ceaseless Fun.
  • Everything else is gravy--additional funds will be used to publish additional copies. The creators will, under no circumstances, take a stipend from the funds we raise.

Risks & Challenges

We foresee few risks and challenges. The zine is complete.  We will simply print as many copies as funds allow. We will consider the campaign a great success if one copy of Ceaseless Fun is printed.

FAQ

Q: How is this anonymous?  I know who you are!
A: We're glad that you know one or more of us, but the majority of readers will not.  Also, we ask you to consider in what sense you know us, and in what sense we might yet be anonymous.

Q: I don't have any money-- what should I do instead of donating?
A: You can share the Ceaseless Fun online PDF upon its release.  Also, we ask you to consider making your own anonymous, public access art.

Q You video is silly.  Is that a sign that your zine will be silly?
A: No, Ceaseless Fun will not be as silly as the video because Ceaseless Fun is not a collection of old Snapchats and cellphone videos made to resemble an undergraduate film project.  Also, we ask you to consider that you won't really know until you read the zine so maybe you should just donate and find out.

story:
MY STORY

"If there's a book you really want to read, but it hasn't been written yet, then you must write it." -- multi-award winning author Toni Morrison

As far back as I can remember, I have wanted to write a book. I have always envisioned Dwayne C. Nelson printed on the cover. After years of visualization, my dream of becoming an author can turn into reality today with your help.

I have an illustrator: James Patterson; a cover and interior layout designer: Joyce Richards; a marketing, promotions and sales director: my wife, Angel M. Nelson; and an editor: Kevin Richardson.

However, since I am self-publishing the book, I have minimal funding remaining to compete against the bigger and traditional companies, particularly with the marketing, promoting and printing of it. 

Maybe your financial situation might not be the best now or maybe the concept of crowdfunding might be foreign to you.

With that understanding, I am, respectfully, asking for a contribution of $10, $25, $50 or $100 to help me make The Mystery of the Lost Remote a big hit around the world and in return you will receive one or more of our great company perks.

WHERE WILL THE MONEY GO?

All of the contributions will be used to help fund the complete self-publishing (illustrating, designing, editing, marketing, printing and distributing) of the printed and electronic versions of my book.

ABOUT THE BOOK

                                                                             

After a hard day at work, the only thing Kelly and Andre’s father wants to do when he comes home is kick back in his living room recliner and watch football games. The problem is nobody in the home can find his can't-live-without-it remote control.

ABOUT THE AUTHOR

I am an accomplished copy editor, page designer and writer, who has worked at The Philadelphia Tribune, Courier-Post and Trenton Times and written for Yahoo! Sports and News One. The Mystery of the Lost Remote is my debut book. I have a Bachelor's Degree of Communications in Journalism from Temple University. I live in Philadelphia, Pa. with my beautiful wife and two children. You can reach me at dcn.4him@gmail.com.

ABOUT THE DESIGNER                     

                                             

Joyce Richards is currently one of the main page designers in the sports department at USA Today. Joyce has a passion for creating and developing fresh and unique visual concepts and loves competing in Minted.com design challenges. The Philadelphia native lives in Virgina with her husband and two children. You can visit her website at www.joyrichdesigns.com.


ABOUT THE ILLUSTRATOR

James Patterson is one of the most creative and versatile graphic artists in the business. Besides illustrating three books by author A.R. Bey, James has created web comics, T-shirt designs, coloring/activity books, residential murals and photography backgrounds. He is currently involved in the creation of a trading card game. You can visit his website at  www.artislife2me.com.   

HOW ELSE CAN YOU HELP?

I understand contributions are not possible for everyone. However, this does not mean you cannot support our crowdfunding campaign. You can still help by spreading the word by mouth and through social media to family, friends and coworkers.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I hope you will enjoy The Mystery of the Lost Remote as much as Joyce, James and I have enjoyed creating it.  

Blessings,

Dwayne C. Nelson
Publisher & Writer
4Him Publishing, LLC

story:
Hallo Liebe Freunde unseres schönen Festivals,

wir gehen in die Vorbereitungen und wünschen uns für dieses Jahr wieder Fülle auf allen Ebenen und wollen hiermit schon mal vorweg Geld sammeln, so dass wir mit Leichtigkeit unser 8. Weltmusikfestival bzw. Love & Peace Gathering in Kastell Windsor planen können.

Dazu bedarf es Deiner finanziellen Unterstützung! Gerne möchten wir im Voraus eine bombastische finanzielle Basis haben mit der wir planen können und natürlich auch um zu wissen, ob es euch allen wichtig ist, dass es wieder statt findet ;-).

Durch die verschiedenen Perks, die du rechts in der Leiste siehst, kannst Du wählen wieviel Du in den "Topf" geben magst. Nach Auswahl des Perks, wirst du durch den Zahlungsvorgang per paypal oder Kreditkarte geleitet. Sollte dir das schwer fallen, melde dich doch bitte bei uns persönlich.

Auf unserer Webseite kannst Du Dich schön einlesen - Kaddy hatte letztes Jahr ein wunderschönes Nachwort verfasst, das sehr trifft was wir alle erlebt haben auf dem letzten Love & Peace Gathering -
http://www.weltmusik-bayerwald.de/

und Axel hat vor kurzem auch die Bilder, die bisher im Facebookalbum waren auch hochgestellt.
http://www.weltmusik-bayerwald.de/bildergalerie/lichtseelen-bilder-wmf-2015-freitag/


Bei uns hat die Vorfreude nun schon begonnen - und das Anfang April - jippieh! So let´s make it happen, wir hängen uns rein und ihr hoffentlich auch!

Love & Light, Freude, Licht, Erdenkraft & Liebe


P.S.: Sollte es dir zur Zeit nicht möglich sein, dich finanziell einzubringen aber du uns bzw. das Festival trotzdem unterstützen möchtest, dann melde dich doch bitte bei uns als Helfer/in an!!!

https://www.facebook.com/weltmusikfestival/?fref=ts

story:
In the summer of 1990, I began to receive phone calls from Marlon Brando. I was beginning the task of fulfilling a request from playwright Tennessee Williams, and I had attempted to contact Brando to talk about his relationship with the playwright, and the effects of appearing as Stanley Kowalski in A Streetcar Named Desire.

Brando declined the invitation.

And then a mutual friend died suddenly, and one July night my phone rang at two in the morning, and there was Marlon Brando. He wanted to talk.

We spoke by phone for the next two years. Eighty-four phone conversations; more than forty letters exchanged. What was discussed? Almost everything.

At a critical point in his life, Brando wanted to know what was happening in his heart and in the world. The idea of a rube--an unhatched egg, as he called me-- trying to answer his questions amused and aroused him. The conversations also kept him, at times, from eating the cake in the kitchen.

Our conversations turned into exercises like those he had encountered in working with Stella Adler, in which he returned to places, peoples, images, sounds, and words from what he called the "happy years." We investigated everything and everyone that made particular years tenable, possible. 

"I want to come out of this a man," he said. "A fully operational man. I want to come up from this a man."

Tentatively titled Come Up A Man, this new book is an exploration of the mind of Marlon Brando--as well as many who loved him. I am on the verge of completion, but need about two months to research and revise. 

A previous campaign helped me to complete Follies of God: Tennessee Williams and the Women of the Fog (Alfred A. Knopf), and I am confident that this campaign will allow me to finish this next book.

story:
Imagine an e-book where you are in full control of the story. You are able to name the Main Character; select their gender; their eye or even their hair color. Imagine one so responsive that you can make choices that will alter aspects of the story later on.

Imagine one, just like any good RPG Video Game, that grants you an open world to explore and manipulate.  Yes, that is what we at Sweet Butter Publishing are striving to make with the “Antheon” series, starting with “Covenant of Light.”

Covenant of Light is a revolutionary book you cannot find anywhere else.  It is written in a 2nd Point of View designed to immerse the reader into a rich and vibrant setting where a great cataclysm has devastated the world.  Those left behind struggle to survive against the ever spreading “Hedge’, a plague of chaos that consumes all in its path.  

Yet there is hope with the powers of Binding. They allow people to share physical attributes and even control the very elements—but will it be enough? Can humanity survive all the while they are losing their souls?

I am Sunny Griffith, author and founder of Sweet Butter Publishing.  Covenant of Light is only the first of many books we intend to publish using the revolutionary RPG-eBook format.  Please support us and discover the magic for yourselves.

 

Antheon is a rich and colorful world that has taken many years to flesh out.  It will take seven books to explore each of the nooks and corners, but here are a few tantalizing images to wet your pallet.

 

“Insight Shops” People use them to be injected with light—making them smarter for a short period of time.

“Il’Hoth’Rea” one of many lost cities nestled in the wastes. The chaotic “Hedge” has eradicated most of the inhabitants of the known world.

Using a material called “Heaven Ore” (buoyant alloy that floats when heated) scavenger ships roam the wastes looking for a way to end the “Hedge” and it’s “Fell Storms.”

All seems bleak, but a copy of the “Book of the Angles” has been found. In it may hold the keys to ending the “Hedge,” but can anyone understand the strange written language—lost to time immortal.

 

The “Last Empire” is so named because the remaining population agrees if the “Last Empire” falls, all will be lost. Great sacrifices have been made in order to keep humanity upright—but was it worth it? What is the price of your humanity?

story:
Summary

The Team

I am Erin Kimmett.  A wife, daughter, mother, sister and granddaughter.  A graphic artist, jewelry designer and byzantine iconographer. To keep myself extra busy, I sing in my church choir, serve on the boards of various organizations and, as a self-proclaimed "wannabe caterer," I embrace any opportunity to feed a crowd -- large or small, 'round my table or theirs!

Alexis El Massih is a food, wedding, and fine art portrait photographer based in Boston, MA.  She believes the art of food begins when planted and nurtured in the field, and is brought to deeper meaning when prepared with love and gratitude for the nourishment and gathering of friends, family, and community. 

I first met Alexis when she visited my icon studio in hopes of learning the sacred art of iconography. We spoke about icons, but before the meeting was over, we had covered a myriad of subjects and found we share many of the same passions: most notably our passion for food and hospitality! I told Alexis about my cookbook and before we knew what happened, we were collaborating on Hospitality and Joy. It has become OUR baby as we work nights and weekends or grab a few minutes at lunch to collaborate and plan the next shoot! 

The Cookbook

There is little that gives me more joy than preparing a meal and sharing it with others. I am a feeder, plain and simple. A hostess to my core! As my grandmother would say, I “come by it honestly.” She, too, was a feeder. The lessons learned growing up in her kitchen shaped my life and set me on a path of cooking, sharing, serving and loving. 

On the morning she died in 2008 I sat down and began writing stories, never dreaming that years later I would bring that collection together with my own favorite recipes.  But here we are, I now have a book and I need your help to bring it to print. 

My good friend and food photographer, Alexis El Massih, and I have brought to life some amazing recipes for your family in a cookbook titled Hospitality and Joy. It is a beautifully designed 8.5" x 10" smythe-sewn hardbound book printed on heavy weight satin finish paper.  Ninety-six colorful pages feature my go-to, tried and true hostess recipes each illustrated in photos that are as beautiful to look at as the food is delicious! 

This book, nearly a decade in the making, honors my Sitey--my grandmother--"Aunt Vi" as she was lovingly known to most, and celebrates an ethos of hospitality and joy that extends well beyond the kitchen.

What We Need & What You Get

This project is very personal to me. As a first-time author, seasoned graphic designer, and trusted curator/creator of these recipes, I decided to self-publish so that every detail would be exactly as I envisioned. It will cost $12,500 to produce and print 500 hard-bound copies of the first edition of Hospitality and Joy.  

Most of these expenses should be covered through book pre-orders here on Indiegogo. You can preorder a book for $28 plus shipping. Or even better, give $40 and get an autographed first-edition copy of the book plus a bundle of recipes cards designed to coordinate with the book!  If you'd like to help further, we have designed some amazing perks to reward you for your generosity, such as a uniquely designed Hospitality and Joy tea towel, a private lesson in food photography, or a dinner party for you and a group of friends.  Check out all the options, there's surely one just right for you!

Your pre-order purchase is vital to the success of this project! I am committed to publishing this book whether or not the entire $12,500 is met, but your pre-ordered book purchase will take the financial pressure off me (thank you, in advance :-)  Should we exceed our goal, we will happily increase the volume of books ordered (and probably the number of pages in my book :-) so it will be a win all the way around! We are forever grateful for your support and confidence in us.

God bless you!

Erin and Alexis

P.S. In gratitude, we plan to tithe 10% of the profits to three of our favorite non-profits: Saint George Orthodox Church (Norwood, MA) Building Fund; Sonia's "Building on a Dream" Fund; and The Treehouse (Wichita, KS).

On the morning she died in 2008 I sat down and began writing stories, never dreaming that years later I would bring that collection together with my own favorite recipes.  But here we are, I now have a book and I need your help to bring it to print. 
My good friend and food photographer, Alexis El Massih, and I have brought to life some amazing recipes for your family in a cookbook titled Hospitality and Joy. It is a beautifully designed 8.5" x 10" smythe-sewn hardbound book printed on heavy weight satin finish paper.  Ninety-six colorful pages feature my go-to, tried and true hostess recipes each illustrated in photos that are as beautiful to look at as the food is delicious! 
This book, nearly a decade in the making, honors my Sitey--my grandmother--"Aunt Vi" as she was lovingly known to most, and celebrates an ethos of hospitality and joy that extends well beyond the kitchen.
What We Need & What You Get
This project is very personal to me. As a first-time author, seasoned graphic designer, and trusted curator/creator of these recipes, I decided to self-publish so that every detail would be exactly as I envisioned. It will cost $12,500 to produce and print 500 hard-bound copies of the first edition of Hospitality and Joy.  
Most of these expenses should be covered through book pre-orders here on Indiegogo. You can preorder a book for $28 plus shipping. Or even better, give $40 and get an autographed first-edition copy of the book plus a bundle of recipes cards designed to coordinate with the book!  If you'd like to help further, we have designed some amazing perks to reward you for your generosity, such as a uniquely designed Hospitality and Joy tea towel, a private lesson in food photography, or a dinner party for you and a group of friends.  Check out all the options, there's surely one just right for you!
Your pre-order purchase is vital to the success of this project! I am committed to publishing this book whether or not the entire $12,500 is met, but your pre-ordered book purchase will take the financial pressure off me (thank you, in advance :-)  Should we exceed our goal, we will happily increase the volume of books ordered (and probably the number of pages in my book :-) so it will be a win all the way around! We are forever grateful for your support and confidence in us.
God bless you!
Erin and Alexis
P.S. In gratitude, we plan to tithe 10% of the profits to three of our favorite non-profits: Saint George Orthodox Church (Norwood, MA) Building Fund; Sonia's "Building on a Dream" Fund; and The Treehouse (Wichita, KS).

story:
How good are you with money? 

Are you living paycheck to paycheck?

Giving away too much to your mortgage company?

Paying student loans as a life sentence???

Picture this:

Lower interest on your car Loan allowing you to pay it off faster

Savings on your mortgage without refinancing

More money left over at the end of the month

A growing Savings account

Reduced Interest on Student Loan

Looks great right?

So how do you go from A to B in this scenario? 

In my new book & DVD, “ The Secrets of Saving Money: Experiencing The Unlimited”,you will learn tips and strategies that will raise your financial awareness and allow you to save money on your everyday expenses.

Do you find saving money to be easier said than done? 

It all starts with your mindset. This book will cover many financial topics to include:

* Saving Money: Many people struggle in this area, and my mission is to create  change and empower you to a better financial future. Learn easy ways to start  putting away money and planning ahead.

* Your Mortgage: Your home is one of the biggest investments you’ll ever make.  That doesn’t mean you have to pay double for it. That’s what happens when you  take out a mortgage and pay on it for the full 30 years. Whether you have lots of  equity or no equity, this book is just for you. Learn tips & strategies for paying this  off sooner without breaking the bank, building equity fast and all without  refinancing. 

* Car loans: Traditional mindset says buy a car loan, establish a loan payment for 3, 4, 5, and sometimes 6 years, we pay on it for the full duration of time and we are so happy when our car is paid off. We give money away all the time. How do we do this? By paying on your car note for the full length of time, you are paying the total cost  of the car, quite often a warranty and interest on both the car and the warranty  because it’s based on the total loan amount. What if there was a way to pay off your car sooner, put more money back into your pocket and keep the payment  manageable...would that be of interest to you? Let me show you. 

*Groceries & Gas: It’s a fact of life that everyone has to eat and most people have  to drive. These are monthly expenses that will always be needed, but why pay  regular price? Everyone should love a good bargain, right? In this book & DVD, I  have outlined the best strategies for every grocery store that I could find across the country that offers any type of gas rewards program. Not only will you learn how I  personally pay as little as 10 cents per gallon EVERY time I fill up, but you will also  learn how to buy more groceries while reducing your grocery bill at the same time. YES REALLY! I know it sounds too good to be true, but I have receipts to prove it  which I share with you in my DVD Class. Now, of course, the amount that YOU will  save depends on the grocery stores and gas stations available in your area, but the concepts are absolutely worth the read. In addition, when you get the DVD, I will  show you step by step  how I earn up to $2.20 per gallon off from my gas purchase every time. 

These are just a few of the many things that you will learn to help you save money. If you are a Pastor, church leader or entrepreneur, there is a chapter written just for  you. Learn how to reduce your operating costs.

Active Duty or Retired Military? Military spouse? Are you aware of all of the many  discounts available to you? Don’t miss out, order your book & DVD today!

Even if you live outside of the United States, the principles that you will learn will  raise your financial awareness so that you can apply these tips and strategies  anywhere. Take advantage of our Pre-Order Specials NOW!

About This Campaign

Everything that we learn and do in life is based on one very simple thing –habits. We are creatures of routine and as such many of us do exactly the same thing day in and day out. If and when we do something different it is usually well planned long in advance allowing us time to adjust and prepare. 

Well the same is true for money and your financial habits; in fact we all have a  financial blueprint that we follow over and over again. 

Have you ever noticed how you may make a lot of money and then go through a dry season, over and over again?

Or you promise yourself you are going to save a certain amount every month and  somehow it always goes on that little something special or a great gift or a night  out? Again it’s your blueprint.

By reading “The Secrets of Saving Money: Experiencing The Unlimited”, you can change your blueprint and develop new habits that create a  healthy financial life and help you to reach some of your financial goals. 

Sounds simple? Well it is – when you purchase one of the perks on your right, you can receive the book and DVD and start developing your new financial habits. The t-shirts have been created as a reminder of the financial changes that you are about to make in your life and the mental limitations that will be removed. The front of the t-shirt says "The Mindset Movement" and the back says "Experiencing The Unlimited". You can view the t-shirts under the gallery tab. Join the movement for financial change!

This crowdfunding campaign has been put together for two very important reasons.

Reason number one - to promote the real secrets of saving money and give as manypeople as possible the opportunity to save money.

Reason number two –I believe in following my own principles, one of which is that  every dollar counts, and by having lots of people come together and donate a small  amount each,then I can cost effectively distribute this information to many more  people at a much lower cost.

Did you know that for just $50 you could own a signed copy of  “The secrets of Saving Money” Hard copy,the DVD, and t-shirt? 

Why “The Secrets of Saving Money” is important

I work as a Financial Consultant by day and a mom and wife by night. This leaves very little time for me to  pursue some of my career goals and meet the needs of many of many clients, followers and fans. 

Knowing that I have some very important information that can improve people's lives and remove much of the stress that impacts marriages, family dynamics and  every day choices, I made a decision to invest my time and money into  building my brand and packaging the knowledge and information that I have so  that even when I'm not at work, I can still be helping people. 

The benefit of producing this book and DVD collection is that people across the world can take their time to digest the information, and change their financial  blueprint and create a healthy financial life for themselves and  their families – all for a low cost!

So if you need to find a way to: 

· Manage your monthly bills

· Save dollars everyday on gas, food and regular items

· Save money on your mortgage

· Save money on your student loan

· Save money on your auto loan 

It’s really simple – choose the perk that you can afford and get started. This is one of the best gifts you can give yourself.

 There’s no time like the present, just click on the perk of choice and make your   payment by either credit card or even PayPal. That’s right Indiegogo make it that easy!

THE IMPACT

So essentially, Breanna is here to be your personal financial consultant in a book – or video if you prefer. We all need a little help sometimes and you wouldn’t visit a  dentist about a heart problem, so stop talking to your friends about your finances  and get your very own expert for just $50 –you’ll save 10 x that amount in the  first month if you follow the guidelines correctly and follow all of the hints and tips  available. 

The benefits for you contributing to this campaign  are many:

· Save money

· Have more money

· Feel better about your finances

· Lower your interest

· Get More and Pay Less

THE GOAL

I'm looking to raise just $9,557 for this project. 

That works out at just 383 people purchasing the $25 perk, 956 people purchasing the $10 perk or just 191 people purchasing my $50, or better still a nice  combination of all 3. 

The funds raised will literally all go into the publishing, design, distribution and  marketing of the book. 

By using an online self publishing company, way more economical, I get to pass  all of the  benefit of my knowledge onto you for a very reasonable price and as  I said, you will  easily see a ten-fold return on your investment.

Ways to support The Campaign

We all know there are many ways to share support and not everything has to cost  money. By sending out this link to all your friends and family and everyone you  ‘know’ on social media you will be showing me the ultimate support and belief in my brand and my purpose here on earth. That is worth more than any amount of  money, so  thank you. 

By contributing financially and purchasing one of my perks, you will be investing in me and my life and also sowing a seed of financial freedom in your own life, so go  ahead and make the most significant purchase of the day and thanks again.

The greatest gift you can give to a loved one is freedom – and in this case financial freedom – if you know someone who is struggling financially or who often asks you for a small loan or financial support then perhaps a copy of the eBook “The Secrets of Saving Money” will be the last donation you have to  make to their  lives financially.

So please help yourself today by making this purchase and remember you can visit my website  www.themoneycounselors.com  or www.managegodsmoney.com where you will find a wealth of information and  support just like this available to you free of charge. The book website is www.secretsofsavingmoney.com

 ‘know’ on social media you will be showing me the ultimate support and belief in my brand and my purpose here on earth. That is worth more than any amount of  money, so  thank you. By contributing financially and purchasing one of my perks, you will be investing in me and my life and also sowing a seed of financial freedom in your own life, so go  ahead and make the most significant purchase of the day and thanks again.The greatest gift you can give to a loved one is freedom – and in this case financial freedom – if you know someone who is struggling financially or who often asks you for a small loan or financial support then perhaps a copy of the eBook “The Secrets of Saving Money” will be the last donation you have to  make to their  lives financially.So please help yourself today by making this purchase and remember you can visit my website  www.themoneycounselors.com  or www.managegodsmoney.com where you will find a wealth of information and  support just like this available to you free of charge. The book website is www.secretsofsavingmoney.com

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jake dh.  In 2014, I released my first novel, The BulletProof Ghost: Prototypes.  The book was about a 13 year old boy named Kyle Richard. Kyle is killed when a group of bullies take their antics too far.  He is resurrected as a cybernetic killing machine by a mysterious man with clouded motivations.  Kyle has to figure out whether to be a tool of his creator or forge his own destiny.  

Though the book received glowing reviews, it was difficult to get the word out.  There were a lot of hurdles in terms of resources and my options were severely limited due to something as petty as money.

Now I'm nearing the completion of the second book in the series The BulletProof Ghost: In Spades, I've learned from my mistakes.  This campaign is not only about funding a book tour, but giving you perks that very few outside of this IndieGoGo will have access to.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to cover printing costs, traveling, booking/booth fees and everything else associated with a book tour.  The more funding we get, the more we can get the word out about The BulletProof Ghost series.  This will lead to more stops, conventions, signings and quite possibly, a few extra perks not currently listed.
  • On the flip side you can get: For lower contributions you get Button Pins, T-Shirts, Signed copies of BPG: In Spades, the compilation book (with an updated version of BPG: Prototypes included) BPG: Prototypes & Spades, Hardback Versions of both books.  For high contributors you can receive signed sketches of the characters, a full art book or even getting your name in the book as a supporting character!
  • If we don't reach our goal, you will still get your reward.  That's right!  The goal is the minimum we need for a proper tour, but we will still have enough for your specific reward based on your contribution.  When we called this campaign Pre-Order BPG: In Spades, we meant it.
  • All contributors will have their name printed in a special thanks section of all versions of The BulletProof Ghost: In Spades.

The Impact

  • This book series is important, because the characters feel real.  They have a past, motivations and dreams of what they want their lives to be.  They are thrown into an insane situation, but keep trying, no matter what.  
  • BPG is an independent novel series.  We are not a giant franchise with shareholders and multi-million dollar movies under our belt.  The characters in BPG are just as rich and interesting as any best selling series.  We just need a boost to get the word out.
  • My word is everything.  I've personally been burned by people I've implicitly trusted.  Trusted on issues that were life changing and was let down when this person (or persons) turned out to be lying.  I would never do that to anyone.  I know how that feels.  If you pledge, I promise, you will get your reward.  The fact you are contributing is humbling, to say the least.  Thanks in advance.

Risks & Challenges

The book is written at this point, so there is no risk in that department.  The risk is that we won't be fully funded.  

  • For you, this doesn't matter in the short run, you'll get your reward no matter what.  We've got you covered.  Putting books in people's hands is the most important thing at this point in any case.
  • The tour and advertising plan will have to be scaled back.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute monetarily, then you can: 

  • Follow The BulletProof Ghost on Facebook, Twitter (@thebproofghost), Periscope (Jake dh #BPG #Author) or Instagram.  Favorite, like and share posts as much as you can.  
  • Check out the Blog at TheBProofBlog.blogspot.com, share the posts, give us G+'s as much as possible.
  • Tell as many people as possible about the campaign and to go to www.bulletproofghost.com 
  • You can sign up for The BPG Newsletter at the Official BPG website www.BulletProofGhost.com
  • Use all of the sharing tools included on IndieGoGo if you feel inclined :)

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Join the "Revolutionizing Intimacy" Movement!        

Be part of the global awakening and experience the joy and excitement you deserve...from the bedroom to the boardroom! 

It's my mission and desire to get this book to people everywhere!

Why? Because it's our birthright to enjoy truly rewarding relationships - with ourselves AND others!

We ALL deserve to feel safe and amazing - to be seen, heard, and understood. We ALL deserve compassion and connection. 

Science is discovering that at the root of most depression and even addiction is lack of connection with other people - lack of intimate, rewarding relationships!

​The lives most of us lead are like dominos falling...

It takes tools, skills, and practice to live FREE and JOYFULLY and CONNECTED. These are the kinds of things we don't learn in school. And most of us didn't learn them at home, either. 

NOW is the time!


About the Author

My name is Tziporah, Founder of the Soulful Relating Institute. For nearly two decades I've dedicated my life and work to revolutionizing intimacy and choosing to cultivate a profound relationship with my body, mind, sexuality, and spirit - and to teaching people just like YOU to do the same!

It's time for change! Living burdened by emotional shame, chasing relationships to fill an empty void, and living overstimulated is tearing us all apart. We find it normal to feel disheartened and depressed. I know from experience, this kind of "life" is no longer an option! 

Watch the video learn more how you can participate in the global awakening to reclaim the life you are meant to live- from the bedroom to the boardroom.


Why the world needs Revolutionizing Intimacy NOW!

Twenty years ago, I was so disconnected and stressed that my body literally shut down. I knew it was time to change-or-die. I chose CHANGE. I set off on a journey and realized that we live in a world where we feel compelled to be “connected” and to constantly make things happen. In our drive for these very ideals, though, we end up creating a vicious cycle. 

We create disconnections, first within ourselves and then with others. Our personal relationships, home lives, and even our work environments suffer.

  • We experience separation globally and interpersonally. 
  • We compete instead of uplift.
  • We seek relationships to try to fill a void.
  • We get caught up in blame, shame, judgments, and finger pointing. 

The good news is we can revolutionize intimacy…and return to the intimate, loving creatures we are meant to be in every aspect of our lives.

I did. And I want to help you do the same.​​

It’s not your fault! We have all been here to one degree or another, lost together but tragically alone. 

Each of us is hungry, needing to get back to our authentic form. Here you can be unapologetically YOU...with a newfound grace, love, and humility. 

Fortunately there is a path back to YOU and the relationships you deserve, a road-less-traveled but joyfully familiar.


What this book is about

I've spent almost two decades offering programs to help people to revolutionize intimacy and cultivate a profound relationship with their body, mind, sexuality, and spirit. And now I feel excited and compelled to bring it all to the world in Revolutionizing Intimacy! This engaging read is the “how” to reconnect us on spiritual, emotional, and physical planes. 

Revolutionizing Intimacy is a culmination of concepts, exercises, processes, and story I have gathered through the years. What I share in this book will enable you to reconnect with your own body, mind, sexuality, and spirit...and to create the rewarding, intimate relationships you want and deserve.  

You will get the knowledge and tools to embrace and enjoy life, to love yourself to the core of who you are, and to set healthy boundaries in ALL your relationships. You will move beyond blame and shame to discover your unique heart and soul…and to embrace and celebrate your personal power.


Why this campaign?

It’s time to Revolutionize Intimacy and allow this work to inspire love, connection, and compassion in all relationships!

Revolutionizing Intimacy is essential! 

In constantly pushing and striving, we have forgotten how to feel, how to be.  Many of us hide behind social media and show others what we believe they want to see.  Sadly, we have forgotten how to allow others deep inside our vulnerable places, our real selves. 

The journey to REAL truth and joy starts inside each of us. 

The Revolution of Intimacy is something to cultivate, to celebrate!  When there is more collaboration, communion, and celebration of all of each person’s unique gifts, we can move from war to peace in everything we do. 


The challenges of creating a book

Writing a book is a journey, a challenging one. I felt absolute certainty that this book was meant to be when I started writing. And this, I was clear, was my commitment. One of time, travel, finances, and creativity. Thankfully my own internal trust and dedication attracted a brilliant, heart-centered team. 

However, there was still the sitting down to a blank page and knowing I had to fill it...and many, many more of them. That reality alone can be daunting, but I have lived the lessons I share in this book and I absolutely love being a guide to other people to enrich their lives. 

The book evolves every day, and of course, there are large overhead expenses with publishing a book and having it reach the masses.


This is where I need your help! 

When I first set out to put my 20 years of experience into a book I didn't realize the feat it was to truly reach the masses! 

Where the budget goes:

1. Book Editors

2. Videographers to capture the story and marketing material

3. Graphic Designers 

4. Personal Assistants/Event Coordinators

5. Publicist

6. Printing

7. Travel for book campaign

8. Many hours of writing instead of seeing paying clients

Previous investors have gotten me this far, and I SO appreciate their support. Now my team and I need your help. 

This book must be made! It must work its magic in the world to bring us back together, to reunite this soulful earth, and to teach us all to be the loving, intimate creatures we are meant to be. 

YOU are an important part of this campaign. Please forward this campaign to everyone you know to help spread the word. 

Reaching a large audience is crucial to a successful campaign. 

As a first step, please listen to your soul, and donate to this campaign. Every little bit helps bring this book and its powerful messages to fruition. If you’re not able to donate monetarily, please send this link to someone you know that is just as hungry as you are. 

Your sharing this campaign with another is a powerful part of the reconnection process, too! 

Your action will make all the difference.

Of course, a financial contribution to my campaign is the ultimate support!

We can do this!  

We can all be reunited on our spiritual paths and be fiercely intimate with one another once again—ourselves, our families, our partners, our children, our friends, our colleagues, our communities, our world! We deserve it! 


My Offerings to You! 

PERKS for your donations and for championing this campaign for Revolutionizing Intimacy:


Donation of $20 USD

You’re a person who is all about creating big changes in the world and because you like what I'm doing, you want to support me. This amount is variable, and you can donate as much as you want. Thank you for your trust and support. It means a lot. This level does not include any products.

Donation of $45

One signed copy of Revolutionizing Intimacy. Price includes free shipping to any location in United States. An additional shipping fee of $10 is added for Canada, $15 for Europe, and $20 for the rest of the world.

Donation of $60 USD

My CD in Downloadable MP3 format - Your 20 Minute Simple Home Practice to clear the emotional stress and awaken your sensual vitality. “Uncovering The Intimate Truth Within Your Breath” PLUS One signed copy of Revolutionizing Intimacy.

Donation of $120

Two signed copies of Revolutionizing Intimacy.  Keep one copy for yourself and donate one to a friend, student, school, library, or anyone you feel would benefit from this book. Price includes free shipping anywhere in the world.

AND one copy of Your 20-Minute Simple Home Practice to clear the emotional stress and awaken your sensual vitality,  “Uncovering The Intimate Truth Within Your Breath”. 

Donation of $350

Personal Power Breakthrough Session - This session is focused on YOU. It is the gateway to a new beginning to taking back your Personal Power and Sensual Vitality. This session has the power to open the door to infinite possibilities in your relationships of all kinds.

You’ll achieve all this and more: 

  • Uncover and identify the blind spots that are keeping you stuck 
  • Clear old emotional, energetic and spiritual blocks 
  • Uncover your blind spots and why you may be feeling stuck in relationship patterns that are not serving your “Truth”
  • Learn and begin to clear away the old emotional components that are stopping you from achieving fulfillment from the bedroom to the boardroom
  •  Achieve a new feeling of Sensual Vitality and Enhanced Creative Flow

Donation of $997 USD

Unleash Spirit In Your Sex Life - This 3-Week series reignites your own personal sensuality and confidence and puts the fire back into your sex life. It’s perfect for couples or a group of couples/friends. Sessions may be held via Skype or in person. Each week we will meet for 1 hour to 90 min, exploring practices that cultivate awareness, presence, and rich levels of intimacy to increase passion and heighten your sexual vitality.

Donation of $2000

VIP Day! - Your VIP Day means you get to enjoy some of the benefits of Revolutionizing Intimacy Program condensed into one powerful 7-hour day! And you’ll receive a copy of Revolutionizing Intimacy. You’ll get all this and more, one-on-one with me:  

  • Learn to show up as authentically YOU in all your relationships 
  • Gain the capacity to attract ideal partnerships and build deep-seated trust in yourself
  • Communicate in ways that get you heard and seen and that bring greater creative success 
  • Trust your sensuality to be fuel in and out of the Board Room 
  • Magnetize the love you want in your life 
  • Unleash spirit into your sex life 

Donation of $5000 USD (Limited to 3)

90-Day Mentoring Program - This 18-hour program can help you transform your life in 90-days. Along with in-depth mentoring, you'll receive 5-signed copies of Revolutionizing Intimacy to hand out to your business partners, clients, friends. And your name will be printed in the foreword as a personal THANK YOU for your generous support.

  • Learn to show up as authentically YOU in all your relationships 
  • Gain the capacity to attract ideal partnerships and build deep-seated trust in yourself
  • Communicate in ways that get you heard and seen and that bring greater creative success 
  • Trust your sensuality to be fuel in and out of the Board Room 
  • Magnetize the love you want in your life 
  • Unleash spirit into your sex life 
  • You’ll also get VIP perks…too many to mention here!

story:
I want to commission a team of writers to amplify the voices of people of colour in the climate change debate.

This year's UN climate change conference in Paris (COP21) is fast approaching and climate change is - for the moment - high on the media radar again.

But in the run up to the conference, what kind of reports can we expect? On the one hand, right wing papers will continue pushing the perspectives of powerful business lobbies. Liberal papers will take their lead from the press officers of the bigger NGOs: mostly reporting on the work and  activism of a privileged  global minority – white and relatively wealthy.

In the middle of all of this, what chance do the most important stories have of breaking through?

Where will we hear the voices of those squeezed out of the frame – the many people of colour world-wide impacted by climate change, yet doing vital work to sustain the earth and the possibility of life for future generations? Like this.

The voices of the people, groups and movements who deeply understand how we got to our current state and who are taking action on it? Like these folk.

     (Courtesy of Pan-Afrikan Reparations Coalition in Europe)

And these.

        

(Association of Reserves of North Cauca, part of the Social and Community Minga, Colombia)

This isn't a token diversity pitch. At heart, this is about our collective future together on this planet.

We are approaching a point of 'no return', a point at which - whatever we do - it may not be possible to prevent the catastrophic impacts of climate change.

Yet there are examples of groups doing incredible work across the globe - drawing from the vast diversity of world traditions - who can share lessons for making the shifts that need to be made across social, political and economic systems to turn things around. With this campaign we want to raise the funds to create a platform for these groups to share their experience, knowledge and insight. Because  a positive ending to the Story of Climate Change won't happen if the only stories we hear are of white men (and a few women) in suits and lab coats.


So what exactly are we going to do?

Over the next three months, openDemocracy will host a series of articles written by diverse groups working in powerful ways on systemic change. Among other things, the series will explore environmental justice and its relationship to race, power, class, migration, conflict and other issues related to colonialism and its ongoing legacies; both in our everyday lives and in the social structures that continue to damage us, the environment and hope for future generations. 

We’ll introduce ways of understanding environmental justice that move past mainstream perspectives heavily influenced by colonial frameworks to ones that embrace a pluriverse of perspectives, connecting issues, people and networks in support of better strategies.

To bring all these learnings together we’ll host a closing event – a space to re-imagine different futures. And to continue building.

Specifically, we’ll publish 10 articles, of different lengths, on environmental justice and systemic change - on what is happening and what else needs to happen.

To do this, we’ll need inspiring contributors (all people of colour), an editor (that's me), and we’ll need money to support us to do this work. That’s where you come in.

All in all,  we'll need 4953 pounds.

This will pay for:

- a series editor for three months - £2000

- money to commission writers - £2000

- covering openDemocracy’s costs (tech time, etc) - £440

- indiegogo fees - £513


Let's put that into context:

  • A Saturday Guardian costs £2.90

  • A week’s worth of Financial Times’ costs £15.50

Even if we can't reach the full amount we can still commission writers article-by article. So anything you contribute will make a difference.


openDemocracy has a monthly readership of over 750,000 people. This is a chance for voices excluded from mainstream debates on climate change to make those debates more real; climate change isn't just about C02 emissions, it's about people.

       


Climate change rears its head across most social issues today; the current war in Syria has complex origins, but here too it has had an impact, with drought causing food prices to spiral and forcing people to migrate to over-burdened urban areas, more fuel – and casualties –  for fires fanned by military and security actors.

       

(Courtesy of Freedom House used via Flickr creative commons license)

Despite this, the Story of Climate Change is also about hope, about the groups and the evolving structures making a radically different future possible. For all of us.

It's these stories - and more - that this series will bring to life.

As well as contributing financially if you can, please help get the word out and share the campaign. Thank you!
