story:
(Scroll down for the English Version and activate the English subtitles in YouTube)

Lo básico

Nómada es el medio de la generación que está construyendo la primavera guatemalteca.

Guatemala está pasando por un momento clave en su historia. Una lucha por la justicia y la democracia. Una batalla contra la corrupción y la impunidad. Los poderosos necesitan ser fiscalizados y los ciudadanos necesitan información y contexto para cambiar el sistema.

Esto es imposible sin periodismo valiente.

¿Qué necesitamos?
¿Qué vas a ganar?

Necesitamos financiar dos meses de salarios del equipo increíble de 16 jóvenes que hace posible Nómada (con muchísimo trabajo). Esto nos permitirá seguir hacer periodismo, seguir construyendo una comunidad y conseguir fondos para otro año de periodismo, como hicimos en los últimos 15 meses.

A cambio recibirás uno de los libros de los primeros 140 días de la revolución pacífica guatemalteca. Y si donás un poco más, también pases libres para nuestras 6 fiestas de 2016 y una cena con el equipo de Nómada.

Además de donar a través de esta plataforma, podés hacer un depósito a esta cuenta: 
BANRURAL
CUENTA MONETARIA #3445513698 
A nombre de Nopeva, S.A.
:)

(Por favor envianos una foto de tu DPI y tu depósito a nomada@nomada.gt, para que te agreguemos a la lista de lectores-donantes.)

¿Qué impacto hemos tenido?

Entre el 7 de agosto de 2014 y el 14 de noviembre de 2015, hemos producido

346 reportajes y posts sobre política y 304 reportajes y posts sobre cotidianidad.

Google Analytics registró que recibimos 4,218,681 visitas de 1,507,315 usuarios. Como el 80 por ciento de las visitas son desde Guatemala, podemos afirmar que hemos llegado prácticamente a la mitad de los usuarios de internet del país.  

Pero más importante que los números, hemos aportado a construir una nueva generación de lectores y ciudadanos, que se informan en Nómada para hacer su propia visión de esta Guatemala que quiere la primavera. Aquí, un video de un minuto de la última actividad con la comunidad de lectores, a quienes les entregamos un libro con fotos de manifestantes y textos de Nómada.

Por medio de investigaciones periodísticas hemos metido a la cárcel a corruptos, frenado embusteros, fiscalizado a poderosos y desenmascarado estafadores. Hemos llegado a CNN, el New York Times, Al Jazeera, Fohla de Sao Paulo, Vice y Huffington Post.

Y hemos colocado el feminismo y las reivindicaciones de equidad de género sobre la mesa de debate en Guatemala.

Hemos hecho todo esto sin renunciar a nuestros principios de transparencia institucional (con todos los socios y donantes públicos).

Los riesgos
Los retos

Buscar la verdad no es tan sexy cuando uno fiscaliza a los poderosos. Los poderosos que tienen todo el dinero para anunciarse en medios. Por eso estamos en proceso de construir un modelo de negocios.  Un modelo con varias fuentes de ingresos –lectores, fundaciones, patrocinios y eventos–. El mes pasado hicimos un evento lúdico para acercar a la comunidad de lectores y empezamos a monetizarlo. Aquí el video de un minuto.  

Lo que dicen sobre Nómada

“Medios independientes como Nómada devuelven la esperanza de un futuro en el que el periodismo sea algo más que una industria contaminante que lanza vertidos a la sociedad”. DELIA RODRÍGUEZ, periodista autora del libro Memecracia.

“Nuestros socios más fuertes en Centroamérica. Su coraje nos ha enorgullecido en el momento en el que fue necesario: en todo momento”. JULIAN ASSANGE, director de WikiLeaks.

“Una de las mejores maneras de crear una sociedad más pacífica, próspera e igualitaria es apoyar proyectos como Nómada”. ROSS SETTLES, asesor en el MDIF.

“Es raro conocer periodistas tan dedicados a buscar la verdad. Nómada cree que el periodismo independiente e investigativo puede empoderar a las personas para mantener a sus líderes a raya. Representa un paso adelante para cambiar la realidad de miedo en una nación hermosa y resilente: una misión llena de coraje”.HANNAH WALLACE-BOWMAN, periodista de Radio Nederland, antes en Safe Passage.

“Quiero felicitarlos por el buen trabajo en Nómada. He estado leyendo la mayoría de mis noticias allí y estoy bastante impresionado”. LUIS VON AHN, Tecnólogo guatemalteco.


In English
Short Summary

Nómada is the voice of a generation bent on bringing forth the Guatemalan Spring.

Guatemala is going through a decisive point in its history. A struggle for Justice and Democracy. A battle against corruption and impunity. The practices of powerful need to be monitored, and citizens need information and context to change the system.

This is impossible without brave, independent journalism.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to finance two months of salaries for the amazing team, made up of 16 young bright minds. They make Nómada possible through their hard work, late nights and compromise. This will allow us to continue building a community, to get more funds for another year of journalism, the way we have been doing it the last 15 months.

In exchange you get one copy of the book 140 Days of Spring, which narrates the pacific Guatemalan revolution. And if you donate a little bit more you get VIP tickets to all of Nómada’s events in 2016; six over-the-top parties, conferences, forums and workshops. Plus, you get to have a sit down dinner with the amazing team we mentioned before.

The Impact

Between August 7th, 2014 and November 14th 2015 we have produced

  • 346 coverage and articles on national and global politics
  • 304 articles on quotidianity and micro politics.

Since we launched in August 2014 we have received 4,218, 681 visits from 1,507, 315 users*. Given that 80% of our visits are in Guatemala, we can say we’ve reached half of the country’s internet users. *(According to Google Analytics)

More than numbers, we have been able to contribute to develop a new generation of readers and citizens that want to be informed through Nómada. Our readers think for themselves and form their own perception of this Guatemala that is thirsty for Spring.  The last time we reached out to our community, we asked them to send us their photographs of the civil marches and demonstrations, we printed them and turned them into a book. This book, 140 Days of Spring, tells the story of the people who raised its voice, and roared. We made a video and you can watch it here.

Throughout investigative journalism we have imprisoned corrupt politicians, stopped tricksters, watchdogged the powerful and unmasked embezzlers. We have brought feminism and gender equality to be discussed in the political agenda in Guatemala. We have been featured in CNN, the New York Times, Al Jazeera, Fohla de Sao Paulo, Vice and The Huffington Post.

We have done all this without sacrificing institutional transparency with our partners and public donors.

Risks & Challenges

Searching for truth is not that cool when you’re watchdogging the powerful. Those who have the money to pay for ads in digital media. That’s why we are in the process of developing a strong business model with many income sources: readers, foundations, sponsorship and events (last month we threw a killer Halloween Party). 

What People Say About Us

“Independent Media like Nómada give us back the hope of a future where journalism is more than a polluting industry that spits out trash to society”.
DELIA RODRÍGUEZ, journalist, author of Memecracia.

“Our strongest partners in Central America. We are so proud of their courage at times when it has been necesary: at all times”.
JULIAN ASSANGE, director de WikiLeaks.

“One of the best ways to create a more peaceful, prosper and equal society is by supporting projects like Nómada”.
ROSS SETTLES, asesor en el MDIF.

“It is rare to know journalists so devoted to finding the truth. Nómada believes independent journalism can empower people to monitor their leaders. It represents a step ahead to get rid of fear in a beautiful, resilient nation: a mission full of courage”.
HANNAH WALLACE-BOWMAN,  Radio Nederland journalist
story_txt:
(Scroll down for the English Version and activate the English subtitles in YouTube)
Lo básico

Nómada es el medio de la generación que está construyendo la primavera guatemalteca.
Guatemala está pasando por un momento clave en su historia. Una lucha por la justicia y la democracia. Una batalla contra la corrupción y la impunidad. Los poderosos necesitan ser fiscalizados y los ciudadanos necesitan información y contexto para cambiar el sistema. 
Esto es imposible sin periodismo valiente.

¿Qué necesitamos?¿Qué vas a ganar?


Necesitamos financiar dos meses de salarios del equipo increíble de 16 jóvenes que hace posible Nómada (con muchísimo trabajo). Esto nos permitirá seguir hacer periodismo, seguir construyendo una comunidad y conseguir fondos para otro año de periodismo, como hicimos en los últimos 15 meses. A cambio recibirás uno de los libros de los primeros 140 días de la revolución pacífica guatemalteca. Y si donás un poco más, también pases libres para nuestras 6 fiestas de 2016 y una cena con el equipo de Nómada.Además de donar a través de esta plataforma, podés hacer un depósito a esta cuenta: BANRURALCUENTA MONETARIA #3445513698 A nombre de Nopeva, S.A.:)(Por favor envianos una foto de tu DPI y tu depósito a nomada@nomada.gt, para que te agreguemos a la lista de lectores-donantes.)


¿Qué impacto hemos tenido?

Entre el 7 de agosto de 2014 y el 14 de noviembre de 2015, hemos producido 
346 reportajes y posts sobre política y 304 reportajes y posts sobre cotidianidad. 
Google Analytics registró que recibimos 4,218,681 visitas de 1,507,315 usuarios. Como el 80 por ciento de las visitas son desde Guatemala, podemos afirmar que hemos llegado prácticamente a la mitad de los usuarios de internet del país.  Pero más importante que los números, hemos aportado a construir una nueva generación de lectores y ciudadanos, que se informan en Nómada para hacer su propia visión de esta Guatemala que quiere la primavera. Aquí, un video de un minuto de la última actividad con la comunidad de lectores, a quienes les entregamos un libro con fotos de manifestantes y textos de Nómada. 
Por medio de investigaciones periodísticas hemos metido a la cárcel a corruptos, frenado embusteros, fiscalizado a poderosos y desenmascarado estafadores. Hemos llegado a CNN, el New York Times, Al Jazeera, Fohla de Sao Paulo, Vice y Huffington Post. 
Y hemos colocado el feminismo y las reivindicaciones de equidad de género sobre la mesa de debate en Guatemala. 
Hemos hecho todo esto sin renunciar a nuestros principios de transparencia institucional (con todos los socios y donantes públicos). 
Los riesgosLos retosBuscar la verdad no es tan sexy cuando uno fiscaliza a los poderosos. Los poderosos que tienen todo el dinero para anunciarse en medios. Por eso estamos en proceso de construir un modelo de negocios.  Un modelo con varias fuentes de ingresos –lectores, fundaciones, patrocinios y eventos–. El mes pasado hicimos un evento lúdico para acercar a la comunidad de lectores y empezamos a monetizarlo. Aquí el video de un minuto.  


Lo que dicen sobre Nómada“Medios independientes como Nómada devuelven la esperanza de un futuro en el que el periodismo sea algo más que una industria contaminante que lanza vertidos a la sociedad”. DELIA RODRÍGUEZ, periodista autora del libro Memecracia.
“Nuestros socios más fuertes en Centroamérica. Su coraje nos ha enorgullecido en el momento en el que fue necesario: en todo momento”. JULIAN ASSANGE, director de WikiLeaks.
“Una de las mejores maneras de crear una sociedad más pacífica, próspera e igualitaria es apoyar proyectos como Nómada”. ROSS SETTLES, asesor en el MDIF.
“Es raro conocer periodistas tan dedicados a buscar la verdad. Nómada cree que el periodismo independiente e investigativo puede empoderar a las personas para mantener a sus líderes a raya. Representa un paso adelante para cambiar la realidad de miedo en una nación hermosa y resilente: una misión llena de coraje”.HANNAH WALLACE-BOWMAN, periodista de Radio Nederland, antes en Safe Passage.
“Quiero felicitarlos por el buen trabajo en Nómada. He estado leyendo la mayoría de mis noticias allí y estoy bastante impresionado”. LUIS VON AHN, Tecnólogo guatemalteco.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Revolution News is a grassroots collective of independent journalists, photographers, artists, translators and activists reporting on international news with a focus on human rights. Between us, our members speak fifteen languages and are located in several different countries around the world. We love what we do. We think it’s important to publish news about global struggles that don’t get oxygen in corporate media. And that’s why we have been doing this work for three years with very little compensation. With that said, we struggle financially every month just to keep our website online.

We have never accepted money from any corporate sponsors and we intend to maintain our editorial independence in fierce defiance of the standard media business model. The minimal ads we include on our website just barely cover our overhead, which is usually $400 per month. We would not still be here if it weren’t for our faithful readers and fans who share our content. We are so grateful for the support we’ve received thus far. But now we need to humbly ask for financial assistance so that we can continue to do what we do best – report news that the mainstream media won’t touch.

With this fundraiser, we are hoping to raise $5000, which will pay our overhead fees for one year. If our monthly costs were taken care of, we would be able to focus all our energy on publishing great content without constantly having to worry about keeping our heads above water. We could then use any extra revenue we earn to pay our contributors and grow our collective.

Interested in helping support independent media? Please consider making a small donation to help us move our project to the next level.

story:
I think we can all agree, if we all could love ourselves more, the world would be a much happier place.

Our next book, online course and coaching program helps us understand that we are all part of one LIFE. When we remember our connection with life itself as one human family, we also remember we are truly loveable at our core. When we FEEL lovable, it is much easier to be kind and extend that love to other members of our extended human family. Imagine with me… this loving wisdom can cascade into a snowball effect that will transform human lives everywhere, and help our planet.

 

 

Endorsements for Our Work

 

Please support this project by contributing, sharing on social media and sending email to people you feel will like this campaign. We’d love it if you care to sha

 

 

The Invitation

 

Please support this project by contributing, sharing on social media and sending email to people you feel will like this campaign. We’d love it if you care to share your inspiration about this project in the comments below as well!

The core “why” of this project is to make it possible for every human being on this planet to receive this potent self-love memo! We need your help to make it happen, and here’s why.

We could go to a formal publishing route. We’re choosing not to, because it typically takes two years for the book to hit the shelves once a traditional publishing contract is signed. And getting the contract itself can take months, if not years.

We don’t want to wait! We feel this book can benefit people around the world now. That’s why we’re inviting you to be a part of making this dream of real.

We have a fantastic international team of talented editors, videographers, consultants, designers, artists, and administrators. When you choose to support the campaign by pre-ordering a book or getting one of our perks as a gift for yourself or someone you love, you will also be supporting a whole bunch of awesome independent consultants who are doing their good work in the world.

 

 

We Are Ready To Succeed

 

Our team is poised at the edge of the possible.

By supporting the campaign, you are helping us with: editing; printing; illustration; cover design; audio book recording; e-book formatting; production of a beautiful trailer by Mikki Willis' team at Elevate Studios; distribution and library book sales; all aspects of administration for publishing; social media; and book marketing, including graphic design, setting up book signings, and an official launch in Los Angeles at Conscious Life Expo in February.

Printing / Editing / E-Books / Audio Book Recording
$7000+

Videography / Design / Art / Website
$6500+

Campaigns / Publicity / Marketing / Admin / Consulting / Events
$3500+

There are several rewards levels in our “perks” section that will help get this book into production. Here are some ideas: Pre-order a signed copy of the book for yourself or a loved one. Enroll in our online course or coaching program, or give these as gifts. We’ve also added empowering consultations to the array of offerings. All our perks are deeply discounted as a thank you to Indiegogo campaign champions!

With a previous self-published title backing us up, we also have the benefit  what I learned as a self-publishing consultant. I have personally studied book publicity with the great Arielle Ford, and have been working with Tom Bird, a powerful author's coach for many years. From my experience as a producer in the film and event space, the team gets the advantage of my knowledge of systems and production. On the content side, I have been helping people actively as a seer, healer, and guide for nearly 30 years.

Should we exceed our funding goal, there are 5 more titles in the works! Book III of the Codes of Union series is already written, as is a book on collaboration for visionaries and teams. Three additional titles have been started or are in concept phase. We have also prepared nearly a dozen online courses which will help people get the deeper support they need to take these teachings and make them alive in their lives. And, we are bringing the Fall In Love with You Global Online Summit to the world as a free gift. Extra funds to support the Summit would be awesome!

 

 

More Ways You Can Help

 

In addition to pre-ordering the book or grabbing one of the perks for yourself or a loved one, here are more ways to help! Please also consider becoming a champion of this project by:

• Sharing this campaign your social networks like twitter, facebook, instagram

•Sending out emails to people you know who you feel will really love this campaign in it’s various aspects: the spirit of it, the book, or the global vision.

• And last but not least, remembering to use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Thank you for reading about this campaign, and thank you for your support!

 

In Gratitude,

Chireya & Team

story:
Short Summary

Dear parents and contributors,

We are Micah and Katie Smith and we are the proud parents of two amazing kids! Micah is a Los Angeles based Director, Producer and Photographer and Katie is a Child Development Specialist, Writer, Speaker and Parenting Coach.

 

 

 

In 2012, Katie was diagnosed with high grade brain cancer. At that time there was not a lot of things she could do to help improve her health. One of the few things she could control though, was the way she lived her life going forward. The first thing she did was to radically change the way she and her family ate. A self confessed “junk food junkie”, she immediately cut out all sugar, soda and junk food of any kind and switched to organic, healthy alternatives.

 

 

It was a drastic change, but she was highly motivated! Getting the children on board with the plan was a bit more of a challenge. With Halloween approaching, she and Micah wanted to find inventive ways to keep the fun but avoid so much sugar.

That's when the idea of Sweets The Witch was born! 

Our book Sweets The Witch and Her Sweetswitch is meant to inspire families to choose a healthy way of living and to help decrease the amount of sugar our children are consuming.

Sweets the Witch solves the problem of having too much candy consumed and leftover on Halloween. By asking children to trade some or all of their candy for a toy or surprise, Sweets gets the candy she craves and the children get their special wish granted while still enjoying the fun of dressing up and trick or treating. 

On Halloween night Sweets the Witch will do a SweetSwitch, trading out some, or all of your child's candy for a special toy or wish. It can be an outing or activity such as a movie or bowling, or it can be a toy they've been wanting. The more candy they trade, the better the wish, but it must be a fair trade! This is a wonderful Halloween family tradition that our children look forward to every year!

Your contribution will help us create a prototype for a Sweets The Witch doll, which will then be made into an actual doll that children can hold, touch, play with and even take trick or treating! Our doll will also have places for kids to put their fingers so that they can move Sweets' arms and hands so she can hold and pick things up. She is an interactive doll!  Sweets The Witch isn't monitoring your child to see if they've been good or bad, Sweets loves all children! Also, children get to have a say in what they would like to trade their candy for.

Along with our doll, We need to design and create the packaging that will include our book, Sweets The Witch and Her SweetSwitch, as well as a mini cauldron to put their wish in on Halloween night. We are also working on a CD that will include original Halloween songs written and sung by the fabulously talented Julia Albert! If we can complete the recordings we will include the CD in our packaging. All of this takes money, and we need your help! After being diagnosed with cancer Katie was not able to go back to work, creating Sweets The Witch with Micah has become a blessing, giving her a much needed creative outlet as well as a way to still help parents and kids.

By contributing to our campaign you will help make our dreams come true and we will reward you with PERKS! Contributions small and large will receive things like a special hand signed, personal note from Sweets, signed books, a CD of our original songs, a doll or the whole package!

We hope to inspire you to fill your children up with love and to make new and fun traditions that will give them the best start in life.

Thank you!!

Blessings,

Katie and Micah Smith
story_txt:
Short Summary
Dear parents and contributors,
We are Micah and Katie Smith and we are the proud parents of two amazing kids! Micah is a Los Angeles based Director, Producer and Photographer and Katie is a Child Development Specialist, Writer, Speaker and Parenting Coach.
 

 
 
In 2012, Katie was diagnosed with high grade brain cancer. At that time there was not a lot of things she could do to help improve her health. One of the few things she could control though, was the way she lived her life going forward. The first thing she did was to radically change the way she and her family ate. A self confessed “junk food junkie”, she immediately cut out all sugar, soda and junk food of any kind and switched to organic, healthy alternatives.
 

 
It was a drastic change, but she was highly motivated! Getting the children on board with the plan was a bit more of a challenge. With Halloween approaching, she and Micah wanted to find inventive ways to keep the fun but avoid so much sugar.
That's when the idea of Sweets The Witch was born! 
Our book Sweets The Witch and Her Sweetswitch is meant to inspire families to choose a healthy way of living and to help decrease the amount of sugar our children are consuming.
Sweets the Witch solves the problem of having too much candy consumed and leftover on Halloween. By asking children to trade some or all of their candy for a toy or surprise, Sweets gets the candy she craves and the children get their special wish granted while still enjoying the fun of dressing up and trick or treating. 
On Halloween night Sweets the Witch will do a SweetSwitch, trading out some, or all of your child's candy for a special toy or wish. It can be an outing or activity such as a movie or bowling, or it can be a toy they've been wanting. The more candy they trade, the better the wish, but it must be a fair trade! This is a wonderful Halloween family tradition that our children look forward to every year!
Your contribution will help us create a prototype for a Sweets The Witch doll, which will then be made into an actual doll that children can hold, touch, play with and even take trick or treating! Our doll will also have places for kids to put their fingers so that they can move Sweets' arms and hands so she can hold and pick things up. She is an interactive doll!  Sweets The Witch isn't monitoring your child to see if they've been good or bad, Sweets loves all children! Also, children get to have a say in what they would like to trade their candy for.
Along with our doll, We need to design and create the packaging that will include our book, Sweets The Witch and Her SweetSwitch, as well as a mini cauldron to put their wish in on Halloween night. We are also working on a CD that will include original Halloween songs written and sung by the fabulously talented Julia Albert! If we can complete the recordings we will include the CD in our packaging. All of this takes money, and we need your help! After being diagnosed with cancer Katie was not able to go back to work, creating Sweets The Witch with Micah has become a blessing, giving her a much needed creative outlet as well as a way to still help parents and kids.
By contributing to our campaign you will help make our dreams come true and we will reward you with PERKS! Contributions small and large will receive things like a special hand signed, personal note from Sweets, signed books, a CD of our original songs, a doll or the whole package!
We hope to inspire you to fill your children up with love and to make new and fun traditions that will give them the best start in life.
Thank you!!
Blessings,
Katie and Micah Smith

story:
We are “mermix”, a nonprofit theatrical and art company, located in Thessaloniki – Greece. Our main subject is theater productions but we are also involved in playwriting, scenography/costume design, art and event direction. For the “The Journey of Halima” project, we have gathered people from around the world and we are all volunteering in order to making it happen.


We searched for, found and studied traditional Syrian folk tales, and wrote about the journey of Halima who wants to reach the Land of Rain, in order to bring the rainclouds back to her land, the Land of the Sun, where there is a terrible drought, and where the people are no longer happy. In order to reach the Land of Rain, Halima has to go through many countries where she makes many new friends.


The book is divided into four units. The first unit is illustrated and addressed to young readers. The following units are interactive: in the second unit, children can colour in the images of the heroes/heroines; in the third they can use the lines to write their own stories and thoughts; the fourth unit will contain empty pages for drawing and painting. Each book will be accompanied by crayons and a pen, packaged for protection and easy distribution.

The book will be made available free of charge in a printed and electronic version. The printed version will be distributed to refugee children during their stay in Greece. The story will be trilingual, written in Syrian Arabic, Persian Language (Farsi) and English (as the lingua franca). The electronic version of the story (PDF) will also be trilingual, in a combination of various languages, into which it will be translated (Syrian – Persian Language – Greek, Syrian – Persian Language – German, etc.). These e-books will be available to download from the project website and could be printed in the language desired. The printed story will be in asmall page format, so that it may easily fit into a child’s backpack or their guardian’s luggage without adding any extra weight.


The small theatrical will be performed daily in the refugee camps near Thessaloniki or where it is needed. It will be a performance of the story of Halima, without words, and approximately lasting an hour. It will be fully designed with all the costumes and sets, music written for the show and four to five actors working for it. The theatrical show of Halima, will be a part of the whole project and will be another form of fund rising in order to support the book printing.

With "The Journey of Halima", apart from entertaining the children, we want to give them some moments of empowerment and hope. We have removed all violence often present in folk tales. There is no “bad guy” and all people are kind. There are no kings or princesses and there are no religious references. Special care has been taken to create a story that is modern, multicultural and intercultural, under the guidance of academics specializing in this field.


Visit thejourneyofhalima.com, download the book free of charge and give it to a child to read. This way you can spread a fascinating story to read and think about the problems that refugees are facing throughout the world.


Informing the media in your country of residence

If ‘The Journey of Halima’ is not yet well known in your country of residence and you would like to help inform the media, send us an email at volunteer@thejourneyofhalima.com and we will send you all the information you need to make the project known in your area.


Narrating the story to refugee children and in schools

Narrating ‘The Journey of Halima’ offers quality time to children, whether they are refugees or not. If you would like to read the story to children, send us an email at storytelling@thestoryofhalima.com and we will send you all the necessary material for you to develop your storytelling skills. You can always download the story in the language you are interested in, print it and narrate it to children in any way you like.


Book the theatrical show

The second important part of ‘The Journey of Halima’ is the theatrical perfomance held in areas where there are refugee children. The performance is appropriate for multicultural audiences and can be presented on most stages. It has been set up in such a way that it can travel the world with four actors and four technicians. All of the sets and costumes can be folded away for economic transportation. If you are a theatrical producer, an educational institution or an organization that would like to help promote and financially support the project, please contact the project General Manager, Mr. Nikos Kalaitzidis, at director@thejourneyofhalima.com, to further discuss the matter.


Book presentation

The most important part of the project is the 120-page ‘The Journey of Halima’ trilingual book, which will be given to refugee children free of charge, and which can be downloaded for free from our website, where you can find it translated into many languages. We are prepared to travel the world and present our book and project to colleges, universities and educational organizations. This way we can financially support the project and spread its intercultural and humanitarian action. Please contact the project General Manager, Mr. Nikos Kalaitzidis, atdirector@thejourneyofhalima.com, to further discuss the matter.

story:
The Story

Meet Max! Max has a fear that is very common with kids his age. Max is afraid of MONSTERS! Every night when he crawls into bed he can see the monsters in his closet and their shadows on the walls. One morning when Max wakes up, he finds a box at the foot of his bed. Inside the box he finds a book with something tucked underneath. Once he moves the book he quickly realizes what he sees… a monster! This monster was different than the others that Max knows. In fact, the orange and furry monster explains to Max that monsters aren’t there to scare him, they simply are looking for a new friend. After Max learns about the monsters, he decides to name his new monster Harry Bumpkin. Harry and Max become the best of friends. At night, when Max is afraid, Harry is awake under the bed waiting to keep the monsters out. This helps Max to never be afraid of monsters again!

By reading our fun and adventurous storybook, children and their parents will learn how Max overcomes his fear of monsters by getting to know one. It is our hope that through this fun adventure, your child will be able to start overcoming their nighttime fears also!


3 GREAT REASONS TO SUPPORT OUR CAMPAIGN

•You'll help children overcome their fear of monsters! My Monster Under the Bed helps teach children to look past their fear and embrace what is different. Our hope is that this fun story will help instill an ideology of acceptance and diversity.

•You'll allow us to mass produce this fun story and it’s plush monster companions! We have invested a significant amount of time and resources in bringing the story this far. We have completed the story, the illustrations, the website and even created a plush monster prototype! We need your help to take it further. 

•You'll enjoy some great perks including copies of the book, a loveable Monster plush, and much more! 



HOW IT WORKS

You can contribute to our campaign using one of the options to the right of your screen.

For a contribution of $20, we'll send you a 1st edition copy of My Monster Under the Bed once it's printed, OR for a little more you can get a copy of the book PLUS a plush Monster for your child to have at bedtime. You can help out a school or nonprofit, hang some one-of-a-kind artwork on the wall, and put your name in print forever. You could even dedicate the entire 1st edition!

And if nothing special catches your eye but you still want to support our cause, you can donate any amount you choose to the campaign.

WHO WE ARE

Our duo includes a crazy dad who loves to write (Jeremy) and an amazing children's illustrator (Linda). Jeremy wrote this story for his son, Brycen. While the story was fun, Linda brought it to life! We want to share our story with your family so you can create your own bedtime tradition. 


WHY A STORYBOOK?

Everyone has a story from their childhood that they love to remember. We believe that My Monster Under the Bed is one of those very special stories that will help create long lasting memories. We also believe that this story will help children to engage the concepts of diversity and acceptance. The pictures are bright, the characters are loveable and the story is rhythmic and fun! 

My Monster Under the Bed is a classic tale of two unlikely best friends. It is a tale of friendship and overcoming fear that teaches young readers how to accept each other, even if they are different. 

To make the story real, we are creating an 8" plush Harry Bumpkin monster doll that the children can keep in their closet or under their beds. Parents can use the monster to help teach children not to be afraid and to have a more calm bedtime experience. 


WHY WE NEED YOU

We have invested a lot of time, energy and resources into this story. What started as a fun tradition between the author and his son has turned into an opportunity to for children everywhere to have a new bedtime tradition. In order to bring the story to the capacity needed, we need your help. 

We have already completed the story, the illustration, and the website for the story. We have even created the original Harry Bumpkin plush monster. Now we need you! We need your help in getting this fun story mass produced. With your help, we will meet our goal and you will get some AWESOME perks!

Breakdown of budget

•$3,730 Printing (1,000 hardcopy books at $3.73 per unit)

•$5,625 Plush prototype design and production (750 plush monsters at $7.50 per unit)

•Plush child safety and product quality testing and certification (included in monster design and production)

•$1,750 Book and plush packaging

•$1,250 Indiegogo and Paypal fees

In order to fully realize the book and accompanying plush as we envision them, we need to raise $11,500. We've dedicated many hours and our own funds to get this far, and we're 100 percent determined to take this project to the finish line. 

HOW YOU CAN HELP

•Spread the word. The more people who know about the campaign, the sooner we'll fulfill our mission. Please SHARE this campaign with people you know.

•Contribute money to the campaign. Money is needed! Smaller amounts will win our love and gratitude. Larger amounts will get you that, plus some pretty nice perks.

•Leave a comment here. Please cheer us on or let us know what you think! It may sound silly, but it would really mean a lot.

THANK YOU!

story:
In February 2011, I had an epiphany that would change my life forever … and the lives of tens of thousands of entrepreneurs around the world. 

Before that fateful day, I was a struggling service provider emulating what I saw the most successful people doing. I learned all about 6-figure success and online marketing strategies.

The problem was, it never quite worked out the way the marketing gurus made it sound. And it seemed like the only people consistently finding robust success were the ones selling others the promise of robust success. (In my heart, I knew that didn't count.)

A bigger problem besides the poor results was that deep inside, using these marketing tactics felt bad to me. At times, I felt sick to my stomach; at other times, I felt anxious by what I was supposed to say and do to "get the buyer to a yes". 

Sometimes I was even told to lie, and nearly always to manipulate the potential buyer, as if they were too dumb to make decisions like where to spend their money and what solution to purchase.

There was a dissonance inside me as I pressed Send on an email or wrote words on a web page that were supposed to cause people to buy from me.

When I was able to sell something well, I wasn’t attracting the right people, and all kinds of problems would ensue. Still other times, potential buyers expressed anger to me over my marketing approach. (Ouch.) They thought more highly of me than what they saw me doing. 

But I was told, "To be successful, this is what you have to do."

Then on that date in 2011, in a moment of high creative awareness, I realized why the marketing that's been taught for a hundred years or more didn't work for almost anyone I knew, or, to make it work, required them to put on a mask and be someone they're not.

What emerged was a set of archetypes that reflected the intersection of one's Natural Style of providing solutions and one's Personal Persuasion Power – or natural influence.

I stayed up all night writing down what I'd discovered and organized it into a grid. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Here's what it looked like:


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
When I looked at the matrix, I realized that almost every marketing or sales strategy ever taught was built for only one archetype, but that in the new economy, almost no one starting businesses fit that archetype anymore.

No wonder so many people were struggling!

I had become a marketing strategist by default, it seemed. 

The concept took off like wildfire.

The Grid, as we who know it affectionately call it, was the missing piece that almost every entrepreneur, author and artist I knew desperately needed.

In fact, the moment I shared this with people something interesting happened: most of them, upon learning of the Grid, began crying tears of relief. 

Emotion poured out of them as they had a profound realization: There is nothing wrong with me, and it’s not my fault that my marketing isn't working. I get to be myself AND be successful. I get to have things be way easier and fall into place for me. I get to live my dream.

Since then The Grid has had a fun ride: it’s helped thousands of entrepreneurs set off on a new course. It’s provided a foundation for choices, not only in the right marketing but in choosing the right business model, pricing and offers. The Grid can even help with messaging and branding!

The Grid even went viral after being mentioned in an article written by Stephanie St Claire and posted on Medium.com.

I believe that if this concept has gone viral, it could be a genuine bestseller as a book. And since one of my dreams is to be a bestselling author, that would certainly make me happy. :)

Now, almost seven years after my stroke of insight, and after applying what I discovered with dozens of clients, creating content-driven programs used by hundreds of entrepreneurs and licensing others to use the archetypes with their clients, it's time to go bigger, wider and help every person changed by this work to understand it more deeply. 

Will you help me amp up the marketing revolution I already started by supporting me in putting everything I know into a book (or maybe two or three)? 

Together, we can expand and deepen the impact of this work to millions of people worldwide, and change what commerce looks like for generations to come.  And if you're familiar with the Grid, you can deepen your own understanding of it, too.

To get this book written and make it a bestseller, I need time and focus. I'll need time away from the day-to-day running of my business, time away from serving clients for a bit, time away from marketing my own business. I need to have the freedom and focus to bring you what you need and want in an environment free of distractions. And I'll need to hire a couple of people to help me.

When you contribute to the creation of this book, you'll be supporting millions of entrepreneurs, authors and artists in realizing their dreams, too. And when you share it, you'll be helping create a ripple effect, opening up possibilities beyond what we can imagine.

With warmth and gratitude,
Beth A. Grant

And when you share it, you'll be helping create a ripple effect, opening up possibilities beyond what we can imagine.With warmth and gratitude,Beth A. Grant

story:
Hello, My name is Jeff.  I am now a great grandfather and have pretty much devoted my adult life to helping and teaching my grandkids.  I hand made board games to teach them to read and count, and wrote books, with my own rudimentary illustrations to, not only teach them, but, encourage them to WANT to learn. The result with them has been nothing short of amazing.  A nurse, a dental assistant, two Valedictorians (One at PIMA Medical Institute), another currently attending the University of New Mexico, and the youngest with a 4.0 GPA and Albuquerque's prestigious "Albuquerque Academy" high school.  

     Now I have a great grandson to devote my attention to.  He is currently in Kindergarten, but, reading on a, late first grade, early second grade level and leading his class in every measured category.  He has developed an interest in learning anything and everything.  He constantly asks me to read him the books I wrote for his mom, aunts and uncle and asked me to write some for him.  I have titles, such as, "How High Is the Sky?", where I answer that question, as well as explain why the sky appears blue.  "Where Do We Come From?", which tries to explain, on a young child's level, how we come in to being.  And, most recently, "How Much Do I Love You?", which I wrote specifically for my great grandson and tell him how important he is to me.  All of my books are written in catchy rhymes, and use words that can be understood by children of all ages.  One book, "The Little Lost Fish", is an educational book that plays on the discovery of the Coelacanth, which was thought to be extinct.  In my book, the lead character is a little fish who gets lost playing hide and seek with her friends and family and is later found.

     These books have been such a success with my family and so gratifying that I want to share them with others, so that they may hopefully benefit as much my family has.  I am trying to get them published, one at a time, in the order I wrote them.  As I learn this process, I am finding that illustrations, publishing and marketing are quite expensive.  I am estimating about $5000 per book, when it's all said and done.  That's a LOT of money for an old man.  lol.  I am hoping to use this campaign to get the first book published and, God willing, it will help fund the next book, and so forth.

     If you can see fit, and would like to help me, it would be greatly appreciated, not only by me, but, by my great grandson, who would love to take an actual published book, written by me, to his school to show his friends and teachers.  If you are unable to help financially, I completely understand, and would ask that you share my link/cause with your friends and family who may be able to assist me in my dream of publishing.  Any prayers are also greatly appreciated.  Any funds I receive, regardless of whether or not I reach my goal, will be used to help me get this first book published.  Any surplus from the first book, will be used to begin the process on book number two.

     Thank you for taking the time to read my story and thank you for ANY help you are able to provide.

story:
Please note: 

If you'd like to contribute to the campaign, without perks, you can simply click on the 'Back It' button. You’ll be able to enter the amount you'd like to contribute, and choose your payment method.

Please note that if you select the "Back It" button, you will only be donating funds to the campaigner, in the amount you enter. In this case, you will not have claimed a perk.

 

So, what is Holl & Lane?

Hi, I'm Sarah and I'm the creator and Editor in Chief of Holl & Lane Magazine.  I created this magazine in April 2015 after noticing a lack of media talking about the issues so many of us can relate to.  We're taught to hide the hard parts of life behind a pretty Instagram filter, when in fact, those parts are what connect us to one another.  They are what make us who we are.  We shouldn't be ashamed. 

Holl & Lane has become more than a magazine. The community of women (and men!) that have rallied behind our mission of support, honesty, and love have found a lifeline in us.  Women from all around the world have developed friendships within our community and have found solace in our pages.

We want to be able to continue producing a high quality, well polished magazine and also begin to explore other avenues to connect our readers.  When you support our campaign, you're not only helping our little business to grow, you're helping us to reach new women who need to hear that someone understands exactly what they're going through.  You're helping us to promote honest media in a beautiful way.  And you're helping a small-town girl with a dream help others find their way.

 

How you can help us...

With the money raised, you'll help us create a whole year of beautiful issues.  The printing and shipping costs of a magazine are extremely high, especially when your pages are thick and luxurious (our magazine is often compared to a coffee table book).  With the money from this campaign, we'll be able to keep our magazine ad free and instead focus on what is inside.

$18,000 is a lot of money.  But it only truly scratches the surface of what it takes to run a magazine for a year.  Currently, with printing the bare minimum number of issues each quarter, it still costs nearly $5000 to print and ship each issue.  If we don't raise the full amount, we will still be able to use the money raised to put towards our upcoming issues and allow us to get back to focusing on our community, rather than on the sales.

We'll also be able to do the things we've been dreaming of - donating copies of the magazine to women's shelters and college campuses to reach women when they need to know they're not alone.  We'll be able to host events and retreats to have heartfelt connections in person.  And most importantly, we'll be able to keep going.  

 

Why we're different...

One of our readers had this to say about Holl & Lane, and we think it perfectly sums up what we are trying to do:

Holl & Lane isn't a magazine. Sure, it looks that way. It has stories and a couple ads and pages to turn (or the ability to swipe if you're a digital reader type of person) but there's more to H&L than just that.

When you think magazine, you think glossy pages at the end of a grocery store checkout aisle with some celebrity face on it, selling the latest beauty product, and telling you how to make your body look different so your sex life can be better.

H&L isn't that.

Beyond the thick, matte pages and simplistic cover design (that is clearly worthy of any coffee table) are evergreen stories about real life, strength, and perseverance. There are stories that say, "I've been where you are right now, and there are reasons you're going through this, and here's a way to pull yourself out of the pit you might be in."

This isn't a magazine. This is a lifeline. This is someone, somewhere, saying you are not alone. This is a revolution to show women, you are perfect as you are and there are other women just like you who have been standing right where you feel you are right now. It's just that now, because of H&L, you know you are not standing there alone. - Chelsea 

 

Can't help financially?  This is how you can help instead...

We're so thankful for you taking the time to read more about who we are and what we strive to do.  If you're not able to financially donate, we'd love your help in spreading the word about our campaign.  A simple share can mean the world to a small business.  

 

Please note: 

If you'd like to contribute to the campaign, without perks, you can simply click on the 'Back It' button. You’ll be able to enter the amount you'd like to contribute, and choose your payment method.

Please note that if you select the "Back It" button, you will only be donating funds to the campaigner, in the amount you enter. In this case, you will not have claimed a perk.

story:
It is time to translate Friedman into the Bosnian language!

Libertarian Association "Multi" is the pioneering and largest libertarian organization in Bosnia and Herzegovina. It was founded in 2011 and so far has implemented a number of successful projects aimed at promoting the ideas of liberty in Bosnia and Herzegovina, but also in the Western Balkans region. We highlight OPEN festival - the largest libertarian festival in Europe; local ESFL conferences; the documentary film "Economy"; "Catalaxy" seminars and numerous other projects. So far we've published several books - Islam and the Free Market (Čavalić & Smajić); The Economics of Freedom (Palmer); Introduction to Objectivism (Vrtarić) and The Essential HAYEK (Boudreaux). Now we want to issue our next book, which is "Capitalism and Freedom" by Milton Friedman.

Why do we want to translate it?

This is what we consider to be our capital project because so far "Capitalism and Freedom" has not been translated into Bosnian. For this very reason, libertarian culture has not developed enough, especially among the intellectuals. Namely, the intellectual elites lack the basis of reference to which they would build their models of social change. Without this, they turn to socialism and other types of interventionism, which in the long run makes the country poorer.

What are we going to do?

With $ 4,000 support, we will do the translation of the book "Capitalism and Freedom" into Bosnian. The book will be printed and published by our organization, and we will organize several promotions in the largest cities of Bosnia and Herzegovina. Most importantly, the book will be shared with universities, libraries, but also decision-makers, opinion leaders, and the like. Book will not be commercially sold, so all the copies will be delivered for free (yes we know that there is no free lunch, but we need to make compromises). It is important to note that we will give special attention to who receives the book (we prefer people from academia, entrepreneurs, politicians, youtube stars, people from media, and other celebrities). 

Is it worth it?

All in all, every dollar will be spent on the book itself and on our mission of spreading the ideas of liberty in Bosnia and Herzegovina. We are well-known as an organization that is achieving excellent cost-benefit when it comes to promoting the ideas of liberty (best known by our partners such as Students For Liberty, Atlas Network, Friedrich von Naumman Foundation and others). That is why we are looking for your support. If you have any questions regarding our cause, please let us know.

Admir Čavalić, director of the Libertarian Association "Multi"

www.multi.ba

Vrijeme je da prevedemo Friedmana na bosanski!

Udruženje građana "Multi" je pionirska i najveća libertarijanska organizacija u Bosni i Hercegovini. Osnovana je 2011. godine i dosada je realizovala niz uspješnih projekata usmjernih na promociji ideja slobode u Bosni i Hercegovini, ali i regionu Zapadnog Balkana. Izdvajamo OPEN festival - najveći libertarijanski festival u Evropi; domaće ESFL konferencije; dokumentarni film "Ekonomija"; "Katalaksija" seminare i brojne druge projekte. Dosada smo izdali nekoliko knjiga - Islam i slobodno tržište (Čavalić/Smajić); Ekonomija slobode (Palmer), Uvod u objektivizam (Vrtarić) i Hayek, osnove (Boudreaux). Sada želim izdati našu sljedeću knjigu, a to je "Kapitalizam i sloboda" od Milton Friedmana.

Zašto prevodimo knjigu?

Ovo smatramo našim kapitalnim projektom jer dosada ova knjiga nije prevođena na bosanski jezik. Upravo zbog toga se nije dovoljno razvila libertarijanska kultura, naročito među intelektualcima. Naime, intelektualne elite nemaju baznih izvora na koje bi se referisali i na osnovu kojih bi gradili svoje modele promjene društva. Zbog toga nerijetko potežu za socijalizmom i drugim intervencionističkim ideologijama.

Šta planiramo uraditi?

Sa 4000 dolara podrške, uradit ćemo prevod knjige "Kapitalizam i sloboda" na bosanski jezik. Knjiga će se štampati i izdati u našoj organizaciji, te ćemo organizovati nekoliko promocija u najvećih gradovima Bosne i Hercegovine. Ono što je najvažnije je da će se knjiga podijeliti univerzitetima, bibliotekama, ali također i donosiocima odluka, liderima mišljenja i slično. Pritom ćemo voditi računa da knjigu dobiju oni koji će od nje imati koristi i koji će dalje moći širiti ove ideje.

Da li se isplati?

Dakle, svaki dolar će biti potrošen na samu knjigu i na našu misiju širenja ideja slobode u Bosni i Hercegovini. Poznati smo kao organizacija koja vodi računa o tome da se svaki dolar potroši namjensi i da najviše doprinese promociji ideja slobode. Upravo zbog toga tražimo vašu podršku. Ukoliko imate dodatnih pitanja, slobodno nas kontaktirajte.

Admir Čavalić, direktor udruženja "Multi"

www.multi.ba

story:
Beware the Femme Fatal

We're writing a picture book on Film Noir and its important life lessons. Everything that you could possibly need to know about life can be learned through this film genre that is so quintessentially American.

John and Katherine

John is a life-long archeologist and film buff who has been running the blog and podcast Classic Movie Reviews with Snark for several years and he's learned a lot doing it. Now in what he calls the "back nine" of life, he's discovered that Film Noir is the key! Katherine is a bit younger but has an appreciation for the arts and film. Together, we've created a project we think is worth your time! 

What is Film Noir?

Film Noir is a term that was applied to a subset of American films by French film critics following World War II, literally meaning "black film". The French were cut off from American film during the war, so when the films started coming in again, they noticed the mood was no longer escapist like those films from the Depression era. It had turned dark and moody, maybe a little cynical, but it had a few things to teach us.

Why is this important?

We believe in this project. It's cute, it's funny, it's educational. We have an amazingly talented artist working with us to bring this book to life. Of course, art has a huge value and we want to bring the final results to the people. Hence, this campaign. All proceeds will go toward funding the art necessary to get the book off the ground. Every little bit helps and we will move forward with the book no matter what because we believe it's important to share with the world!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that money is tight--that's why we're asking for help--so if you can't toss some coins our way, no problem! There are other ways for you guys to help us:

  • Share our campaign with your friends and family on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social medium you could think of.
  • Know any film buffs or people passionate about supporting the arts? Think they might be interested? Share with them!
  • Be on the lookout for the book when it does become available for purchase and snag yourself a copy!

story:
This is what I want for Christmas this year!

 

Help me bring the entire John Jordan Mystery Thriller Series to Audiobook format! 

 

Audiobooks are the fasting growing segment of publishing right now, and the John Jordan series is a perfect fit for this format. I LOVE audiobooks and listen to them all the time! 

 

I've worked hard to get all the rights for all the books to be turned into audiobooks. I've found a professional narrator and production team. Everything is ready. Now I just need your help!

 

We've put together some very special premium gifts for you as a THANK YOU for helping complete the John Jordan series in audiobook format. I hope you'll look them over and send us your help today. 

 

CHECK OUT ALL THE COOL PERKS OVER TO THE RIGHT OF THE PAGE! 

 

PLUS, I will send everyone who contributes at any level a free eBook and, if we reach our funding goal, I'll enter you in a chance to win your choice of a new Kindle, Nook, iPad, Kobo Reader.

I LOVE audiobooks and listen to them all the time!  I've worked hard to get all the rights for all the books to be turned into audiobooks. I've found a professional narrator and production team. Everything is ready. Now I just need your help! We've put together some very special premium gifts for you as a THANK YOU for helping complete the John Jordan series in audiobook format. I hope you'll look them over and send us your help today.  CHECK OUT ALL THE COOL PERKS OVER TO THE RIGHT OF THE PAGE!  PLUS, I will send everyone who contributes at any level a free eBook and, if we reach our funding goal, I'll enter you in a chance to win your choice of a new Kindle, Nook, iPad, Kobo Reader.

story:
---- English version below ----

Insane en quelques mots

Je m'appelle Lucie et cette campagne de financement participatif a bien failli ne jamais voir le jour. Je sais aujourd'hui que si un média positif et ultra-concret comme Insane avait existé, alors que je me débattais entre les griffes de la dépression, de l'anxiété et des idées suicidaires, le combat aurait été nettement plus facile à gagner, et ma vie infiniment meilleure. Maintenant que je me trouve enfin sur le (long) chemin de la guérison, je constate aussi que j'aurais pu me trouver bien plus avancée sur cette voie aujourd'hui si j'avais su certaines choses, si on m'avait donné certains conseils, et si j'avais eu connaissance de certains produits et services.

Je suis désormais une jeune entrepreneure, avec en poche un Master Sciences Po Droits de l'Homme et Action Humanitaire. Ayant été élevée à la fois dans la culture syrienne et française, la diversité (culturelle comme sociale) me tient à coeur dans la vision que j'ai pour Insane.

Je souhaite simplement que toutes les personnes en difficulté psychologique, ainsi que leurs proches, aient accès à ces informations et conseils qui ont été pour moi si déterminants. Qu'elles aillent mieux. Qu'elles reprennent espoir. Qu'elles sachent enfin quoi faire pour que leur vie vaille à nouveau la peine d'être vécue.

Voilà ce que vous accomplirez en soutenant cette campagne : vous ferez littéralement la différence entre la vie et la mort. Et troubles mentaux ou pas, Insane vous offrira les clés pour une vie quotidienne plus belle, en prenant soin de votre santé mentale. Tout ça, pour un abonnement au tarif que VOUS choisissez ! 

Ce dont Insane a besoin

Pour son lancement, Insane a besoin de 8500€. Cela couvrira : 

  • environ 500€ de frais pour récupérer les fonds gagnés grâce à cette campagne
  • environ 4000€ en contreparties
  • 200€ nécessaires au dépôt de la marque
  • 2 mois de fonctionnement au cas où Insane n'aurait pas assez de fonds au début ou en cas de mois difficile, ce qui couvre : 

- l'assurance professionnelle

- la location du serveur et du nom de domaine

- des Google Ads pour qu'Insane puisse se faire connaître

- les services bancaires

- les charges sociales qui m'incombent en tant que cheffe d'entreprise

- la possibilité de régler votre abonnement par carte de crédit ainsi que par PayPal

- les frais d'entrée à des conférences et salons professionnels, ainsi que les voyages nécessaires pour y assister

- 500€ pour aider à payer mon loyer et la nourriture pour chats (pour référence, le salaire minimum légal en France est de 1200€/mois)

Les fonctionnalités Insane

Sur Insane, vous trouverez :

  • Une carte régulièrement mise à jour géolocalisant des thérapeutes (psychiatres mais aussi psychologues, sophrologues, etc.), avec de nombreuses options de filtre pour trouver facilement le profil qui vous correspondra (genre, spécialisation, tarifs secteur 1 ou 2, LGBTQ-friendly...), qui sera alimentée de façon collaborative
  • Une liste de structures (privées, publiques, associatives...) susceptibles de vous être utiles, également avec un système de filtre précis
  • Un espace abonné·e pour gérer votre abonnement, votre inscription à la newsletter, et pour modifier vos informations de profil
  • Un espace pour commenter les articles et débattre
  • Un système très performant de recherche d'articles par mots-clé
  • Un système de rubriques pour aller directement lire ce qui vous intéresse 
  • Des sommaires en début de certains articles pour une lecture encore plus fructueuse et concentrée
  • Une navigation entre les langues disponibles fluide et facile

Ce que vous gagnez

Les contreparties que vous gagnez avec cette campagne sont carrément cool : choisir des sujets d'articles, des goodies ~de fou~, votre nom et votre histoire affichés sur le site, un certain nombre de mois d'abonnements gratuits... Découvrez tout cela plus en détail dans la section Contreparties !

Si Insane ne parvient pas à réunir la somme mentionnée, vous recevrez tout de même vos contreparties. Mais Insane ne pourra pas se lancer. Vous serez donc abonné-e à Insane pendant le temps qu'il survivra. Mais il faut être réaliste : sans argent, il sera impossible d'embaucher des rédacteurs-trices, ou de financer de la publicité sur Google pour se faire connaître, ce qui signifie un manque à gagner en termes d'abonnements, et donc à terme un média qui ne pourra plus tenir.

Si Insane récolte plus que la somme demandée (ce serait génial !), l'excédent permettra de recruter des rédacteurs-trices freelance pour écrire plus de supers articles, et ira au budget communication/marketing pour que plus de gens puissent découvrir Insane et bénéficier de ses contenus.

Votre impact

Bien sûr, chaque centime de votre contribution compte : cela servira au lancement d'Insane, au maintien de son système d'abonnement à tarif libre afin de ne laisser personne sur le bord de la route, tout en permettant au magazine de faire face aux inévitables moments difficiles que traverse toute entreprise.

Mais votre contribution servira surtout à ceci : parfois, une seule idée, élaborée dans un seul article, suffit à faire pencher la balance dans le bon sens pour quelqu'un qui se trouve en difficulté. Il ne dépend que de vous que cet article puisse être rédigé et disponible sur Insane. Et vous pourriez être ce quelqu'un. Faites-le pour vous, faites-le pour quelqu'un d'autre, ou pour les deux : chaque action compte.

Risques et Challenges

Les challenges sont assez clairs : un abonnement à tarif libre, facile à mettre en pause, signifie une difficulté supplémentaire pour planifier financièrement et s'assurer qu'Insane pourra couvrir les dépenses du mois, avant de parvenir à la fin dudit mois. Pas de publicité d'affichage signifie que la seule autre source de revenus (en-dehors des abonnements) provient d'articles sponsorisés, qui prennent du temps à contractualiser et rédiger. La trésorerie sera donc toujours une source d'inquiétude.

Mais -- vous êtes bien placé-es pour le savoir -- aujourd'hui les gens en ont assez des modèles traditionnels de publication envahis de publicité, et ils ont plutôt envie de soutenir de plus petites initiatives comme celle-ci. Nous espérons aussi récupérer au final plus d'argent grâce à un abonnement à tarif libre au lieu d'un abonnement classique, puisque le lectorat ne se sentira pas prisonnier et s'abonnera donc a priori plus facilement. De cette façon, les abonné-es pourront aussi choisir de donner plus [qu'un tarif fixe] s'ils/elles le veulent et le peuvent. Enfin, il est prévu de rendre public le budget de dépenses du mois ainsi que sa couverture, en temps réel, pour que le lectorat puisse savoir exactement où va son argent et mieux décider du montant de son abonnement.

Pour contribuer autrement

Parmi vous, tout le monde ne pourra pas contribuer financièrement (même si, je le répète, chaque centime compte). Mais il est très important aussi de faire connaître cette campagne ! Parlez de cette initiative à vos proches, vos ami-es, vos collègues, votre famille : sans le savoir, vous avez probablement dans votre entourage quelqu'un en difficulté qui a grand besoin de ce média. La plateforme d'Indiegogo rend le partage très facile sur les réseaux sociaux, donc on poste, on partage, on recommande ! Et puis le bouche-à-oreille classique vaut de l'or... parlez donc d'Insane chaque fois que vous le pouvez !

 

---- English version here ----

Insane in short

My name is Lucie and this crowdfunding campaign almost never happened. When I was battling anxiety, depression and suicidality, a positive and practical media such as Insane would have made my fights infinitely easier to win, and my life incredibly better. Now that I've made it onto the long path to recovery, I also realize that I could have been much further along the way if I had known certain things, been given certain tips, discovered certain products and services. 

Now I'm a 25-year-old female entrepreneur with a Masters' Degree in Human Rights and Humanitarian Action. Raised in both Syrian and French cultures, diversity (cultural as well as social) is close to my heart when envisioning Insane.

I just want other people who are struggling psychologically, and the loved ones who care for them, to have access to all those tips. To get better. To have hope. To actually know what to do to make their daily life worth opening their eyes again.

This is what you'll achieve by participating in this campaign: you'll literally make the difference between life and death for people. And become happier yourself, for a pay-what-you-can subscription!

What Insane Needs

To launch Insane, 8,500€ are necessary. This will cover:

  • around 500€ in fees to receive the funds of this Indiegogo campaign
  • around 4,000€ in perks
  • the 200€ fee for the trademark registration
  • 2 months of functioning in case we don't make enough at first or hit a low later, which entails:

- professional insurance

- computer server, domain name

- Google Ads so that people learn of Insane's existence

- banking services

- social costs for myself as a business owner 

- allowing for subscription payment via both credit card and PayPal

- entrance fee to conferences and fairs, business trips to attend said conferences and fairs

- 500€ to help pay my rent and cat food (for reference, the minimum wage in France is 1,200€/month)

Insane features

On Insane, you'll find:

  • A regularly-updated map to locate therapists (psychiatrists but also psychologists, sophrologists, etc.), with numerous filtering options so that you can easily find the profile best suited to your needs (gender, specialization, price range, LGBTQ-friendly...), which will be collaboratively sustained
  • A list of structures (private, public,NGOs...) that you might find useful, also with a precise filtering system
  • An account system so that you can manage your subscription to Insane and to the newsletter, as well as manage your profile information
  • A comment system on articles so that you can discuss and debate
  • A highly performing article search system based on keywords
  • Sections so that you can directly find and read what you're interested in 
  • Summaries at the beginning of some articles for an even more fruitful and focused reading experience
  • A fluid and easy experience navigating between available languages  

What You Get

What you're getting here is pretty cool: choosing topics for articles, ~insane~ goodies, your name and story featured on the website, a number of subscription months for free... Find out more in the Perks section!

If we don't reach our goal, you will still get your perks and the money collected will still go towards launching Insane, but on a smaller scale and possibly at a later date too: only one means of subscription payment, less content... and a jeopardization of the media since we won't be able to pay much for Google Ads, which in turn will have less people subscribe.

If we (hopefully!) exceed our goal, the money will be divided between recruiting freelance writers for more great content and communication/marketing so that more people get to know Insane and benefit from its content.

The Impact

Of course, every cent you contribute matters since it will allow Insane to launch and then to maintain its pay-what-you-can subscription system, which ensures no one is left behind, while safely facing the inevitable lows of business life. 

Sometimes even one idea, featured in one article, is enough to tip the scale for someone who's struggling: it depends on you that this article be available at all. And you could totally be that person. Do it for yourself, for others, or for both: every action matters. 

Risks & Challenges

The challenges here are pretty obvious: a pay-what-you-can, easy-to-put-on-hold subscription means difficulty planning ahead and difficulty evaluating whether we'll actually cover the month's expenses until said month is done. No display ads means the only other source of revenue we'll have is from sponsored articles, which take a long time to secure and achieve. So treasury will be a constant source of worry.

But people are now fed up with traditional ad-stocked publications and they tend to want to support small initiatives like this one. Also, we hope to actually get more from a pay-what-you-can subscription than from a classic one, since readers won't feel trapped and so may subscribe more easily. This way, they will also be able to give more [than a fixed price] if they can and wish to. Finally, we are planning to make public the month's expenses coverage in real time so that readers can see exactly where their money goes and get a better idea of how much to pay for their subscription.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you won't be able to contribute financially at all (although, again, every cent matters). But spreading the word about this campaign is super important, too! Please share this initiative with your friends, colleagues, family and peers : you never know when someone might be struggling and needing this very media! The platform makes it easy to share on social networks, so go ahead with posting, sharing and recommending! Also, word of actual mouth is golden, so talk about Insane as much as you can.
