story:
Do you want to feel more passion and purpose in your life? Do you desire to deepen your relationships with others and yourself? Do you want to experience a greater sense of fulfillment?

If the answer to these questions is a resounding “YES!” then allow me to let you in a secret...living a life of deep joy and abundance is born out of a SIMPLE practice. It just requires a daily commitment each morning of 5 MINUTES of GRATITUDE. Studies have linked gratitude as a significant factor in improving one’s overall levels of happiness. I am here to help set you on this path of practicing gratitude into what is hopefully a positive, transformative experience that countless other people have already felt through the use of this journal.

 

“Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.”

- Marcus Aurelius

 

A life well lived begins with each day.  How we mentally prepare and set our intentions for the day can impact how we react to the events in our days.  Days become weeks, weeks become months, and months become years so focusing on the tiny blocks of days, can ultimately impact your life..   What is one way to win the day? With a daily practice of gratitude.

A life well-lived does not happen passively by waiting for the external circumstances to change. It happens proactively by choosing to feel happy for what you already have and how you are continuing to grow, as a person. Whether it is a sunny or a rainy day, you can always choose to feel the sun within. However, this perspective takes practice, patience, and self-love! After cultivating my own gratitude practice over the past five years and sharing with hundreds of health coaching clients and friends, I’ve designed a new version of a daily journal to make it as simple as possible for anyone to get started in building this life changing habit.

 

 

Gratitude is a MINDSET. A mindset is one that colors our perspective. We can always choose to be grateful. Even when we experience setbacks, we can choose to be grateful for the opportunities to learn in those moments. Think about the power and freedom you gain when you can be grateful no matter what happens! You take ownership back of the thing that no one can take away from you - your perspective and ultimately your mood.

 

 

And gratitude FEELS AMAZING! It is an opportunity to count our blessings and the gifts that we were born with. It is a mental and emotional reward that makes us smile. It is a deep embodiment of joy and happiness that naturally comes from giving thanks.

But do you know what? Gratitude is more than just a warm fuzzy feeling. Research shows that gratitude and mindfulness bring countless physical health benefits ranging from improved immunity to resilience to longevity. 

In one landmark study completed by UC Davis psychologist Robert Emmons, it was shown that by simply keeping a gratitude journal for three weeks, you can significantly increase well-being: reduce physical pain, ease symptoms of stress, improve your sleep, and your sense of overall life satisfaction. 

 

 

 

A great morning routine is one of the best ways to set you up for success.  Ask Ariana Huffington, RIchard Branson, Sheryl Sandberg, Mark Zuckerberg, Bill Gates - all individuals who are known for attributing much of their success to their morning routines. 

The journal’s design solves the problem that many of us face: overcomplicated or unstructured morning routines that tend to fade as fast as they start. How many times have you started on some journal or program only to leave it after a few days or weeks? By keeping the prompts simple, straightforward, and trackable, we have made it as easy as possible for I Am Grateful (and a gratitude practice) to become a staple in your life.

 

“This journal is for those who seek to enjoy the journey as they create the life of their dreams.”

 

The I Am Grateful journal is an invitation to start each day with powerful, positive intentions. With the clean design, you have the space to complete daily, weekly and monthly exercises to better understand yourself and cultivate positivity across all areas of your life.

These exercises train our brains to look for how we can be thankful for what we have and whatever comes our way. While the daily exercise takes only five minutes, you will feel the benefits of this positive mind-shift over the whole day!

The journal’s content is instrumental in how you choose to prioritize what is truly important. In order to maximize potential inspiration, self-exploration and mindfulness, we have created a program that builds upon itself.

 

Here is the structure of the journal:

Daily: gratitude | affirmations | top priorities | mindful question

Investment per day: 5 minutes

Weekly: reflection questions | intentions for week

Investment per week: 10-15 minutes

Monthly: Self-learning + reflection thought exercises

Investment per month: 20-30 minutes

 

How does this play out in the pages?

The daily prompts start out with asking for just three things you feel grateful for and one positive affirmation. In my experience, keeping it simple significantly increases the chances that your daily entry becomes habitual. This new edition also offers a rotating series of questions that spark curiosity and self exploration.

The weekly pages serve as powerful anchors from which the daily entries unfold. In just one page, you get to reflect on topics including how you are choosing to spend your time and if you are taking actions that are aligned with your mission. Previous journalers have stated they have found the weekly page to be a fantastic accountability tool!

The monthly deep dives especially present the opportunity to ask yourself potentially life changing questions like: What are my core values? What is my mission statement? What do I envision my life to look like in five years time? These are high leverage exercises that may not come up otherwise in daily life but have a lasting impact on how you choose to live.

 

 

Think of your gratitude journal as a way to help increase productivity, health, and happiness. If you want to strengthen your arm muscles, you can head to the gym and lift weights. In order to strengthen your muscles for gratitude, you also need to work them out! Think of the I Am Grateful Journal is your personal gratitude trainer!

 

 

“Writing daily in the I am Grateful Journal has become one of my most grounding habits.  It helps me practice gratitude (which I think contributes to my overall happiness) and set my agenda for the upcoming day / week/ month in terms of the things in which I want to achieve.  The amount of reflection the journal facilitates has been instrumental in going after the things that are important to me and helping me achieve those things.  Thanks Lizzy for creating such a helpful tool that has facilitated an overarching positive mind shift!” - Jason, New York, USA

 

“I started the gratitude journal this year in February and was amazed by the impact. Of course I had the feeling being thankful for the small little things in life before already but actively writing them down on a daily basis makes the difference. Besides the motivational quotes as well as challenges and reflective incentives provided by Lizzy in this book make you unfold a much more positive mindset. Now I’m already on the 2nd journal and am grateful for this experience and new habit.” - Laura Louise, Germany

 

"I never thought I would make the time to practice gratitude / journal everyday, but I Am Grateful makes it easy and rewarding to take a moment that totally sets the tone for the rest of the day. I love the prompt to reflect on my own mentality every morning, the daily quotes or challenges, and that it forces me to better structure my week in addition to just triggering gratitude / self-love" – Camden, Shanghai, China

 

“I started using Elizabeth Schieffelin’s Gratitude Journal about 4 months ago and have enjoyed every minute of it.  The beauty of this journal is it’s simplicity.  It is easy to fit into a busy lifestyle but still be impactful.  While I expected this purchase to be only a gratitude practice, I have found it to be so much more beneficial.  It allows me to quickly prioritize action items that are actually important to my goals without being a slave to a never ending list of “to-dos”, as well as remind myself to take time for me.  I start my day grateful, grounded and energized.” – Paige, Michigan, USA

 

“Gratitude seems a small thing in life and we thought by saying thank you that we are expressing gratitude. However, true gratitude exceeds those formalities and brings fulfillment in our life. By writing this notebook nearly every morning (using 5-10mins), I gradually develop a positive attitude towards my life. I am genuinely happierand appreciate my life more. And also, I become more self-aware and more resilient.” – Sophie, Shanghai, China

 

 

It was early 2016 and I had already been living in the exciting and beautiful city Shanghai, China for three years. The days seemed to fly by as I worked 24/7 to build a healthy smoothie startup, while growing my health coaching practice and trying to juggle what felt like a million other commitments!

I spent most of my time in full-on “warrior mode”, constantly fixated on problems to be solved or daydreaming about the future. My friends endearingly called me, “busy Lizzy”. I euphemistically considered busyness to be ‘good stress’ but I started to feel physically and emotionally drained. It got to the point where I was diagnosed with adrenal fatigue verging on burnout.

Thankfully, one day a friend (now, my fiance!) gifted me a gratitude journal. The format of the journal was simple – it provided me with a daily reminder to pause, breathe, and reflect on what I was grateful for. It was an invitation to be present. The 5-minute practice each morning started as a relief, a breath of fresh air before seizing the day. But in the months that followed, I noticed a powerful shift. The gratitude I felt expanded beyond those 5-minutes, it reframed my entire worldview into one of abundance, joy, lightness and appreciation.

Over time, I felt like an entirely different person. The shift was so fundamental that I knew I had to share this gratitude practice with my health coaching clients and friends.

So, I went all-in on gratitude. For over two years, I experimented with different modalities - blank notebooks, notes in a phone, and voice recordings.  I tried out other gratitude and mindfulness journals or digital templates. I even encouraged friends and family to join me in this journey! Throughout these two years, I observed and took notes of what worked and what did not.  Finally, one day in 2018, I made the decision to create my own gratitude journal!

I knew that I wanted to create a one-of-a kind journal. One that encouraged both gratitude and accountability. One that inspired both goal-setting and self-reflection. And one that combined philosophy and practicality. Camped out in my favorite coffee shop for numerous long afternoons, I sketched out the format for I Am Grateful. I drew upon my favorite works like Seven Habits of Highly Effective People by Stephen Covey, The Four Agreements by Don Miguel Ruiz, The Power of Habit by Charles Duhigg and more. I also incorporated elements inspired by some of the trainings I had attended including Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction (MBSR), Yin Yoga Teacher Training, and Holistic Meditation Teacher Training. For the journal’s monthly deep dive exercises, I collected content from discovery exercises I had given to my health coaching clients and prompts that I received from my own life coaches over the years.

When I launched edition #1 of I Am Grateful, I made it available wherever I could: my zenergy meditation + yoga studio, my Lizzy’s All Natural healthy smoothie cafes, holiday markets, international schools, and local shops. I hosted a number of gratitude workshops in Shanghai and led 30 day virtual challenges to introduce I am Grateful to a bigger community.

The feedback was overwhelmingly positive and impact was wide reaching! Journalers shared comments like:

As you can imagine, all of this inspired me to spread the impact to more people! I sent copies to several boutique bookstores in the US for resale and shared directly to interested clients on Instagram. Within months, I Am Grateful journalers spanned the globe.

This year, when COVID hit, and the world seemed to turn totally upside down, I was reminded of just how powerful taking a perspective of gratitude really could be. One day during quarantine, I found myself flipping through my old journals. The entries were like a rainy day fund of joy! The journals were also like time capsules, holding memories and milestones of life’s chapters. It was such a beautiful reminder of all of the good in life, and that gratitude can be a super antidote to emotions like fear, anger and uncertainty. Other people seemed to share a similar sentiment as all of the I Am Grateful journals had sold out. So with that, I decided to create a meaningfully updated version of I Am Grateful.

This spring, I sought out current journalers (some were already using their third copy!) and asked them questions about what they wanted to change, keep, or add.

The feedback was very clear and pretty consistent overall. Most journalers loved the simple gratitude structure, the inspiring quotes, the monthly deep dives, and the hardcover 6-month journal design. They also asked for more variety in the daily mindfulness questions, less focus on time management, more deep dive reflection prompts and a new format for weekly check-ins.

After having incorporated feedback from existing I am Grateful journalers and modifications I thought would strengthen a gratitude practice, I am now at the printing stage of edition #2 and am beyond thrilled to be able to bring the new and improved version to life. My gratitude journaling practice has totally changed my life for the better and transformed the way I see the world. My hope is that you too will have the chance to experience the incredible benefits now and for the long-term!

With love and gratitude,

                            Elizabeth 

 

 

I Am Grateful Journal ($30 value)

The I Am Grateful Journal is a hardcover gratitude journal. It contains six months worth of daily, weekly and monthly prompts.

Growing with Gratitude Workshop ($39 value)

So you’ve got your journal, now what? Do you wish to go deeper on understanding the science behind gratitude and all of the benefits it has to offer to you? Are you curious about how your 5 minute morning journaling can most seamlessly expand to impact all parts of your day and life? Get started on your gratitude practice with extra support and accountability by participating in this workshop that goes deep into the practice of gratitude. Learn from others in the community through a powerful live exercise and experience a heart opening meditation practice. Join the one-hour webinar live and gain lifetime access to the recording.

*Live workshops offered in January and March

Creating Magic Morning Rituals Workshop ($39 value)

Have you struggled to maintain a morning routine? Do you find yourself frustrated at how tired you feel when you wake up (no matter how often you hit the snooze button)? In this workshop, we will dive into the principles of creating lasting habits. You will learn hacks for seamlessly turning your journaling into a habit and building this into a greater morning ritual. Participate in an interactive iteration session where you will design your magic morning and set yourself up for success with pro tips on how to establish and maintain the rituals that will best serve you. You will also have the opportunity to ask any questions you have and hear about tried-and-true techniques from long-time gratitude practitioners. Join the one-hour webinar live and gain lifetime access to the recording.

*Live workshops offered in February and April

Lizzy’s Smoothie Kitchen E-Book ($22 value)

Take home this long sought after healthy smoothie e-book created by Elizabeth containing 50+ of her tried-and-loved secret recipes from the Lizzy’s All Natural menu. After seven years in the kitchen and the creation of hundreds of healthy recipes, Elizabeth is giving you behind-the-scenes access to her best selling drinks and treats. Learn pro tips to make the most delicious healthy foods with ease and enjoyment, and how you can create your own unique smoothie recipes too!

Clarity Retreat ($88 value)

2020 dates: 12/12-12/13 | 2021 dates: 6/12-6/13

Join us for a two-day virtual retreat focused on your higher alignment and deep reflection. Hosted by Elizabeth at the middle and end of the calendar year, this experience provides an opportunity to look at how far you’ve come and to get clear on where you’re going. Are you living in alignment with your values? Are you making choices around how you spend your time based on your goals and intentions? What internal or external blocks are you experiencing? Together, we will work with your unique values, the twelve key areas of health, future visioning and tools to support you on your journey of becoming your best self.

Sound Bath Meditation Session ($180 value for 2 guests / $380 for 20 guests)

In this one hour immersive virtual meditation experience, lay back and relax as you experience the soul soothing sounds of crystal alchemy singing bowls. Crystal alchemy singing bowls are made with pure quartz crystal and infused with precious gemstones, minerals and earth metals to clear your etheric body and bring about deep healing. The meditation will include a customized selection of alchemies based on your intentions and guided loving-kindness meditation. 

Coaching Session with Elizabeth ($280 value) 

As your coach, I create a customized and holistic program for healthier and happier living through one-on-one intensive work. Transformations are goal-orientated and involve a holistic approach to wellness including growth in the areas of food, physical activity, mindfulness, sleep, stress management, relationships, career, spirituality, home environment and more.

Based on your unique needs and goals, I am here to support you and to share new concepts, frameworks and theories for making positive shifts in a digestible and accessible way. My approach is to take it step by step, one day at a time. My intention is for you to live your best life well beyond our coaching sessions, by eating well, having fun and living mindfully. No matter where you’re coming from, there is a positive path forward. 

 

Journal Rewards

BOGO – BUY ONE GIFT ONE - $54

LET’S COME TOGETHER - $1000

+ 3 gifted private coaching sessions with Elizabeth ($840 value)

+ 1 ticket to Growing with Gratitude Workshop ($39 value)

 

 

Hi! My name is Elizabeth and I’m the founder of By Lizzy, a healthy lifestyle company whose mission is to support physical healing and positive mindshift shifts through practices of health, happiness and self-expression. I’ve been a Holistic Health Coach for the past seven years. I also teach Yin Yoga, offer meditation and sound healing sessions, and practice Reiki energy work. I am deeply passionate about women’s health and empowerment ! Although Shanghai was my home base for the past seven years, I love to travel and lead wellness retreats around the world. You can find me writing, recording videos and sharing what I learn and experience with others through my wechat blog, Instagram @bylizzy_ and website. I am the proud new mom of Lila Grace and can't wait to give her her first gratitude journal one day!

 

 

 

Funds raised from this campaign will go directly to financing the production and launch of I Am Grateful in the US market. Specifically, funding will support:

- Proofing and printing the journals

- Shipping

- Giving away copies to anyone who seeks to build a gratitude practice but is unable to afford the cost of a journal (apply via www.lifebylizzy.com)

The first 1,000 journals ordered are set to arrive in the US for fulfillment in December 2020. If everything is on schedule, journals should be shipped out in time for holiday gifting! In the event that production gets delayed (see risks + challenges below), I will update backers ASAP.

Additional journals will be printed and sent out by February 2021.

 

 

You may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  •  Please share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #IAmGratefulJournal and tag me so I can help amplify your kind efforts.

 

Share Now!
 

 

I would like to express my deepest thanks to all who have made this journal and campaign possible! Especially, thank you to: 

 

Daphne + Jupiter, for your video shooting! 

*Learn about their video shooting/production services by contacting: yu1737@gmail.com 

Sophia, for your inspiring I Am Grateful journal design, campaign graphic design and video editing! 

*Learn about her graphic design services by following on IG: @sophia.sze

 

Warren, for your coaching, editing, project management teachings, inspiration and encouragement along this journey.

Jason, for your longtime use and championing of I Am Grateful.

Camden, Louisa and Izo, for your awesome video testimonials.

Molly, for making the journal's printing happen. 

Tara, for your brilliant proofing eye and unwavering support.

And to everyone who contributed feedback that made edition #2 possible!

 

 

Two of the big challenges with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer in a timely manner and in the best condition.

To address the quality, I am working with my printer to ensure that the journals are hand checked for quality before they are sent out. Also, the journals will be wrapped in protective casing to limit any damage during the shipment.

For timing, my intention is to have the journals in the mail in time for the holidays! The delivery of pre-sale copies in a timely manner is based on a) production time of the printing company and b) shipping time and customs clearance. I will be working closely with my printer to make sure that they stay true to a 20 day lead time. This is my second time working with this printing company (the first being edition #1 of I Am Grateful) and I’ve had a fantastic experience working with the team already. I’ve also negotiated with the shipping company to ensure that the journals will be sent within 3 weeks of the print date.

I commit to keeping you updated as the journal hits each key milestone and publishing is complete so you know when your journals are expected to be sent out!
story_txt: Do you want to feel more passion and purpose in your life? Do you desire to deepen your relationships with others and yourself? Do you want to experience a greater sense of fulfillment?If the answer to these questions is a resounding “YES!” then allow me to let you in a secret...living a life of deep joy and abundance is born out of a SIMPLE practice. It just requires a daily commitment each morning of 5 MINUTES of GRATITUDE. Studies have linked gratitude as a significant factor in improving one’s overall levels of happiness. I am here to help set you on this path of practicing gratitude into what is hopefully a positive, transformative experience that countless other people have already felt through the use of this journal. “Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.”- Marcus Aurelius A life well lived begins with each day.  How we mentally prepare and set our intentions for the day can impact how we react to the events in our days.  Days become weeks, weeks become months, and months become years so focusing on the tiny blocks of days, can ultimately impact your life..   What is one way to win the day? With a daily practice of gratitude.A life well-lived does not happen passively by waiting for the external circumstances to change. It happens proactively by choosing to feel happy for what you already have and how you are continuing to grow, as a person. Whether it is a sunny or a rainy day, you can always choose to feel the sun within. However, this perspective takes practice, patience, and self-love! After cultivating my own gratitude practice over the past five years and sharing with hundreds of health coaching clients and friends, I’ve designed a new version of a daily journal to make it as simple as possible for anyone to get started in building this life changing habit.  Gratitude is a MINDSET. A mindset is one that colors our perspective. We can always choose to be grateful. Even when we experience setbacks, we can choose to be grateful for the opportunities to learn in those moments. Think about the power and freedom you gain when you can be grateful no matter what happens! You take ownership back of the thing that no one can take away from you - your perspective and ultimately your mood.  And gratitude FEELS AMAZING! It is an opportunity to count our blessings and the gifts that we were born with. It is a mental and emotional reward that makes us smile. It is a deep embodiment of joy and happiness that naturally comes from giving thanks.But do you know what? Gratitude is more than just a warm fuzzy feeling. Research shows that gratitude and mindfulness bring countless physical health benefits ranging from improved immunity to resilience to longevity. In one landmark study completed by UC Davis psychologist Robert Emmons, it was shown that by simply keeping a gratitude journal for three weeks, you can significantly increase well-being: reduce physical pain, ease symptoms of stress, improve your sleep, and your sense of overall life satisfaction.    A great morning routine is one of the best ways to set you up for success.  Ask Ariana Huffington, RIchard Branson, Sheryl Sandberg, Mark Zuckerberg, Bill Gates - all individuals who are known for attributing much of their success to their morning routines. The journal’s design solves the problem that many of us face: overcomplicated or unstructured morning routines that tend to fade as fast as they start. How many times have you started on some journal or program only to leave it after a few days or weeks? By keeping the prompts simple, straightforward, and trackable, we have made it as easy as possible for I Am Grateful (and a gratitude practice) to become a staple in your life. “This journal is for those who seek to enjoy the journey as they create the life of their dreams.” The I Am Grateful journal is an invitation to start each day with powerful, positive intentions. With the clean design, you have the space to complete daily, weekly and monthly exercises to better understand yourself and cultivate positivity across all areas of your life.These exercises train our brains to look for how we can be thankful for what we have and whatever comes our way. While the daily exercise takes only five minutes, you will feel the benefits of this positive mind-shift over the whole day!The journal’s content is instrumental in how you choose to prioritize what is truly important. In order to maximize potential inspiration, self-exploration and mindfulness, we have created a program that builds upon itself. Here is the structure of the journal:Daily: gratitude | affirmations | top priorities | mindful questionInvestment per day: 5 minutesWeekly: reflection questions | intentions for weekInvestment per week: 10-15 minutesMonthly: Self-learning + reflection thought exercisesInvestment per month: 20-30 minutes How does this play out in the pages?The daily prompts start out with asking for just three things you feel grateful for and one positive affirmation. In my experience, keeping it simple significantly increases the chances that your daily entry becomes habitual. This new edition also offers a rotating series of questions that spark curiosity and self exploration.The weekly pages serve as powerful anchors from which the daily entries unfold. In just one page, you get to reflect on topics including how you are choosing to spend your time and if you are taking actions that are aligned with your mission. Previous journalers have stated they have found the weekly page to be a fantastic accountability tool!The monthly deep dives especially present the opportunity to ask yourself potentially life changing questions like: What are my core values? What is my mission statement? What do I envision my life to look like in five years time? These are high leverage exercises that may not come up otherwise in daily life but have a lasting impact on how you choose to live.  Think of your gratitude journal as a way to help increase productivity, health, and happiness. If you want to strengthen your arm muscles, you can head to the gym and lift weights. In order to strengthen your muscles for gratitude, you also need to work them out! Think of the I Am Grateful Journal is your personal gratitude trainer!  “Writing daily in the I am Grateful Journal has become one of my most grounding habits.  It helps me practice gratitude (which I think contributes to my overall happiness) and set my agenda for the upcoming day / week/ month in terms of the things in which I want to achieve.  The amount of reflection the journal facilitates has been instrumental in going after the things that are important to me and helping me achieve those things.  Thanks Lizzy for creating such a helpful tool that has facilitated an overarching positive mind shift!” - Jason, New York, USA “I started the gratitude journal this year in February and was amazed by the impact. Of course I had the feeling being thankful for the small little things in life before already but actively writing them down on a daily basis makes the difference. Besides the motivational quotes as well as challenges and reflective incentives provided by Lizzy in this book make you unfold a much more positive mindset. You will also have the opportunity to ask any questions you have and hear about tried-and-true techniques from long-time gratitude practitioners. Join the one-hour webinar live and gain lifetime access to the recording.*Live workshops offered in February and AprilLizzy’s Smoothie Kitchen E-Book ($22 value)Take home this long sought after healthy smoothie e-book created by Elizabeth containing 50+ of her tried-and-loved secret recipes from the Lizzy’s All Natural menu. After seven years in the kitchen and the creation of hundreds of healthy recipes, Elizabeth is giving you behind-the-scenes access to her best selling drinks and treats. Learn pro tips to make the most delicious healthy foods with ease and enjoyment, and how you can create your own unique smoothie recipes too!Clarity Retreat ($88 value)2020 dates: 12/12-12/13 | 2021 dates: 6/12-6/13Join us for a two-day virtual retreat focused on your higher alignment and deep reflection. Hosted by Elizabeth at the middle and end of the calendar year, this experience provides an opportunity to look at how far you’ve come and to get clear on where you’re going. Are you living in alignment with your values? Are you making choices around how you spend your time based on your goals and intentions? What internal or external blocks are you experiencing? Together, we will work with your unique values, the twelve key areas of health, future visioning and tools to support you on your journey of becoming your best self.Sound Bath Meditation Session ($180 value for 2 guests / $380 for 20 guests)In this one hour immersive virtual meditation experience, lay back and relax as you experience the soul soothing sounds of crystal alchemy singing bowls. Crystal alchemy singing bowls are made with pure quartz crystal and infused with precious gemstones, minerals and earth metals to clear your etheric body and bring about deep healing. The meditation will include a customized selection of alchemies based on your intentions and guided loving-kindness meditation. Coaching Session with Elizabeth ($280 value) As your coach, I create a customized and holistic program for healthier and happier living through one-on-one intensive work. Transformations are goal-orientated and involve a holistic approach to wellness including growth in the areas of food, physical activity, mindfulness, sleep, stress management, relationships, career, spirituality, home environment and more.Based on your unique needs and goals, I am here to support you and to share new concepts, frameworks and theories for making positive shifts in a digestible and accessible way. My approach is to take it step by step, one day at a time. My intention is for you to live your best life well beyond our coaching sessions, by eating well, having fun and living mindfully. No matter where you’re coming from, there is a positive path forward.  Journal RewardsEARLY BACKER - ONE GRATITUDE JOURNAL - $241x I Am Grateful Journal ($30 value)+ 1 ticket to Growing with Gratitude Workshop ($39 value)+ 1 ticket to Creating Magic Morning Rituals Workshop ($39 value)Available for first 50 backers ONE FOR ME - $281x I Am Grateful Journal ($30 value) NOURISH THE MIND AND BODY - $421x I Am Grateful Journal ($30 value)1x Lizzy’s Smoothie Kitchen E-Book ($22 value)+ 1 ticket to Creating Magic Morning Rituals Workshop ($39 value) BOGO – BUY ONE GIFT ONE - $542x I Am Grateful Journals ($60 value)+ 2 tickets to Growing with Gratitude Workshop ($78 value)+ 2 tickets to Creating Magic Morning Rituals Workshop ($78 value) SIX FOR WE - $1506x I Am Grateful Journals ($180 value)+ US & China FREE standard shipping+ 1 ticket to Growing with Gratitude Workshop ($39 value) THE LUCKY DOZEN - $28812x I Am Grateful Journals ($360 value)+ US & China FREE standard shipping+ 1 gifted private coaching session with Elizabeth ($280 value) IT TAKES A VILLAGE - $48020x I Am Grateful Journals ($600 value)+ US & China FREE standard shipping+ 1 gifted private coaching session with Elizabeth ($280 value) Experiences + Journal RewardsGET CLEAR - $661 pass to Clarity Retreat ($88 value)+ 1x I Am Grateful Journal ($30 value)+ 1 ticket to Creating Magic Morning Rituals Workshop ($39 value) GOOD VIBRATIONS - $1851 meditation session and energy healing with crystal alchemy singing bowls by Elizabeth for you and a friend ($180 value)+ 2x I Am Grateful Journals ($60 value)+ 1 ticket to Growing with Gratitude Workshop ($39 value) LET’S COME TOGETHER - $100020x I Am Grateful Journals ($600 value)+ US & China FREE standard shipping+ 1 Virtual meditation session and energy healing with crystal alchemy singing bowls by Elizabeth for you + up to 20 friends ($380 value)+ 3 gifted private coaching sessions with Elizabeth ($840 value)+ 1 ticket to Growing with Gratitude Workshop ($39 value)  Hi! My name is Elizabeth and I’m the founder of By Lizzy, a healthy lifestyle company whose mission is to support physical healing and positive mindshift shifts through practices of health, happiness and self-expression. I’ve been a Holistic Health Coach for the past seven years. I also teach Yin Yoga, offer meditation and sound healing sessions, and practice Reiki energy work. I am deeply passionate about women’s health and empowerment ! Although Shanghai was my home base for the past seven years, I love to travel and lead wellness retreats around the world. You can find me writing, recording videos and sharing what I learn and experience with others through my wechat blog, Instagram @bylizzy_ and website. I am the proud new mom of Lila Grace and can't wait to give her her first gratitude journal one day!   Funds raised from this campaign will go directly to financing the production and launch of I Am Grateful in the US market. Specifically, funding will support:- Proofing and printing the journals- Shipping- Giving away copies to anyone who seeks to build a gratitude practice but is unable to afford the cost of a journal (apply via www.lifebylizzy.com)The first 1,000 journals ordered are set to arrive in the US for fulfillment in December 2020. If everything is on schedule, journals should be shipped out in time for holiday gifting! In the event that production gets delayed (see risks + challenges below), I will update backers ASAP.Additional journals will be printed and sent out by February 2021.  You may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help: Please share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #IAmGratefulJournal and tag me so I can help amplify your kind efforts. Share Now!  I would like to express my deepest thanks to all who have made this journal and campaign possible! Especially, thank you to:  Daphne + Jupiter, for your video shooting! *Learn about their video shooting/production services by contacting: yu1737@gmail.com Sophia, for your inspiring I Am Grateful journal design, campaign graphic design and video editing! *Learn about her graphic design services by following on IG: @sophia.sze Warren, for your coaching, editing, project management teachings, inspiration and encouragement along this journey.Jason, for your longtime use and championing of I Am Grateful.Camden, Louisa and Izo, for your awesome video testimonials.Molly, for making the journal's printing happen. Tara, for your brilliant proofing eye and unwavering support.And to everyone who contributed feedback that made edition #2 possible!  Two of the big challenges with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer in a timely manner and in the best condition.To address the quality, I am working with my printer to ensure that the journals are hand checked for quality before they are sent out. Also, the journals will be wrapped in protective casing to limit any damage during the shipment.For timing, my intention is to have the journals in the mail in time for the holidays! The delivery of pre-sale copies in a timely manner is based on a) production time of the printing company and b) shipping time and customs clearance. I will be working closely with my printer to make sure that they stay true to a 20 day lead time. This is my second time working with this printing company (the first being edition #1 of I Am Grateful) and I’ve had a fantastic experience working with the team already. I’ve also negotiated with the shipping company to ensure that the journals will be sent within 3 weeks of the print date.I commit to keeping you updated as the journal hits each key milestone and publishing is complete so you know when your journals are expected to be sent out!

story:
Why we need help

Private Motor Club is an independent publisher reliant on advertising revenue and sales to cover the cost of production. Our most recent issue has just gone to print but 90% of advertising revenue generated was wiped out overnight. Content generation, contributors, photographers, design and print is costly and we rely heavily on our advertising income to keep our business running. Sales are up for the upcoming issue but we need to find new initiatives to survive the challenges we are experiencing and keep paying our contributors.

We don't have investors or qualify for any government support;  in an already challenging industry we have very little flexibility to cope in a unprecedented situation like the current coronavirus pandemic.

Why now?

The next issue is due to go to print in June; this means we need to be assigning writers and photographers for features right now. These people are pivotal to PMC, and we want to do our best to support others in the industry. We have planned the next issue with a 'creative' theme which fortunately is not reliant on events that have been cancelled. The issue will be focusing on some of the characters who make the automotive world so interesting.

To allow us to weather this storm, and prepare the next issue we need your support. But we have some perks to make it worthwhile...

What you get

We have used our creativity and available resources to offer a range of gifts to say thank you. These include: PMC stickers, Issue 2 Vol. 2, T-shirts, Peter Hutton greetings cards and illustrations, PMC cover and photographic prints. We will also be offering up our own office copies of PMC Issue 1 and the 2019 Annual. The last two copies!

 

Other ways you can help

If you are unable support us right, we understand, these are tough times for everyone – all we ask is for you to share this campaign with family, friends, colleagues,  anyone who may be interested.

Thank you for reading, it means a lot.

Thank you for reading, it means a lot.

story:
The Book: Fred

Fred is the debut book from the Radical Queer Dinner Party press. It's the memoir of a non-binary queer woman growing up in a liberal but extremely heteronormative world.

The book is a collection of essays that string together the story of coming to terms with a queer identity, fighting through the socially informed voices in our head, and finally facing the darker of our demons to realize that all anybody wants is acceptance.

While there are many queer stories out there, I don't believe there are enough. When will there be enough? Never probably, but next best guess is when you can find a title for any queer person and say, "you. you need this book." 

We cannot assume that one, two, three, five hundred narratives can possibly illuminate the vast array of queer experiences. Honestly I'd make the argument that it's your political duty to buy this book. 

Yes, I am trying to sell you a product using whatever rhetorical means I possibly can, but I'm a nice guy and I'm not good at self-promotion so please consider buying my book!

The Press: Radical Queer Dinner Party

My goal with this book is to introduce a new press. Through some combination of online publication, quarterly printed zines, writing grants, and paid opportunities to publish, I'm hoping to make a writing career more accessible to marginalized writers and radical thinkers.

I use the word queer much more broadly (and yet at the same time more specifically) than it is used to describe a gender identity or sexuality. This mission of the press, and the writing it hopes to support, is to analyze our society with a decolonial and anti-racist lens. Writing for RQDP will question damaging social norms, empower writers and readers who challenge socially accepted ways of thinking, and highlight stories that often get overlooked.  

RQDP is an outlet for radical thinking, and a place of genuine learning. The goal of our writing is to help readers reframe how we see the world so that we may begin poking holes in the myths to which we've bound ourselves.

I know this sounds vague, but to me it feels specific. To some degree, buying into this campaign is buying into me, Annie, as editor-in-chief.  

I've been studying the reproduction of cultural myths for at least six years. I've taught lectures on the importance of reading, sharing, understanding, and amplifying marginalized stories. You can visit my website (annsplain[dot]com) to find a syllabus and reading list about debunking and challenging mainstream narratives.

Sales and Funding Goals

I'm looking to raise 5,000 dollars during this campaign (that's about 300 books). Obviously the more books bought the better and I simply refuse to turn your cash away (that's my promise to you!).

Any money collected will be allocated first to the complete printing of Fred. That means hiring a copy-editor to read the manuscript and fix any errors that I might have made (I agree, it seems rather unlikely). It also means hiring a designer to finalize the book visuals. If possible, I'd like to outsource some assistance in organizing the final manuscript for pre-printing.

Once fixed costs for my first print batch have been covered, then any profit earned on books sold thereafter will go into building the press itself. 

A press requires some capital investment (tech costs, incorporation costs, etc), but for the most part money spent on the press would simply expand the reach and operations of the project. 

The financial strategy behind building this press is to set manageable self-sustaining goals. For instance, beginning a Medium publication online that is well-run, well-curated, and well-publicized will generate income to sustain itself. This introduces a milestone of paying writers for their work.

The next effort would involve expanding the reach of the magazine and press, as well as the opportunities that we can provide. While initially focusing on building content as a set of essays curated through Medium allows for a focus on writing, I would like to one day introduce a color printed magazine that can highlight mixed media from artists that reimagine the status quo. Provided that I can pay artists for their work.

I'll be the first to admit that I don't have a strategy for BIG business. But I do have a strategy for small business. Which is to build a strong community first and expand organically into a sustainable project.

Risks & Challenges

The greatest challenge to starting a press is maintaining longevity. That being said, even if this project only lasts a couple of years, I think it can still provide a cultural artifact that's of great value to an audience of young radicals.

story:
KAMPUNG is a collaborative platform where creators of different backgrounds intersect, explore and express a community's identity. The output of every collaboration is a community publication. In every edition, we explore a different theme and archive the narrative through a dialogue-driven and socially engaged process. 

After the warm reception we received for our first two editions, Kampung will be collaborating with Jurong-based social service agency, Loving Hearts Multi-service Centre, to create two intergenerational projects. 

Issue 3: Coming of Age 

The topic of aging is commonly associated with the elderly but rarely drawn in comparison to the process of growing up. We would like to extend the conversation of aging to youths, and facilitate an intergenerational dialogue on aging and imagining an age-friendly society.  

Kampung Jurong Issue 3 is a guide to aging that showcases the reflections of five pairings of youth and elderly as they explore thematic questions on aging and growing up. Each youth X elderly pair will discuss the following questions: 

- How do you know you have grown old/grown-up? 
- How was your experience growing old? 
- How has the community supported you? 

We will then invite the five pairs to articulate their reflections through a form of their interests, ranging from photo essays to sketches, to interviews. The publication will be divided into two parts- the first half features the articles/works by the youths, while the other half features the elderly's perspectives in elderly-friendly text. All the works will be synthesised into a guide to aging, printed in the middle section of the publication.

This publication will be distributed across different institutions in the elderly care sector. 

 

Issue 4: Lost and Found

Heritage is often recounted on a grand scale. However, much of our identity comprises of smaller everyday objects that elude our collective memory and archive. 

Issue 4 is an ode to the heritage behind ordinary preloved objects and traces its renewed lives with new owners. We will hold an open call to invite individuals to share preloved items that they would like to give away to someone with knowledge of its history. Interested contributors will pick an item of their interest and meet the owners. They will then inherit a selected item respectively and explore its renewed life from their point of view to interrogate how we ascribe meaning and value to the material. 

This publication will be distributed across different community institutions in Jurong. 

 

We will launch the two Issues tentatively in late February 2021. The launch event will be held at Loving Heart Multi-service centre, with an activity designed and curated based on the narrative of the two issues. 

 

Who We Are 

Pok Yue Weng

Pok Yue Weng by day filmmaker and other times amateur publisher. He is fond of hoarding printed matter and the tactile feel of flipping pages. 

Yuqi Ong

Yuqi Ong writes and teaches. She enjoys any project that has an intersection 
between art and community engagement.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Kampung is a non-profit project that we run on top of our full-time jobs. In order for it to be sustainable, we require funding for the print and logistics of the project. Our print run is 500 copies for each issue. Many of you may ask about the viability of having an online presence versus an actual physical zine. We believe that physical copies of the publication can engage and activate readers with more immediacy, especially in consideration of the wide range of demographics in a community. However, we will be exploring digital copies as well to further the distribution across different platforms.

Your support of funding will go into cost of design and printing, events and workshop for our participants, professional editing, as well as other collaterals.

 

The Impact

As a simultaneous act of finding and making of identity, KAMPUNG serves as space for contributors to have an internal excavation of their ideas and voices, and an external excavation of stories in the community. We hope that the publication could evoke in readers a deeper consciousness about the idea of community and invite them to re-look at ordinary spaces with a greater sense of wonder. 

For these two issues, our aim is to increase the accessibility of our platform for the elderly in Jurong in order to integrate their voices and bridge the intergenerational gap in engaging purposeful dialogue. Beyond the quantifiable, we hope to cement these small acts of meaning-making and imaginative exercises in our neighbourhood culture. 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have backed the project and are looking for other ways to support us (or you can't back us right now), we would like to invite you to: 

1. Support us on our social media platforms and share our project: 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kampungmakers/  

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kampungmakers/

Website: https://aboldkampung.wixsite.com/kampung

2. Join our project or our future editions as a contributor. As an interdisciplinary platform, we welcome people of different backgrounds and talents beyond writing. Alternatively, you could refer friends who you think might be interested in sharing his or her skillsets. 

3. Distribute our print publication at your event or place.  

4. Become a platform partner and explore potential collaborations with your community. 

 

Thank you so much for your support!

If you have backed the project and are looking for other ways to support us (or you can't back us right now), we would like to invite you to: 1. Support us on our social media platforms and share our project: Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kampungmakers/  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kampungmakers/Website: https://aboldkampung.wixsite.com/kampung2. Join our project or our future editions as a contributor. As an interdisciplinary platform, we welcome people of different backgrounds and talents beyond writing. Alternatively, you could refer friends who you think might be interested in sharing his or her skillsets. 3. Distribute our print publication at your event or place.  4. Become a platform partner and explore potential collaborations with your community.  Thank you so much for your support!

story:
Quick Summary

First things first: Yes, we did it! We have just funded our KICKSTARTER campaign successfully and are in the process of sending our magazine to print! Now we are offering everybody a chance to preorder this extraordinary collector's issue through our new INDIEGOGO INDEMAND campaign!

About Us

We are an independent publishing house, based in Vienna, Austria, specialising in high quality collector's issues devoted to rock's biggest acts: Since 2009, we have published German language "Rock Classics" issues (independent journalistic projects) dedicated to the likes of AC/DC, LED ZEPPELIN, PINK FLOYD, METALLICA, GUNS N' ROSES, KISS and QUEEN (and many more...). Following the success of our or first crowdfunding campaign (the QUEEN special issue), this IRON MAIDEN collector’s issue will be our second English language version to be made available to fans worldwide and is fully updated and expanded to include additional original features, adding plenty of extra value. With the world still suffering the effects of COVID-19, what could be better than a bit of distraction and joy for music fans worldwide, and what better subject to lighten the mood, ease the mind, and enjoy the moment than IRON MAIDEN? Aside from this, you would be supporting independent music journalism and magazine publishing at a critical time for the industry.

A Brief Overview Of Content 

The IRON MAIDEN Special Collector’s Edition celebrates the 40th anniversary of the release of IRON MAIDEN’s debut album and features the full history of the band as told through its studio album discography, including analysis, the source material behind the songs, and little-known facts. It also includes sections devoted to IRON MAIDEN films, literature, and memorabilia, as well as special features including BRUCE DICKINSON’s solo career and vinyl rarities. In addition, it also features several interviews, including a brand new interview with original singer PAUL DI’ANNO, and many rare photos.

What We Need & What You Get

We have already funded the project through a first successful campaign but there is still a chance to preorder the regular magazine at this stage through this INDIEGOGO INDEMAND campaign - you have the choice between a single magazine or several packages including cool merch!

Check it out:

The Impact

We are an independent music magazine publisher from Vienna/Austria - being around since 1995 we have experienced a severe challenge through the ongoing Covid-19 crisis. Trying to be less dependent on advertising revenue we have decided to take our successful collector's series global. You will continue to help us bringing this series of collector's magazines to a new level and making it available to an audience worldwide after our first success with our QUEEN collector's magazine. Thanks for joining us on this journey!

Risks And Challenges

We will start shipping not later than end of February, but unforeseen challenges or delays due to the ongoing Corona-crisis can not be totally ruled out, e.g., if postal service restrictions continue unexpectedly for a longer time period. Even then, delivery later than end of March 2021 is not expected and your order is likely to arrive much earlier. Another minor issue is the fact that depending on the value of the goodie package you choose, you may be asked to pay import duty if you live outside the European Union. Import duty is highly unlikely to be imposed on a single magazine itself, however.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would simply appreciate it if you spread the word, especially if you know some IRON MAIDEN fans or people who want to support independent music journalism. Any additional social media presence is extremely helpful, thank you!

Please note, that is a purely journalistic project and not officially affiliated or endorsed by the band or its management.
story_txt:
Quick Summary
First things first: Yes, we did it! We have just funded our KICKSTARTER campaign successfully and are in the process of sending our magazine to print! Now we are offering everybody a chance to preorder this extraordinary collector's issue through our new INDIEGOGO INDEMAND campaign!
About Us
We are an independent publishing house, based in Vienna, Austria, specialising in high quality collector's issues devoted to rock's biggest acts: Since 2009, we have published German language "Rock Classics" issues (independent journalistic projects) dedicated to the likes of AC/DC, LED ZEPPELIN, PINK FLOYD, METALLICA, GUNS N' ROSES, KISS and QUEEN (and many more...). Following the success of our or first crowdfunding campaign (the QUEEN special issue), this IRON MAIDEN collector’s issue will be our second English language version to be made available to fans worldwide and is fully updated and expanded to include additional original features, adding plenty of extra value. With the world still suffering the effects of COVID-19, what could be better than a bit of distraction and joy for music fans worldwide, and what better subject to lighten the mood, ease the mind, and enjoy the moment than IRON MAIDEN? Aside from this, you would be supporting independent music journalism and magazine publishing at a critical time for the industry.
A Brief Overview Of Content 
The IRON MAIDEN Special Collector’s Edition celebrates the 40th anniversary of the release of IRON MAIDEN’s debut album and features the full history of the band as told through its studio album discography, including analysis, the source material behind the songs, and little-known facts. It also includes sections devoted to IRON MAIDEN films, literature, and memorabilia, as well as special features including BRUCE DICKINSON’s solo career and vinyl rarities. In addition, it also features several interviews, including a brand new interview with original singer PAUL DI’ANNO, and many rare photos.

What We Need & What You Get
We have already funded the project through a first successful campaign but there is still a chance to preorder the regular magazine at this stage through this INDIEGOGO INDEMAND campaign - you have the choice between a single magazine or several packages including cool merch!
